description: The second scroll that contains secret of the Orcs' traditional martial arts, Kabart.

name: Toruku's Letter
description: A letter from Khavatari Toruku. Take this to Prefect Kasman.

name: Khavatari Totem
description: A token given to one who has qualifications to change occupations to Orc Monk. Take this to the high prefect to change your occupation to an Orc Monk.

name: Fire Charm
description: A charm with inscription of fire mantra. Take this and find the 3 items that Tataru spoke of.

name: Kasha Bear Pelt
description: A pelt of kasha bear. Take to Tataru along with kasha bladespider husk and fiery egg.

name: Kasha Blade Spider Husk
description: The husk of a kasha blade spider. Take it to Tataru, along with a kasha bear pelt and a fiery egg.

name: 1st Fiery Egg
description: A spirit egg obtained from a scarlet salamander. Take it to Tataru along with a kasha bear pelt and a kasha bladespider husk.

name: Hestui Mask
description: A mask in shape of bear. Take this and go to Hestui totem spirit.

name: 2nd Fiery Egg
description: A spirit egg received from a scarlet salamander. Take this to the Hestui totem spirit.

name: Totem Spirit Claw
description: A claw received from Hestui totem spirit. Take this and go to Tataru.

name: Tataru's Letter of Recommendation
description: A letter written by Tataru. Take this to Seer Umos in the town of Gludin.

name: Flame Charm
description: A charm with inscription of flame mantra. Take this and gather grizzly blood and take to Seer Umos.

name: Grizzly Blood
description: A glass bottle filled with grizzly blood. Gather 3 and take to Seer Umos.

name: Blood Cauldron
description: A cauldron filled with grizzly blood. Take this to the Duda-Mara totem spirit.

name: Spirit Net
description: A net made with Spirit's Spider Silk. Use this to capture Durka Spirit hidden inside Venomous Spiders.

name: Bound Durka Spirit
description: Durka spirit bound inside Spirit Net. Take this to the Duda-Mara totem spirit.

name: Durka Parasite
description: An evil parasite spirit that comes out from spiders contaminated with the evil durka spirit. It is the key for calling upon the evil durka spirit.

name: Totem Spirit Blood
description: Blood spilt by the Duda-Mara totem spirit. Take this and go to Seer Umos.

name: Mask of Medium
description: A token that shows one has the qualifications to become an Orc Shaman. Take this to the high prefect, to change your occupation to an Orc Shaman.

name: Silvera's Ring
description: A ring given to artisan aspirants by Blacksmith Silvera. Strike down the boogle ratman gang and collect their front teeth.

name: 1st Pass Certificate
description: The certificate for passing the 1st artisan test. To take the next test, you must go to Blacksmith Kluto of the village Gludin.

name: 2nd Pass Certificate
description: The certificate for passing the 2nd artisan test. Take this and go to Blacksmith Kluto in Gludin.

name: Final Pass Certificate
description: The certificate for passing the final Artisan test. Take this to the head blacksmith to change occupations to an Artisan.

name: Boogle Ratman Tooth
description: The ugly front bucktooth of a boogle ratman. Just looking at it will make you nauseous. Collect 10 of these and take them to Blacksmith Silvera.

name: Boogle Ratman Leader's Tooth
description: The boogle ratman leader's big tooth. Before its stink makes you pass out, collect 2 of them and take them to Blacksmith Silvera.

name: Kluto's Letter
description: Blacksmith Kluto's letter. Take to Blacksmith Pinter in the Town of Gludio.

name: Footprint of Thief
description: Trace left by thieves. Kill Vuku Orc fighters, recover stolen items and take them to Blacksmith Pinter.

name: Stolen Secret Box
description: A secret box stolen by Vuku orc fighters. The contents of the box are unknown, but anyway, take it to Blacksmith Pinter.

name: Secret Box
description: A secret box received from Pinter. The contents are unknown, but do not worry and take it to Blacksmith Kluto in the Village of Gludin.

name: Ring of Raven
description: A mark certifying that one has earned the right to become a Scavenger. If you take it to a Warehouse Chief, you can transfer your class to Scavenger.

name: Pippi's Letter of Recommendation
description: A letter of introduction written by Collector Pipi. Take this to Trader Mion.

name: Raut's Teleport Scroll
description: An order sheet given by Warehouse Freightman Raut. Give it to Torai, in the south of Death Pass.

name: Succubus Undies
description: The underwear of Succubus received from Torai. Take this to Warehouse Freightman Raut of Gludin.

name: Mion's Letter
description: A letter sent from Trader Mion to her brother. Take this letter and go to Master Toma.

name: Bronk's Ingot
description: An ingot to be given to Chief Blacksmith Bronk.

name: Shari's Axe
description: An axe to be given to Trader Shari.

name: Zimenf's Potion
description: A potion to give to Priest of the Earth Zimenf.

name: Bronk's Pay
description: Product cost given by Chief Blacksmith Bronk. Take this to Trader Mion.

name: Shari's Pay

name: Scroll of Escape: Clan Hall
description: A scroll that relocates you to your clan hall. If you don't have a clan hall, it will relocate you to the nearest village.

name: Scroll of Escape: Castle
description: A scroll that relocates you to your castle. If you don't have a castle, it will relocate you to the nearest village.

name: Antidote
description: A reagent that neutralizes poison.

name: Greater Antidote
description: A high-quality reagent that neutralizes powerful poison.

name: Bandage
description: A medical bandage that stops bleeding when injured.

name: Emergency Dressing
description: A medical bandage that stops bleeding fast when severely injured.

name: Soulshot: No Grade
description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing power of attack. Used with a No grade weapon.

name: Kendell's 1st Order
description: Punish Kaboo Chief Uoph. He should be somewhere around the ruins over the hill, west of the Elven Village.

name: Kendell's 2nd Order
description: Punish Kaboo Chief Kracha. He should be somewhere around the Nine obelisk, southwest of the Elven Village.

name: Kendell's 3rd Order
description: Punish Kaboo Chief Batoh. He should be somewhere around the entrance of the underground fortress of the Elves.

name: Kendell's 4th Order
description: Punish Kaboo Chief Tanukia. He should be somewhere around the open-air theatre ruins, southwest of the Elven Village.

name: Kendell's 5th Order
description: Punish Kaboo Chief Turel. He should be somewhere around the seashore ruins, northwest of Lake Iris.

name: Kendell's 6th Order
description: Punish Kaboo Chief Roko. He should be somewhere around the seashore ruins, west of Lake Iris.

name: Kendell's 7th Order
description: Punish Kaboo Chief Kamut. He should be somewhere around the seashore ruins, south of Lake Iris.

name: Kendell's 8th Order
description: Punish Kaboo Chief Murtika. He should be somewhere around the seashore ruins, east of Lake Iris.

name: Wolf Collar
description: A necklace used to summon Wolves. It takes away some of the experience points the Pet Master earns.

name: Spiritshot: No Grade
description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon causing its M. Atk. to momentarily increase. Used with a no grade weapon.

name: Spiritshot (D-Grade)
description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon causing its M. Atk. to momentarily increase. Used with a D-grade weapon.

name: Spiritshot (C-Grade)
description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon causing its M. Atk. to momentarily increase. Used with a C-grade weapon.

name: Spiritshot (B-Grade)
description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon causing its M. Atk. to momentarily increase. Used with a B-grade weapon.

name: Spiritshot (A-Grade)
description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon causing its M. Atk. to momentarily increase. Used with an A-grade weapon.

name: Spiritshot (S-Grade)
description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon causing its M. Atk. to momentarily increase. Used with an S-grade weapon.

name: Food For Wolves
description: When the hunger gauge of a wolf reaches 55% or below, its food will be consumed automatically.

name: Mark of Challenger
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Challenger. An item for occupational change.

name: Letter of Kash
description: Kash's introduction letter. Take this letter to Martien in Town of Giran.

name: Watcher's 1st Eye
description: An item obtained from the monster, Gorr. Take this to Martien in Town of Giran.

name: Watcher's 2nd Eye
description: An item obtained from the monster, Baraham. Show this to Raldo and...

name: Scroll of Shyslassys
description: An ancient scroll obtained by slaying Shyslassys. Take this to Kash in the Town of Dion.

name: Broken Key
description: A key obtained by slaying Shyslassys. This key is needed in order to open the Chest of Shyslassys.

name: Mark of Duty
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of Duty. An item for occupational change.

name: Letter of Dustin
description: A letter given by Dustin. Deliver the letter to Grand Master Hannavalt in Town of Giran.

name: Knight's Tear
description: Obtained from the spirit of Sir Herod. Take this to Sir Aaron Tanford.

name: Mirror of Orpic
description: This is needed in order to speak with the ghost of Sir Talianus. Use this to defeat the hangman tree.

name: Tear of Confession
description: Obtained from the ghost of Sir Talianus. Take this to Sir Kiel Nighthawk.

name: Report Piece
description: You may obtain this by hunting strains and ghouls. Gather 10 pieces and put them together to create Talianus's report.

name: Report Piece
description: The completed report. After speaking with Sir Kiel Nighthawk, deliver the report to the ghost of Sir Talianus.

name: Tear of Loyalty
description: This item can be obtained from Isael Silvershadow. Take it to Priest Dustin.

name: Militas Article
description: You can receive this item when you catch a Leto lizardman. Collect 20 of them and take them to Isael Silvershadow.

name: Saints Ashes Urn
description: An object received from Priest Dustin. Deliver this to Sir Windawood.

name: Athebaldt's Skull
description: You can obtain this item from a Breka orc overlord. Take it to Priest Dustin along with Athebaldt's ribs and Athebaldt's shin.

name: Athebaldt's Ribs
description: You can obtain this item from a Breka orc overlord. Take it to Priest Dustin along with Athebaldt's skull and Athebaldt's shin.

name: Athebaldt's Shin
description: You can obtain this item from a Breka orc overlord. Take it to Priest Dustin along with Athebaldt's ribs and Athebaldt's skull.

name: Letter of Windawood
description: A letter received from Sir Colin Windawood. Show this to Priest Dustin.

name: Dufners Letter
description: A letter sent from Master Dufner to Master Terry in the Town of Dion.

name: Terry's 1st Order
description: Investigate the neer ghoul berserkers of the Execution Grounds.

name: Terry's 2nd Order
description: Investigate the Ol Mahum captain, Turek orc warlord, ant captain and Turak bugbear warrior.

name: Terry's Letter
description: A letter sent by Master Terry to Trader Viktor of Hunters Village.

name: Viktor's Letter
description: A letter sent by Trader Viktor to Master Terry in the Town of Dion. The letter has Terry's seal.

name: Hawkeye's Letter
description: A letter sent by Hawkeye to Trader Viktor of the Hunters Village.

name: Mysterious Spirit Ore
description: A mysterious Spirit Ore obtained after slaying neer ghoul berserkers. Take this to Master Terry.

name: Ol Mahum Spirit Ore
description: A mysterious Spirit Ore obtained after slaying the Ol Mahum captain. Take this to Master Terry.

name: Turek Spirit Ore
description: A mysterious Spirit Ore obtained after slaying the Turek orc overlord. Take this to Master Terry.

name: Ant Spirit Ore
description: A mysterious Spirit Ore obtained after slaying the ant captain. Take this to Master Terry.

name: Turak Bugbear Spirit Ore
description: A mysterious Spirit Ore obtained after slaying the Turak bugbear warrior. Take this to Master Terry.

name: Terry's Box
description: A chest containing the mysterious Spirit Ore. Take this to Trader Viktor of the Hunters Village.

name: Viktor's Request
description: A request issued by Trader Viktor. "Please gather 10 medusa scales."

name: Medusa Scales
description: The scales of the medusa. Gather 10 of these and take them to Trader Viktor.

name: Shilen's Spirit Ore
description: Strange Spirit Ore obtained from the bodies of mutant species. They seem to be related to Shilen, the goddess of death.

name: Analysis Request
description: A request letter sent to Magister Marina of the Ivory Tower from Trader Viktor. The letter asks Marina to analyze the dark bezoar.

name: Marina's Letter
description: A letter sent by Magister Marina to Blacksmith Brunon of the Dwarven Village.

name: Experiment Tools
description: Experimental tools crafted by Blacksmith Brunon. Deliver these to Magister Marina of the Ivory Tower.

name: Analysis Result
description: A document where Magister Marina has organized the analyzed results of the Dark Bezoar. Deliver this to Master Terry in the Town of Dion.

name: Terry's 3rd Order
description: Master Terry's orders. The orders give instructions to come back for the next task after reaching level 36.

name: List of Host
description: A list of the bezoar hosts. "Marsh stakato drone, Breka orc overlord, ant warrior captain, Leto lizardman warrior"

name: Abyss Spirit Ore
description: The dark bezoar retrieved from the body of a marsh stakato drone. Take this to Master Terry.

name: Abyss Spirit Ore
description: The Spirit Ore retrieved from the body of the Breka orc overlord. Take this to Master Terry.

name: Abyss Spirit Ore
description: The Spirit Ore retrieved from the body of the ant captain. Take this to Master Terry.

name: Abyss Spirit Ore
description: The Spirit Ore retrieved from the body of the Leto lizardman warrior. Take this to Master Terry.

name: Terry's Report
description: A report detailing information about the Spirit Ore incident. Take this to Master Dufner of Town of Giran.

name: Mark of Seeker
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Seeker. An occupation change related item.

name: Mark of Scholar
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Scholar. An occupation change related item.

name: Mirien's 1st Sigil
description: A mark given by Magister Mirien while giving orders to complete High Priest Sylvain's request.

name: Mirien's 2nd Sigil
description: A mark given by Magister Mirien while giving orders to complete Grand Magister Jurek's request.

name: Mirien's 3rd Sigil
description: A mark given by Magister Mirien when giving orders to complete Elder Cronos's request.

name: Mirien's Instruction
description: A note that contains Magister Mirien's instructions. The note gives instructions to come back for the next task after reaching level 36.

name: Maria's 1st Letter
description: A letter sent by Maria to Captain Lucas in the Town of Dion.

name: Maria's 2nd Letter
description: A letter sent by Maria to Astrologer Creta of the village of Floran.

name: Lucas's Letter
description: A letter sent by Captain Lucas in the Town of Dion to Maria.

name: Lucilla's Handbag
description: The handbag left by Maria's friend Lucillas on the night of the theft. Take this to Astrologer Creta.

name: Creta's 1st Letter
description: A letter sent by the Astrologer Creta to Maria in the Town of Dion.

name: Creta's Painting1
description: A painting by Astrologer Creta. It contains a shadow presumed to be that of the thief. Take this to Maria.

name: Creta's Painting2
description: A painting by Astrologer Creta. It contains a shadow presumed to be that of the thief. Take this to Captain Lucas.

name: Creta's Painting3
description: A painting painted by Astrologer Creta. The shadow in the painting is that of a Leto lizardman warrior.

name: Brown Scroll Scrap
description: A scrap of a scroll that contains directions on how to create the crystal of purity. Gather 5 of these and take them to Maria.

name: Crystal of Purity
description: A crystal used to purify the earth. Take this to High Priest Sylvain in the Town of Dion.

name: High Priest's Sigil
description: A mark received from High Priest Sylvain. A proof given to those who are carrying out the orders of the High Priest.

name: Grand Magister's Sigil
description: A mark received from Grand Magister Jurek. A proof given to those who are carrying out the orders of the Grand Magister.

name: Crono's Sigil
description: A mark received from Elder Cronos. This signifies proof that someone is carrying out orders from Elder Cronos.

name: Sylvain's Letter
description: High Priest Sylvain's letter. Take this to Maria in the Town of Dion.

name: Symbol of Sylvain
description: A symbol given to those who have passed High Priest Sylvain's test. Take this to Magister Mirien in the Town of Dion.

name: Jurek's List
description: The list of evil creatures that Grand Magister Jurek asked you to investigate: Monster eye destroyer, Breka orc shaman, and shackle.

name: Monster Eye Destroyer's Skin
description: A beamer's skin. Gather 5 of these and take them to Grand Magister Jurek of Town of Giran.

name: Shaman's Necklace
description: A Breka orc shaman's necklace. Gather 5 of these and take them to Grand Magister Jurek in Town of Giran.

name: Shackle's Scalp
description: Skin of the shackle's head. Gather 2 of these and take them to Grand Magister Jurek of Town of Giran.

name: Symbol of Jurek
description: A symbol given to those who have passed Grand Magister Jurek's test. Take this to Magister Mirien in the Town of Dion.

name: Cronos Letter
description: A letter sent by Elder Cronos to Magister Dieter in the Town of Giran.

name: Dieter's Key
description: A key to the chest where Dieter has hidden the Scriptures of Knowledge. Take this to Astrologer Creta in Floran Village.

name: Creta's 2nd Letter
description: Creta's letter describing the theft of the Scriptures of Knowledge. Take this to Magister Dieter in the Town of Giran.

name: Dieter's Letter
description: A letter from Magister Dieter to Trader Edroc of the weapons shop of Hunters Village.

name: Dieter's Diary
description: Magister Dieter's Diary, given by him in hopes that it may be of aid in recovering the Scriptures of Knowledge.

name: Raut's Letter Envelope
description: A plain letter envelope with no contents. The envelope is addressed "To Warehouse Keeper Raut".

name: Triff's Ring
description: A ring given by Drunkard Triff. Show this ring to those whom Triff has entrusted with the Scriptures of Knowledge.

name: Scripture Chapter 1
description: The 1st book of the Scriptures of Knowledge. Gather all 4 books.

name: Scripture Chapter 2
description: The 2nd book of the Scriptures of Knowledge. Gather all 4 books.

name: Scripture Chapter 3
description: The 3rd book of the Scriptures of Knowledge. Gather all 4 books.

name: Scripture Chapter 4
description: The 4th book of the Scriptures of Knowledge. Gather all 4 books.

name: Valkon's Request
description: Warehouse Keeper Valkon's request. The instructions are to bring back the crystal of purity.

name: Poitan's Notes
description: Blacksmith Poitan's accounting books. Take this to Elder Casian of the Wastelands.

name: Scriptures of Knowledge
description: A scripture edited by Elder Cronos. It is said to contain a vast knowledge of the past. It is part of a 4-scripture set.

name: Strong Liquor
description: As its name indicates, a strong liquor. Take this to Drunkard Triff at the harbor.

name: Crystal of Purity
description: An item that Warehouse Keeper Valkon in Town of Giran agreed to trade with you for scripture chapter 2.

name: Casian's List
description: 10 ghoul's skins, 12 units of medusa's blood, 5 units of fettered soul's ichor, and 5 enchanted gargoyle's nails.

name: Ghoul's Skin
description: The skin of a ghoul. Gather 10 of these and take them to Elder Casian.

name: Medusa's Blood
description: Medusa's Blood. Gather 12 bottles and take them to Elder Casian.

name: Fettered Soul's Ichor
description: The ichor of a fettered soul. Gather 5 units and take them to Elder Casian.

name: Enchanted Gargoyle's Nail
description: The enchanted nails of a gargoyle. Gather 5 of these and take them to Elder Casian.

name: Symbol of Cronos
description: The mark of Cronos, the top sage of the continent. Take this to Magister Mirien in the Town of Dion.

name: Mark of Pilgrim
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Pilgrim. An occupation change related item.

name: Book of Sage
description: A book received from Elder Casian. Take this book to Hermit Santiago.

name: Voucher of Trial
description: A mark given by Hermit Santiago. Show this to Seer Tanapi of the Orc Village.

name: Spirit of Flame
description: Proof that you have an understanding of the spirit of flame. In order to carry out the next stage of this trial, go see Gauri Twinklerock of Dwarven Village.

name: Essence of Flame
description: A jewel obtained from the lava salamander. Take this to the Ancestor Martankus.

name: Book of Gerald
description: A book given by Priest Gerald. The book looks very cheap.

name: Gray Badge
description: A badge given by Wanderer Dorf. Take this to Priest Primos at Town of Giran.

name: Picture of Nahir
description: A picture of the monster, Nahir. Defeat Nahir, who lurks in the depths of the Elven Ruins on Talking Island.

name: Hair of Nahir
description: The hair of the monster, Nahir. Take this to Priest Petron.

name: Statue of Einhasad
description: A statue of Einhasad given by Priest Petron. Take this to Andellia, who lives near the Mother Tree Glade in the Elven Village.

name: Book of Darkness
description: A book given by Uruha. The book contains unrecognizable letters written in blood.

name: Debris of Willow
description: Debris obtained from the black willow. Go and seek Uruha while in possession of this.

name: Tag of Rumor
description: This contains rumors regarding Wanderer Dorf and Priest Gerald.

name: Mark of Trust
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Testimony of Trust. An occupation change related item.

name: Letter to Elf
description: A letter requesting the trust of the Elves. Deliver this to Hierarch Asterios of the Elven Village.

name: Letter to Dark Elf
description: A letter requesting the trust of the Dark Elves. Deliver this to Tetrarch Thifiell of the Dark Elven Village.

name: Letter to Dwarf
description: A letter requesting the trust of the Dwarves. Deliver this to Lockirin of the Dwarven Village.

name: Letter to Orc
description: A letter requesting the trust of the Orcs. Deliver this to the Pa'agrio Lord Kakai at the Orc Village.

name: Letter to Seresin
description: A letter given by High Priest Hollint. Deliver this to Cardinal Seresin at the Town of Oren.

name: Scroll of Dark Elf Trust
description: A scroll given by Tetrarch Thifiell. Deliver this, along with the scroll of the Elf trust, to High Priest Hollint.

name: Scroll of Elf Trust
description: This item can be obtained from Hierarch Asterios. Give this item along with scroll of Dark Elf trust to High Priest Hollint.

name: Scroll of Dwarf Trust
description: A scroll given by Lockirin of the Iron Gate. Deliver this, along with the scroll of Orc trust, to Cardinal Seresin.

name: Scroll of Orc Trust
description: A scroll given by Kakai, Lord of Flame. Deliver this, along with the scroll of Dwarf trust, to Cardinal Seresin.

name: Recommendation of Hollint
description: Deliver this to High Priest Biotin at the Temple of Einhasad on Talking Island.

name: Order of Asterios
description: Slay Luell of Zephyr Winds and Actea of Verdant Wilds and bring back proof of their deaths.

name: Breath of Winds
description: Obtained from Luell of Zephyr Winds. Deliver this, along with the seed of verdure to Hierarch Asterios.

name: Seed of Verdure
description: A proof obtained from Actea of Verdant Wilds. Deliver this, along with the breath of winds, to Hierarch Asterios.

name: Letter from Thifiell
description: Deliver this to Magister Clayton, member of the Dark Elf Guild, in the Town of Dion.

name: Guardian Basilisk Blood
description: Blood taken from a Guardian Basilisk. Collect 5 to produce Basilisk Plasma.

name: Giant Aphid
description: Acquired from various Ant Soldiers. Collect 5 to create Honey Dew.

name: Stakatos Fluids
description: Fluid acquired from various Marsh Stakatos. Collect 5 to produce Stakato Ichor.

name: Basilisk Plasma
description: Take this, along with the honey dew and stakato ichor, to Magister Clayton.

name: Honey Dew
description: Take this, along with the basilisk plasma and stakato ichor, to Magister Clayton.

name: Stakato Ichor
description: Take this, along with the honey dew and basilisk plasma, to Magister Clayton.

name: Order of Clayton
description: Obtain basilisk plasma of a guardian basilisk, stakato ichor of a marsh stakato and honey dew of an ant guard and take them to Magister Clayton.

name: Parasite of Lota
description: This may be obtained from the Windsus. Gather 10 of these and take them to Seer Manakia.

name: Letter to Manakia
description: A letter received from Pa'agrio Lord Kakai. Deliver this to Seer Manakia in the Town of Giran.

name: Letter of Manakia
description: A letter received from Seer Manakia. Deliver this to Pa'agrio Lord Kakai.

name: Letter to Nikola
description: A letter received from Lockirin of the Iron Gate. Deliver this to Maestro Nikola of the Cruma Tower.

name: Order of Nikola
description: Obtain 1 Porta Heartstone and take it to Maestro Nikola.

name: Heartstone of Porta
description: Heartstone acquired from Porta. Bring it to Maestro Nikola.

name: Mark of Duelist
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Duelist. An item for occupational change.

name: Order Gludio
description: Kill at least 10 punchers and 10 noble ant leaders in Gludio.

name: Order Dion
description: Kill at least 10 marsh stakato drones and 10 dead seekers in Dion.

name: Order Giran
description: Kill at least 10 Breka orc overlords and 10 fettered souls in Giran.

name: Order Oren
description: Kill at least 10 Leto lizardman overlords and 10 enchanted monster eyes in Oren.

name: Order Aden
description: Kill at least 10 Tamlin orcs and 10 Tamlin orc archers in Aden.

name: Puncher's Shard
description: A shard of the broken puncher. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Noble Ant's Feeler
description: The feelers of the noble ant leader. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Drone's Chitin
description: The chitin of the marsh stakato drone. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Dead Seeker Fang
description: The fangs of the dead seeker bat. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Overlord Necklace
description: Collect ten Breka orc overlord's necklaces and take them to Duelist Kaien.

name: Fettered Soul's Chain
description: The chains that surround a fettered soul's body. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Chief's Amulet
description: The amulet of a Leto lizardman overlord. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Enchanted Monster Eye Meat
description: The flesh of an enchanted eye. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Tamlin Orc's Ring
description: The ring of a Tamlin orc. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Tamlin Orc's Arrow
description: The arrows of a Tamlin orc archer. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Final Order
description: Defeat the Excuro and Krator of the Cruma Tower, the Grandis of Giran, the Timak Orc Overlord of Oren, and the Lakin of Aden 3 times.

name: Excuro's Skin
description: The skin of the excuro. Collect 3 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Krator's Shard
description: The shard of a broken krator. Collect 3 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Grandis' Skin
description: The skin of a grandis. Collect 3 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Timak Orc's Belt
description: The belt of a Timak orc overlord. Collect 3 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Lakin's Mace
description: Mace used by a lakin. Collect 3 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Luther's Letter
description: A letter given by Master Luther. Take this to Alex of the village of Floran.

name: Alex's Warrant
description: A warrant written by Alex. Take this to Leirynn.

name: Leirynn's 1st Order
description: A list of orders given by Leirynn. "Slay 10 Delu Shamans and bring back their tokens."

name: Delu Totem
description: The totem of Shaman Saska. Take this, along with the rest of the Delu Shaman totems, to Leirynn.

name: Leirynn's 2nd Order
description: A list of orders given by Leirynn. Slay Delu chief Kalkis and bring back proof.

name: Chief Kalki's Fang
description: Proof that the Delu chief Kalkis has been slain. Take this to Leirynn.

name: Leirynn's Report
description: A report issued by Leirynn. Take this to Alex.

name: Strange Map
description: A strange map obtained from the Delu chief Kalkis.

name: Lambert's Map
description: A map where the name of Lambert, the former lord's guard, is written.

name: Alex's Letter
description: A letter given by Alex. Take this and go to drunkard Borys at the Town of Gludio.

name: Alex's Order
description: Alex's orders. The orders give instructions to find and recover Duke Ashton's missing gold.

name: Wine Catalog
description: A list of premium wine published by the Giran Traders' Guild. Show this to Trader Tyra.

name: Tyra's Contract
description: The contract that Trader Tyra has drawn up. The contract states that Tyra will trade 10 pouches of red spore dust for a Malrukian wine.

name: Red Spore Dust
description: Red spore dust obtained by slaying the giant fungus. Gather 10 pouches and bring them to Trader Tyra.

name: Malrukian Wine
description: Premium wine crafted following the methods of the Malruk tribe. Take this to drunkard Borys.

name: Old Order
description: An old order received from drunkard Borys. Take this and go to bodyguard Jax.

name: Jax's Diary
description: A diary that bodyguard Jax has given, saying that it will aid in the search for Solt's and Makel's maps.

name: 1st Torn Map Piece
description: A piece of the map that belonged to the former lord's guard Solt. Gather 4 of these.

name: 2nd Torn Map Piece
description: A piece of the map that belonged to the former lord's guard Makel. Gather 4 of these.

name: Solt's Map
description: A map where the name of the former lord's guard Solt is written.

name: Makel's Map
description: A map where the name of the former lord's guard Makel is written.

name: Combined Map
description: Using the map (alt-m), find the hiding place of the lord's gold bar.

name: Rusted Key
description: A rusty copper key discovered while digging under the tree indicated on the map.

name: Gold Bar
description: A gold bar stamped with Duke Ashton's seal. Take this to Alex.

name: Alex's Recommend
description: A recommendation written by Alex. Take this to Master Luther.

name: Mark of Searcher
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Searcher. An occupation change related item.

name: Report of Perrin
description: Take this report and go seek Perrin in Gludin Harbor.

name: Kristina's Letter
description: A letter given by Saint Kristina. Deliver this to Master Sorius.

name: Picture of Windy
description: A picture of Windy. Take this drawing to Windy.

name: Golden Statue
description: The reward given by the head of the orphanage. Something good happens if this is in possession?

name: Windy's Pebbles
description: A pebble that Windy has picked up from the Wastelands. Take this to Gupu, the head of the orphanage near Gludio.

name: Order of Sorius
description: Take these orders and show them to Daurin, who is located west of the Orc Barracks.

name: 1st Secret Letter
description: The documents of Leto lizardmen. Gather all of the letters and deliver them to Saint Kristina.

name: 2nd Secret Letter
description: The documents of Leto lizardmen. Gather all of the letters and deliver them to Saint Kristina.

name: 3rd Secret Letter
description: The documents of Leto lizardmen. Gather all of the letters and deliver them to Saint Kristina.

name: 4th Secret Letter
description: The documents of Leto lizardmen. Gather all of the letters and deliver them to Saint Kristina.

name: Mark of Healer
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Test of the Healer. An occupation change related item.

name: Mark of Reformer
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Reformer. An occupation change related item.

name: Book of Reform
description: A book received from Priestess Pupina. Go to the Execution Grounds and slay the nameless undeads with the power of light.

name: Letter of Introduction
description: A letter introducing Priestess Pupina. Take this and meet with to Preacher Sla of the Wastelands.

name: Sla's Letter
description: A letter given by Sla. Take this to Katari, who is near the waterfalls of the Neutral Zone.

name: Greetings
description: A letter sent by Sla to her disciples. Go to the Orc Village, Dwarven Village, and Talking Island in this order.

name: Ol Mahum's Money
description: Ol Mahum currency given by the themselves as a reward. For what...? Nobody knows.

name: Katari's Letter
description: Katari's reply letter to Sla. Collect 3 reply letters from Sla's disciples and deliver them to Sla.

name: Nyakuri's Letter
description: Nyakuri's reply letter to Sla. Collect 3 reply letters from Sla's disciples and deliver them to Sla.

name: Undead List
description: Skeleton archer, skeleton lord, skeleton marksman, misery skeleton, silent horror.

name: Ramus's Letter
description: A reply letter sent by Ramus to Sla. Deliver this to Sla after meeting all of Sla's disciples.

name: Ripped Diary
description: Diaries containing the final words of young women unfairly killed during the witch hunts of Duke Byron Ashton. Collect 7 of them.

name: Huge Nail
description: The large nail that was embedded in Aruraune's skull. Take this to Priestess Pupina at Town of Giran.

name: Letter of Betrayer
description: A letter given by an Ol Mahum Betrayer. Take it to Katari in the swamp area of the Dark Forest.

name: Bone Fragment
description: Bone pieces of a silent horror. Take this, along with the rest of the undead bone fragments, to Ramus.

name: Bone Fragment
description: A bone fragment of a skeleton lord. Take this, along with the rest of the undead bone fragments, to Ramus.

name: Bone Fragment
description: A bone fragment of a skeleton marksman. Take this, along with the rest of the undead bone fragments, to Ramus.

name: Bone Fragment
description: A bone fragment from a misery skeleton. Take it along with other bone fragments of the undead to Ramus.

name: Bone Fragment
description: A bone fragment of a skeleton archer. Take this, along with the rest of the undead bone fragments, to Ramus.

name: Bone Fragment
description: A bone fragment of a skeleton. Take this, along with the rest of the undead bone fragments, to Ramus.

name: Mark of Magus
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Magus. An item for occupational change.

name: Rukal's Letter
description: A letter sent by Bard Rukal to Parina of the Village of Gludin.

name: Parina's Letter
description: A letter sent by Parina to Elder Casian. The letter makes inquiries regarding the singing flower.

name: Lilac Charm
description: A protection charm created by Elder Casian. Take this and seek out the 3 types of singing flowers.

name: 1st Golden Seed
description: The seed of the singing flower, which absorbs blood in order to bloom. Gather 3 of these and take them to Bard Rukal.

name: 2nd Golden Seed
description: The seed of the singing flower, which absorbs blood in order to bloom. Gather 3 of these and take them to Bard Rukal.

name: 3rd Golden Seed
description: The seed of the singing flower, which absorbs blood in order to bloom. Gather 3 of these and take them to Bard Rukal.

name: Score of Elements
description: A music score sheet given by Bard Rukal. Take this and find the 4 elemental tones.

name: Dazzling Drop
description: A dazzling, tear-shaped jewel. Gather 20 of these and take them to the Water Undine.

name: Flame Crystal
description: A crystal obtained from the ghost fire. Gather 5 of these and take them to the Flame Salamander.

name: Harpy's Feather
description: The feather of a slain harpy. Gather 20 of these and take them to the Wind Sylph.

name: Wyrm's Wingbone
description: The wingbone of a slain Wyrm. Gather 10 of these and take them to the Wind Sylph.

name: Windsus Mane
description: The mane of a slain Windsus. Gather 10 of these and take them to the Wind Sylph.

name: Enchanted Monster Eye Shell
description: The skin of a slain enchanted eye. Gather 10 of these and take them to the Earth Snake.

name: Enchanted Golem Powder
description: Stone powder obtained after slaying an enchanted stone golem. Gather 10 of these and take them to the Earth Snake.

name: Enchanted Iron Golem Shard
description: A fragment of a destroyed enchanted iron golem. Gather 10 of these and take them to the Earth Snake.

name: Tone of Water
description: One that comprises the beautiful harmony of the 4 elemental tones. Take this to Bard Rukal in the Town of Dion.

name: Tone of Fire
description: One that comprises the beautiful harmony of the four elemental tones. Take this to Bard Rukal in the Town of Dion.

name: Tone of Wind
description: One that comprise the beautiful harmony of the four elemental tones. Take this to Bard Rukal in the Town of Dion.

name: Tone of Earth
description: One that comprise the beautiful harmony of the four elemental tones. Take this to Bard Rukal in the Town of Dion.

name: Salamander Charm
description: A charm of agreement given by the Flame Salamander. It promises to give the tone of fire in return for 5 flame crystals.

name: Sylph Charm
description: A charm of agreement given by the Wind Sylph. It promises to give the tone of wind in return for materials gathered from the harpy, Wyrm, and Windsus.

name: Undine Charm
description: A charm of agreement given by the Water Undine. It promises to give the tone of water in return for 20 dazzling drops.

name: Serpent Charm
description: A charm of agreement given by the Earth Snake. It promises to give the tone of earth in return for slaying the enchanted monsters in the surroundings of the Ivory Tower.

name: Recommendation of Balanki
description: A recommendation given by Silver Scale's Balanki. Gather all 3 recommendations and visit Lockirin of the Iron Gate.

name: Recommendation of Filaur
description: A recommendation given by Filaur of the Gray Pillar. Gather all 3 recommendations and seek out Lockirin of the Iron Gate.

name: Recommendation of Arin
description: A recommendation given by Black Anvil's Arin. Gather all 3 recommendations and go to Lockirin of the Iron Gate.

name: Mark of Maestro
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Maestro. An occupation change related item.

name: Letter of Solder Detachment
description: A letter from Captain Croto that promises to send soldiers. Deliver this to Lockirin of the Iron Gate.

name: Paint of Kamuru
description: A painting of Kamuru. Go to the Cave of Trials in the orc kingdom to seek him out.

name: Necklace of Kamuru
description: A necklace worn by Kamuru. Deliver this to Captain Croto.

name: Paint of Teleport Device
description: A drawing of a teleport device. Recover this device from Master Toma.

name: Teleport Device
description: A teleport device given by Master Toma. Deliver this to Black Anvil's Arin.

name: Architecture of Cruma
description: A simple explanation of Cruman architecture. Take this to the research team stationed at the entrance of the Cruma Tower.

name: Report of Cruma
description: A report recording the results of investigations made by the Cruma research team. Deliver this to Eldar Filaur.

name: Ingredients of Antidote
description: Gather 10 stinger wasp needles, 10 marsh spider webs, and 10 leech bloods and deliver them to Researcher Lorain.

name: Stinger Wasp Needle
description: Gather 10 of these and deliver them along with the other ingredients to Researcher Lorain.

name: Marsh Spider's Web
description: Gather 10 of these and deliver them along with the other ingredients to Researcher Lorain.

name: Leech Blood
description: Gather 10 of these and deliver them along with the other ingredients to Researcher Lorain.

name: Mark of Warspirit
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Test of the War Spirit. An item for occupational change.

name: Vendetta Totem
description: A totem given to the Orcs who seek to punish betrayers of their race. Take this and hunt the Tamlin Orcs.

name: Tamlin Orc Head
description: The head of a slain Tamlin Orc. Gather 13 of these and take them to Seer Somak.

name: Warspirit Totem
description: A totem used in the Ritual of the War Spirit. Take this to Ancestor Martankus in the Cave of Trials.

name: Orim's Contract
description: I will give you Braki's remains in return for 10 porta eyes, 10 excuro scales and 10 mordeo talons.

name: Porta's Eye
description: A jewel pried from the porta's eye. Gather 10 of these and take them to Orim of the Shadow.

name: Excuro's Scale
description: The scales of an excuro. Gather 10 of these and take them to Orim of the Shadow.

name: Mordeos Talon
description: The talons of a mordeo. Gather 10 of these and take them to Orim of the Shadow.

name: Braki's Remains
description: The remains of Braki, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 3 remains, to Seer Somak.

name: Pekiron's Totem
description: A guardian totem received from Seer Pekiron. Take this and go to the Leto lizardman shamans and chiefs to recover Tonar's remains.

name: Tonar's Skull
description: The skull of Tonar, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Pekiron.

name: Tonar's Rib Bone
description: The rib bones of Tonar, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Pekiron.

name: Tonar's Spine
description: The spine bones of Tonar, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Pekiron.

name: Tonar's Arm Bone
description: The arm bones of Tonar, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Pekiron.

name: Tonar's Thigh Bone
description: The thigh bones of Tonar, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Pekiron.

name: Tonar's Remains
description: The remains of Tonar, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the other 3 heroes' remains, to Seer Somak.

name: Manakia's Totem
description: A totem received from Seer Manakia. Take this and go to the medusas and Stenoa, the gorgon queen, to recover Hermodt's remains.

name: Hermodt's Skull
description: The skull of Hermodt, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Manakia.

name: Hermodt's Rib Bone
description: The rib bones of Hermodt, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Manakia.

name: Hermodt's Spine
description: The spine bones of Hermodt, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Manakia.

name: Hermodt's Arm Bone
description: The arm bones of Hermodt, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Manakia.

name: Hermodt's Thigh Bone
description: The thigh bones of Hermodt, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Manakia.

name: Hermodt's Remains
description: The remains of Hermodt, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the other three heroes' remains, to Seer Somak.

name: Racoy's Totem
description: A totem given by Seer Racoy. Take this and go to the Temple of Einhasad in the Town of Gludio to ask about Kiruna.

name: Vivyan's Letter
description: A letter from Priestess Vivyan. Take this to Trader Sarien of the Southern Wastelands.

name: Insect Diagram Book
description: An insect encyclopedia that Trader Sarien has given as aid. Take this and hunt noble ants to recover Kiruna's remains.

name: Kiruna's Skull
description: The skull of Kiruna, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Racoy.

name: Kiruna's Rib Bone
description: The rib bones of Kiruna, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Racoy.

name: Kiruna's Spine
description: The spine bones of Kiruna, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Racoy.

description: The arm bones of Kiruna, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Racoy.

name: Kiruna's Thigh Bone
description: The thigh bones of Kiruna, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Racoy.

name: Kiruna's Remains
description: The remains of Kiruna, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the other 3 heroes' remains, to Seer Somak.

name: Braki's Remains
description: The remains of the hero, Braki, encased in an urn. Take this to the Ancestor Martankus in the Cave of Trials.

name: Tonar's Remains
description: The remains of the hero, Tonar, encased in an urn. Take this to the Ancestor Martankus in the Cave of Trials.

name: Hermodt's Remains
description: The remains of the hero, Hermodt, encased in an urn. Take this to the Ancestor Martankus in the Cave of Trials.

name: Kiruna's Remains
description: The remains of the hero, Kiruna, encased in an urn. Take this to the Ancestor Martankus in the Cave of Trials.

name: Broken Teleport Device
description: The teleport device given by Master Toma. Take this back to Master Toma.
