name: Mark of Guildsman
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Guildsman. An occupation change related item.

name: Valkon's Recommendation
description: A recommendation letter written by Warehouse Keeper Valkon. Take this and go to Blacksmith Altran of Talking Island.

name: Mandragora Berry
description: The fruit of mandragoras, known for their uses in treating ailments.

name: Altran's Instructions
description: Blacksmith Altran's instructions. The instructions are to gather materials and create 7 journeyman's rings.

name: Altran's 1st Recommendation
description: A recommendation letter written by Blacksmith Altran. Take this and go to Warehouse Keeper Norman of the Village of Gludin.

name: Altran's 2nd Recommendation
description: A recommendation letter written by Blacksmith Altran. Take this and go to Blacksmith Pinter of the Town of Gludio.

name: Norman's Instructions
description: Warehouse Keeper Norman's instructions. The instructions are to go to Blacksmith Duning of Hunters Village and bring back the key.

name: Norman's Receipt
description: Warehouse Keeper Norman's receipt. Take this and go to Blacksmith Duning of the Hunters Village.

name: Duning's Instructions
description: Blacksmith Duning's instructions. It gives an order to recover 30 keys from Breka orcs.

name: Duning's Key
description: Mithril key recovered from Breka orcs. Collect 30 and take them to Blacksmith Duning.

name: Norman's List
description: Ingredient list of Warehouse Keeper Norman: 70 units of gray bone powder, 70 granite whetstones, 70 units of red pigment, and 70 units of braided yarn.

name: Gray Bone Powder
description: The powder collected from the bones of ghouls and strains. Gather 70 of these and take them to Warehouse Keeper Norman.

name: Granite Whetstone
description: A whetstone made from the fragments of the granite golem. Gather 70 of these and take them to Warehouse Keeper Norman.

name: Red Pigment
description: Red pigment obtained by slaying the dead seeker bat. Gather 70 of these and take them to Warehouse Keeper Norman.

name: Braided Yarn
description: Braided yarn obtained by slaying the silenos. Gather 70 of these and take them to Warehouse Keeper Norman.

name: Journeyman Gem
description: A material used to make the journeyman's ring.

name: Pinter's Instructions
description: Instructions of Blacksmith Pinter: Find and bring back 70 amber beads.

name: Amber Bead
description: A bead-shaped piece of amber. Collect 70 of these and take them to Blacksmith Pinter.

name: Amber Lump
description: An unrefined lump of amber. The material used in creating the Amber Bead.

name: Journeyman Deco Beads
description: Ingredient item used to make a journeyman's ring.

name: Journeyman Ring
description: To pass the Trial of the Guildsman, you must create 7 of these rings. Take the completed rings to Warehouse Keeper Valkon.

name: Mark of Life
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Testimony of Life. An occupation change related item.

name: Cardien's Letter
description: Letter by Master Cardien. Take this and go to Hierarch Asterios of the Elven Village.

name: Camomile Charm
description: A talisman given by Hierarch Asterios. Take this and return to Master Cardien in the Town of Dion.

name: Hierarch's Letter
description: A letter given by Hierarch Asterios. Take this and go to Thalia, who lives on the eastern shores of Iris Lake.

name: Moonflower Charm
description: The charm given by Hierarch Asterios to keep in possession while searching for the water of life.

name: Grail Diagram
description: A diagram of the grail, given by Thalia. Take this and go to Blacksmith Pushkin of Town of Giran.

name: Thalia's 1st Letter
description: Thalia's letter. Take this and go to Arkenia, who is at the Altar of Rites.

name: Thalia's 2nd Letter
description: Thalia's letter. Take this and go to Isael Silvershadow of the Hunters Village.

name: Thalia's Instructions
description: A letter containing Thalia's instructions. The instructions are to come back after reaching level 38.

name: Pushkin's List
description: A list given by Blacksmith Pushkin. "10 pure Mithril Ore, 20 ant soldier acid, 20 Wyrm talons"

name: Pure Mithril Cup
description: A cup crafted by Blacksmith Pushkin that is made of pure mithril. Take this back to Thalia.

name: Arkenia's Contract
description: A contract written by Arkenia. The contract states that she will give stardust in return for Andariel's book from the Village of Gludin.

name: Arkenia's Instructions
description: Arkenia's instructions. The instructions are to bring back Andariel's book from the Temple of Einhasad in the Village of Gludin.

name: Adonius's list
description: A list given by Priest Adonius: 20 spider ichor and 20 harpy's down.

name: Andariel Scripture Copy
description: A copy of Andariel's book given by Priest Adonius. Take this back to Arkenia.

name: Stardust
description: The silver dust received from Arkenia of the Dark Elves. Take this back to Thalia.

name: Isael's Instructions
description: A document containing Isael Silvershadow's instructions. It asks you to recover 6 pieces of talins spear from Leto lizardman shamans.

name: Isael's Letter
description: A letter given by Isael Silvershadow. Take this back to Thalia along with Talin's spear.

name: Grail of Purity
description: A grail crafted of pure mithril. Catch the tears of the unicorn with the grail and take it back to Thalia.

name: Tears of Unicorn
description: The tears shed by Eva's unicorn when it is killed with Talin's spear. Take this back to Thalia.

name: Water of Life
description: The holy water that contains the powers of life to rejuvenate the Mother Tree. Take this and go to Hierarch Asterios.

name: Pure Mithril Ore
description: The ore of pure mithril. Gather 10 of these, along with the rest of the ingredients, and take them back to Blacksmith Pushkin.

name: Ant Soldier Acid
description: The acid collected from ant soldiers after slaying them. Gather 20 bottles of this, along with the rest of the ingredients, and take them back to Blacksmith Pushkin.

name: Wyrm's Talon
description: The talon of a Wyrm obtained after slaying it. Gather 20 of these, along with the rest of the ingredients, and take them back to Blacksmith Pushkin.

name: Spider Ichor
description: The ichor of a marsh spider. Gather 20 units of this and take them back to Priest Adonius.

name: Harpy's Down
description: The down feathers obtained after slaying a harpy. Gather 20 of these and take them back to Priest Adonius.

name: Talin's Spear Blade
description: The blade portion of Talin's spear. Take this, along with the remaining portions of the spear, back to Isael Silvershadow.

name: Talin's Spear Shaft
description: The shaft portion of Talin's spear. Take this, along with the remaining portions of the spear, back to Isael Silvershadow.

name: Talin's Ruby
description: A decorative jewel that adorned Talin's spear. Take this, along with the remaining portions of the spear, back to Isael Silvershadow.

name: Talin's Aquamarine
description: A decorative jewel that adorned Talin's spear. Take this, along with the remaining portions of the spear, back to Isael Silvershadow.

name: Talin's Amethyst
description: A decorative jewel that adorned Talin's spear. Take this, along with the remaining portions of the spear, back to Isael Silvershadow.

name: Talin's Peridot
description: A decorative jewel that adorned Talin's spear. Take this, along with the remaining portions of the spear, back to Isael Silvershadow.

name: Mark of Fate
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Testimony of Fate. An item for occupational change.

name: Kaira's Letter
description: A letter sent by Magister Kaira to Brother Metheus of the Temple of Einhasad. This must be delivered secretly.

name: Metheus's Funeral Jar
description: A jar for storing the remains of the dead. Take this to the Execution Grounds and search for the remains of Metheus's sister.

name: Kasandra's Remains
description: The remains of Kasandra, Metheus's sister. Take this back to Brother Metheus.

name: Herbalism Textbook
description: A textbook of various herbs and their usages. It also contains information about the deadly poison belladonna.

name: Ixia's List
description: 10 units each of medusa's blood, marsh spider fluids, dead seeker's dung, tyrant's blood and nightshade root.

name: Medusa's Ichor
description: The bottled blood of a medusa. Collect 10 of these and take them back to Master Ixia

name: Marsh Spider's Fluids
description: The bottled fluids of a marsh spider. Collect 10 of these and take them back to Master Ixia.

name: Dead Seeker Dung
description: The dung of dead seeker bats. Collect 10 of these and take them back to Master Ixia.

name: Tyrant's Blood
description: The bottled blood of tyrant. Collect 10 of these and take them back to Master Ixia.

name: Nightshade Root
description: The roots of the rare nightshade herb. Collect 10 of these and take them back to Master Ixia.

name: Belladonna
description: A legendary poison that can kill a bull with a single drop. Take this to Brother Metheus.

name: Alder's Skull
description: The skull of Alders, who drafted the copy of Kaysha's Revelations. Take this to Magister Kaira.

name: Alders Skull
description: Skull of Priest Alders. Take it to Magister Roa, a distant descendant of the priest.

name: Alder's Receipt
description: The receipt for the item that Alder entrusted to the warehouse. Take this and go to the warehouse in the Village of Gludin.

name: Revelations Manuscript
description: A copy of Kaysha's Revelations. Take this to Magister Kaira.

name: Kaira's Instructions
description: A note where Magister Kaira's instructions are written. The instructions are to come back after reaching level 38.

name: Kaira's Recommendation
description: A recommendation letter written by Magister Kaira. Take this and go to Tetrarch Thifiell of the Dark Elven Village.

name: Palus Charm
description: A charm given by Tetrarch Thifiell to keep in possession until the Initiation Ceremony of the Shillien Circle is complete.

name: Thifiell's Letter
description: A letter from Tetrarch Thifiell to Arkenia. Arkenia is at the Dark Elven Initiation Altar.

name: Arkenia's Note
description: A note written by Arkenia. It contains instructions to bring back red fairy dust and blight treant sap.

name: Pixy Garnet
description: A garnet given by the Bloody Pixy as a token of promise. Bring one skull each of four different races.

name: Grandis' Skull
description: The skull of Grandis. Bring this to the Bloody Pixy.

name: Karul Bugbear Skull
description: The skull of Karul Bugbear. Bring this to the Bloody Pixy.

name: Breka Overlord Skull
description: The skull of a Breka Overlord. Bring this to the Bloody Pixy.

name: Leto Overlord Skull
description: The skull of a Leto Lizardman Overlord. Bring this to the Bloody Pixy.

name: Red Fairy Dust
description: Red fairy dust given by the bloody pixy. Take this to Arkenia.

name: Blight Treant Seed
description: A seed given by a blight treant as a mark of promise. Slay the black willow lurker and bring back its leaf.

name: Black Willow Leaf
description: A leaf obtained by slaying the black willow lurker. Take this to the Blight Treant.

name: Blight Treant Sap
description: The sap of a blight treant. Take this to Arkenia.

name: Arkenia's Letter
description: A letter written by Arkenia. It states that the Initiation Ceremony of the Shillien Circle is complete. Take this to Tetrarch Thifiell.

name: Mark of Glory
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Testimony of Glory. An item for occupational change.

name: Vokian's Order
description: Collect and return with 10 manashen shards, 10 tyrant talons and 10 guardian basilisk fangs.

name: Manashen Shard
description: A shard of the broken manashen. Collect 10 and take them back to Prefect Vokian.

name: Tyrant Talon
description: The talons plucked from a slain Tyrant. Collect 10 and take them back to Prefect Vokian.

name: Guardian Basilisk Fang
description: The fangs of a slain guardian basilisk. Collect 10 and take them back to Prefect Vokian.

name: Vokian's Order
description: Prefect Vokian's orders. The instructions are to go and seek out the Gandi Chief Chianta in the Town of Dion.

name: Necklace of Authority
description: A symbol given to those representing Pa'agrio Lord Kakai.

name: Chianta's 1st Order
description: Orders of Gandi Chief Chianta. The instructions are to go and recover the flame scepter from the lower orc tribes.

name: Scepter of Breka
description: Scepter of flame which can be obtained from a Breka orc chief. Take it along with 4 other tribes' scepters and go see Gandi Chief Chianta.

name: Scepter of Enku
description: The flame scepter received from the Enku orc chief. Take this, along with the remaining 4 scepters, to Gandi Chief Chianta.

name: Scepter of Vuku
description: The flame scepter received from the Vuku orc chief. Take this, along with the remaining 4 scepters, to Gandi Chief Chianta.

name: Scepter of Turek
description: The flame scepter received from the Turek orc chief. Take this, along with the remaining 4 scepters, to Gandi Chief Chianta.

name: Scepter of Tunath
description: The flame scepter received from the Lennunt orc chief. Take this, along with the remaining 4 scepters, to Gandi Chief Chianta.

name: Chianta's 2nd Order
description: Gandi Chief Chianta's orders. The instructions are to come back for further orders after reaching level 38.

name: Chianta's 3rd Order
description: Gandi Chief Chianta's orders. The instructions are to bring back 20 each of Timak and Tamlin orc heads.

name: Tamlin Orc Skull
description: The head of a Tamlin orc cut off after being slain. Collect 20 of these and take them to Gandi Chief Chianta.

name: Timak Orc Head
description: The head of a Timak orc, cut off after being slain. Collect 20 of these and take them to Gandi Chief Chianta.

name: Scepter Box
description: A box containing the 5 flame scepters recovered from the lesser orc tribes. Take this to Seer Tanapi of the Orc Village.

name: Pashika's Head
description: Kill Pashika, son of Voltar, cut his head off and show it to Breka Chief Voltar.

name: Vultus' Head
description: Kill Vultus, son of Voltar, cut his head off and show it to Breka Chief Voltar.

name: Glove of Voltar
description: Glove that was thrown out by Breka Chief Voltar. Slay Pashika and Vultus, sons of Voltar.

name: Enku Overlord Head
description: The head of an Enku overlord, cut off after being slain. Show this to Enku Chief Kepra.

name: Glove of Kepra
description: The glove thrown down by Enku Chief Kepra. Go and slay the Enku overlords.

name: Makum Bugbear Head
description: The head of a Makum bugbear warrior, cut off after being slain. Show this to Turek Chief Burai.

name: Glove of Burai
description: The glove thrown down by Turek Chief Burai. Go and slay the Makum bugbear warriors.

name: Manakia's 1st Letter
description: Letter of Seer Manakia. Take it to Breka orc chief.

name: Manakia's 2nd Letter
description: Seer Manakia's letter. Take this and go to the Enku Orc Chief.

name: Kasman's 1st Letter
description: Prefect Kasman's letter. Take this and go to the Vuku Orc Chief.

name: Kasman's 2nd Letter
description: Prefect Kasman's letter. Take this and go to the Turek Orc Chief.

name: Kasman's 3rd Letter
description: Prefect Kasman's letter. Take this and go to the Lennunt Orc Chief.

name: Driko's Contract
description: Vuku Chief Driko's contract. The contract contains instructions to hunt the marsh stakato drones in the Cruma Marshlands.

name: Stakato Drone Husk
description: The husks of a marsh stakato drone. Collect 30 of these and take them to Vuku Chief Driko.

name: Tanapi's Order
description: Seer Tanapi's orders. Hunt the Ragna Orc Chief and seers and recover the scepter of Tantosc.

name: Scepter of Tantos
description: The flame scepter of the now-perished Tantos tribe. Take this to Seer Tanapi.

name: Ritual Box
description: A box containing the scepters recovered from the Orcs of the Tantos tribe. Take this to Pa'agrio Lord Kakai.

name: Mark of Prosperity
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Testimony of Prosperity. An occupation change related item.

name: 1st Ring of Testimony
description: A ring given to those Dwarves attempting the Testimony of Prosperity. Find the 4 proofs of prosperity.

name: 2nd Ring of Testimony
description: A ring given to those Dwarves attempting the Testimony of Prosperity. Find Maphr's tablet, which contains the ultimate secrets of geometry.

name: Old Account Book
description: Iron Gate Lockirin's account book. The proof of wealth. Take this to Warehouse Keeper Parman of Town of Giran.

name: Blessed Seed
description: A seed containing the blessings of Maphr. The proof of fertile lands. Take this to Warehouse Keeper Parman of Town of Giran.

name: Emily's Recipe
description: A recipe good for childbirth and childbirth recovery. The proof of fertility. Take this to Warehouse Keeper Parman of Town of Giran.

name: Lilith's Elven Wafer
description: Food regarded as the secret to the Elves' longevity. The proof of health. Take this to Warehouse Keeper Parman of Town of Giran.

name: Maphr Tablet Fragment
description: A fragment of Maphr's tablet, which contains the ultimate secrets of geometry. Take this to Warehouse Keeper Parman of Town of Giran.

name: Collection License
description: A license that allows the bearer to collect guild contributions. Seek out those who still owe contributions and collect the funds from them.

name: Lockirin's 1st Notice
description: A notice that guild contributions are due. Take this to Golden Wheel's Spiron.

name: Lockirin's 2nd Notice
description: A notice that guild contributions are due. Take this to Silver Scale's Balanki.

name: Lockirin's 3rd Notice
description: A notice that guild contributions are due. Take this to Bronze Key's Keef.

name: Lockirin's 4th Notice
description: A notice that guild contributions are due. Take this to Filaur of the Gray Pillar.

name: Lockirin's 5th Notice
description: A notice that guild contributions are due. Take this to Black Anvil's Arin.

name: Contribution of Shari
description: Trader Shari's guild contribution. Take this to Golden Wheel's Spiron.

name: Contribution of Mion
description: Trader Mion's guild contribution. Take this to Silver Scale's Balanki.

name: Contribution of Maryse
description: Maryse Redbonnet's guild contribution. Take this to Silver Scale's Balanki.

name: Maryse's Request
description: Note containing Maryse Redbonnet's request that you bring back 10 leather hides for use in crafting items.

name: Contribution of Toma
description: Master Toma's guild contribution. Take this to Black Anvil's Arin.

name: Receipt of Bolter
description: Miner Bolter's contribution receipt. Take this to Black Anvil's Arin to confirm if Miner Bolter has already submitted his contribution.

name: 1st Receipt of Contribution
description: The contribution receipt received from Golden Wheel's Spiron. Collect 5 receipts and take them to Lockirin of the Iron Gate.

name: 2nd Receipt of Contribution
description: The contribution receipt received from Silver Scale's Balanki. Collect 5 receipts and take them to Lockirin of the Iron Gate.

name: 3rd Receipt of Contribution
description: The contribution receipt received from Bronze Key's Keef. Collect 5 receipts and take them to Lockirin of the Iron Gate.

name: 4th Receipt of Contribution
description: A contribution receipt received from Filaur of the Gray Pillar. Collect 5 receipts and take them to Lockirin of the Iron Gate.

name: 5th Receipt of Contribution
description: The contribution receipt received from Black Anvil's Arin. Collect 5 receipts and take them to Lockirin of the Iron Gate.

name: Procuration of Torocco
description: The bearer of this procuration hereby agrees to make contributions on behalf of Torocco. Take this to Bronze Key's Keef.

name: Bright's List
description: A list of ingredients that Guard Bright has written. "20 mandragora petals, 10 bunches of crimson moss"

name: Mandragora Petal
description: The petals of a mandragora flower. Collect 20 of these and take them to Guard Bright.

name: Crimson Moss
description: Crimson Moss obtained from giant red ants. Collect 10 of these and take them to Guard Bright.

name: Mandragora Bouquet
description: A flower bouquet made of mandragora petals and crimson moss. Take this to Emily in the Town of Dion.

name: Parman's Instructions
description: A note containing Warehouse Keeper Parman's instructions. The instructions are to come back after reaching level 38.

name: Parman's Letter
description: Warehouse Keeper Parman's letter. Take this to Maestro Nikola of the Cruma Tower.

name: Clay Dough
description: A piece of clay that Maestro Nikola has given. Use this to make a copy of the keyhole from the titan's box.

name: Pattern of Keyhole
description: The keyhole pattern made from clay dough. Take this to Maestro Nikola.

name: Nikola's List
description: 20 stakato shells, 10 toad lord sacs, 10 spider thorns and 10 D-grade crystals.

name: Stakato Shell
description: The shell of a marsh stakato. A key ingredient in making the titan's key.

name: Toad Lord Sac
description: The Giant Spider's Poison Sac removed from the neck of a toad lord. A key ingredient in making the titan's key.

name: Marsh Spider's Thorn
description: A thorn removed from the shell of a Marsh Spider. A key ingredient in making the Titan's Key.

name: Mark of Champion
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Test of the Champion. An item for occupational change.

name: Ascalon's 1st Letter
description: Veteran Ascalon's letter. Take this to Mason in the Town of Dion.

name: Mason's Letter
description: A letter from Mason to Veteran Ascalon of Town of Giran.

name: Iron Rose Ring
description: A ring given by Mason. The ring is engraved with the symbol of the iron rose. Complete the revenge in place of Mason.

name: Ascalon's 2nd Letter
description: Veteran Ascalon's letter. Take this to Trader Groot of Town of Giran.

name: White Rose Insignia
description: An insignia given by Trader Groot. It was formerly worn by the medics of the iron rose. Aid Trader Groot in his material gathering.

name: Groot's Letter
description: A letter from Trader Groot to Veteran Ascalon in Town of Giran.

name: Ascalon's 3rd Letter
description: Veteran Ascalon's letter. Take this to Captain Mouen of the Town of Oren.

name: Mouen's 1st Order
description: Cut off and bring back the heads of 100 road scavengers or road collectors.

name: Mouen's 2nd Order
description: Destroy the Leto lizardmen and bring back 100 of their fangs.

name: Mouen's Letter
description: A letter from Captain Mouen to Veteran Ascalon of Town of Giran.

name: Harpy's Egg
description: An egg obtained after slaying a harpy. Collect 30 of these and take them to Trader Groot of Town of Giran.

name: Medusa's Venom
description: The venom obtained after slaying a medusa. Collect 30 of these and take them to Trader Groot of Town of Giran.

name: Windsus Bile
description: The bile obtained after slaying a Windsus. Collect 30 of these and take them to Trader Groot of Town of Giran.

name: Bloody Axe Head
description: The head of a Bloody Axe Elite. Collect 10 of these and return to Mason in the Town of Dion.

name: Road Ratman Head
description: The severed head of a road scavenger or road collector. Collect 10 of them and take them to Captain Mouen.

name: Leto Lizardman Fang
description: A fang from a slain Leto lizardman. Collect 10 of these and take them to Captain Mouen.

name: Mark of Sagittarius
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Test of the Sagittarius. An occupation change related item.

name: Bernard's Introduction
description: Take this letter and go to Sagittarius Hamil of the Village of Floran.

name: Hamil's 1st Letter
description: Take this letter and meet with Sir Aron Tanford of the Southern Wastelands.

name: Hamil's 2nd Letter
description: Take this letter and go to Prefect Vokian of Town of Giran.

name: Hamil's 3rd Letter
description: Take this letter and go to Gauen of the Ivory Tower.

name: Hunter's 1st Rune
description: A stone engraved with a hunter's rune. Collect 10 of these and take them to Hamil of the Village of Floran.

name: Hunter's 2nd Rune
description: A rune obtained from Breka orc overlords or Shamans. Collect 10 of these and take them, along with the snake talisman, to Prefect Vokian.

name: Talisman of Kadesh
description: A strange talisman obtained after slaying Kadesh. Take this to Sagittarius Hamil of the Village of Floran.

name: Talisman of Snake
description: Talisman that is related to a serpent totem spirit worshipped by Breka orcs. Take it to Prefect Vokian of Town of Giran.

name: Mithril Clip
description: A key ingredient in restoring the Crescent Bow. Take this, along with the rest of the ingredients, to Magister Gauen of the Ivory Tower.

name: Stakato Chitin
description: A key ingredient in restoring the Crescent Bow. Take this, along with the rest of the ingredients, to Magister Gauen of the Ivory Tower.

name: Reinforced Bowstring
description: A key ingredient in restoring the Crescent Bow. Take this, along with the rest of the ingredients, to Magister Gauen of the Ivory Tower.

name: Manashen's Horn
description: A key ingredient in restoring the Crescent Bow. Take this, along with the rest of the ingredients, to Magister Gauen of the Ivory Tower.

name: Blood of Lizardman
description: The blood shed by Leto Lizardmen. Kadesh appears when enough of this is gathered.

name: Mark of Witchcraft
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Test of Witchcraft. An occupation change related item.

name: Orim's Diagram
description: A diagram of relics, given by Orim of the Shadow. The 6 jewels needed for opening the Cube of Aklantoth are depicted here.

name: Alexandria's Book
description: A book that contains records on who purchased Aklantoth's Gems. "Magister Iker, Magister Kaira, Trader Lara"

name: Iker's List
description: Collect and bring back 20 dire Wyrm fangs, 20 Leto lizardman charms, and 20 enchanted stone golem heartstones.

name: Dire Wyrm Fang
description: The fangs of a slain Dire Wyrm. Collect 20 of these and take them to Magister Iker.

name: Leto Lizardman Charm
description: A totem obtained after slaying the Leto Lizardman. Collect 20 of these and take them to Magister Iker.

name: Enchanted Stone Golem Heartstone
description: A crystal found amongst the shattered fragments of an enchanted stone golem. Collect 20 of these and take them to Magister Iker.

name: Lara's Memo
description: Trader Lara's sales records. It is recorded that a man named Ismel bought the jewel from Lara.

name: Nestle's Memo
description: Trader Lara's purchase records. It is recorded that Leopold of the Black Lion brought the jewel.

name: Leopold's Journal
description: A portion of Leopold's Diary. It is recorded that 3 deserters died and became undead while escaping to the Wastelands.

name: Aklantoth 1st Gem
description: Gem that can be obtained from Magister Iker. Find all 6 of Aklantoth gems and take them to Orim the Shadow.

name: Aklantoth 2nd Gem
description: The gem given by Magister Kaira. Find all 6 of Aklantoth gems and take them to Orim the Shadow.

name: Aklantoth 3rd Gem
description: The gem that can be obtained by killing a nameless revenant. Find all 6 of Aklantoth gems and take them to Orim the Shadow.

name: Aklantoth 4th Gem
description: The gem that can be obtained by slaying a skeletal mercenary. Find all 6 of Aklantoth gems and take them to Orim the Shadow.

name: Aklantoth 5th Gem
description: The gem that can be obtained by slaying a skeletal mercenary. Find all 6 of Aklantoth gems and take them to Orim the Shadow.

name: Aklantoth 6th Gem
description: The gem that can be obtained by slaying a skeletal mercenary. Find all 6 of Aklantoth gems and take them to Orim the Shadow.

name: 1st Brimstone
description: A mark left behind by the Drevanul Prince Zeruel when escaping from his binds.

name: Orim's Instructions
description: A set of instructions written by Orim of the Shadow. The instructions are to bring back the Sword of Binding and Soul Trap Crystal.

name: Orim's 1st Letter
description: A letter from Orim of the Shadow to Sir Karol Vasper of the Town of Gludin. The letter asks for the loan of the Sword of the Seal.

name: Orim's 2nd Letter
description: A letter from Orim of the Shadows to Magister Iker of Town of Giran. The letter asks for the loan of the Soul-trap Crystal.

name: Sir Vasper's Letter
description: A letter from Sir Klaus Vasper to Vadin of the Town of Oren. The letter gives permission for the use of the Sword of Binding.

name: Vadin's Crucifix
description: A holy crucifix of the order, given by Vadin. Take this and go hunt Tamlin Orcs.

name: Tamlin Orc Amulet
description: Amulets that the Tamlin Orcs carry for sorcery purposes. Gather 20 of these and take them to Vadin.

name: Vadin's Sanctions
description: A sanctions letter from Vadin allowing for the use of the Sword of Binding. Take this to Sir Klaus Vasper of the Town of Gludin.

name: Iker's Amulet
description: An amulet given by Magister Iker. It is said to have powers of protection against evil...

name: Soultrap Crystal
description: A crystal with the power to trap and seal the soul of a monster. Use this to seal the spirit of the Drevanul Zeruel.

name: Purgatory Key
description: A key needed to close Aklantoth's Chest. Take this to Orim of the Shadow.

name: Zeruel Bind Crystal
description: A crystal that contains the trapped soul of the Drevanul Zeruel. Take this to Orim of the Shadow.

name: 2nd Brimstone
description: A mark left behind by the Drevanul Prince Zeruel while escaping from the body of Fisher Evert.

name: Mark of Summoner
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Test of the Summoner. An occupation change related item.

name: Leto Lizardman Amulet
description: An amulet obtained after slaying a Leto Lizardman. Gather 30 of these and take them back to Trader Lara.

name: Sac of Redspores
description: Red spores obtained from the bodies of the giant fungus. Gather 30 of these and take them back to Trader Lara.

name: Karul Bugbear Totem
description: A totem obtained after slaying the Karul Bugbear. Gather 30 of these and take them back to Trader Lara.

name: Shards of Manashen
description: A shard of the shattered Manashen. Gather 30 of these and take them back to Trader Lara.

name: Breka Orc Totem
description: A totem that can be obtained after slaying a Breka orc. Collect 30 of them and take them to Trader Lara.

name: Crimson Bloodstone
description: A spirit stone embedded in the body of a fettered soul. Gather 30 of these and take them back to Trader Lara.

name: Talons of Tyrant
description: The talon of a slain tyrant. Gather 30 of these and take them back to Trader Lara.

name: Wings of Droneant
description: Wings obtained after slaying Noble Ants at the Ant's Nest. Gather 30 of these and take them back to Trader Lara.

name: Tusk of Windsus
description: The tusks of a slain Windsus. Gather 30 of these and take them back to Trader Lara.

name: Fangs of Wyrm
description: The fangs of a slain Wyrm. Gather 30 of these and take them back to Trader Lara.

name: Lara's 1st List
description: Collect 30 Leto lizardman amulets from the Plains of the Lizardmen and 30 units of red spore dust from the giant fungus in the Sea of Spores.

name: Lara's 2nd List
description: Collect 30 Karul bugbear totems from Hunters Valley and 30 shards of manashen from the Crater of the Ivory Tower.

name: Lara's 3rd List
description: Collect 30 Breka orc totems from Breka's Stronghold and 30 crimson bloodstones of fettered soul from Death Pass.

name: Lara's 4th List
description: Collect 30 Tyrant Talons from the Wastelands and 30 Windsus Tusks from Death Pass.

name: Lara's 5th List
description: Collect 30 noble ant wings from the Ant Nest and 30 Wyrm fangs from Gorgon's Flower Garden.

name: Galatea's Letter
description: A letter from Head Summoner Galatea to Trader Lara in the Town of Dion.

name: Beginner's Arcana
description: An Arcana card used by apprentice Summoners. You must have this in order to participate in Summoner battles.

name: Almors's Arcana
description: Summoner Almors's Arcana. The proof of victory from a battle. Take this to Head Summoner Galatea.

name: Camoniell's Arcana
description: Summoner Camoniell's. The proof of victory from a battle. Take this to Head Summoner Galatea.

name: Belthus's Arcana
description: Summoner Belthus's Arcana. The proof of victory from a battle. Take this to Head Summoner Galatea.

name: Basillia's Arcana
description: Summoner Basillia's Arcana. The proof of victory from a battle. Take this to Head Summoner Galatea.

name: Celestiel's Arcana
description: Summoner Celestiel's Arcana. The proof of victory from a battle. Take this to Head Summoner Galatea.

name: Brynthea's Arcana
description: Summoner Brynthea's Arcana. The proof of victory from a battle. Take this to Head Summoner Galatea.

name: 1st Crystal of Starting
description: An indication that a Summoner battle has begun.

name: 1st Crystal of Inprogress
description: An indication that a Summoner battle is in progress.

name: 1st Crystal of Foul
description: An indication that foul play was involved in a Summoner battle. Take this to Summoner Almors.

name: 1st Crystal of Defeat
description: An indication that the Summoner has been defeated in battle. Take this to Summoner Almors.

name: 1st Crystal of Victory
description: An indication that the Summoner has been victorious in a battle. Take this to Summoner Almors.

name: 2nd Crystal of Starting
description: An indication that a Summoner battle has begun.

name: 2nd Crystal of Inprogress
description: An indication that a Summoner battle is in progress.

name: 2nd Crystal of Foul
description: An indication that foul play was involved in a Summoner battle. Take this to Summoner Camoniell.

name: 2nd Crystal of Defeat
description: An indication that the Summoner has been defeated in a battle. Take this to Summoner Camoniell.

name: 2nd Crystal of Victory
description: An indication that the Summoner has been victorious in a battle. Take this to Summoner Camoniell.

name: 3rd Crystal of Starting
description: An indication that a Summoner battle has begun.

name: 3rd Crystal of Inprogress
description: An indication that a Summoner battle is in progress.

name: 3rd Crystal of Foul
description: An indication that foul play was involved in a summoner battle. Take this to Summoner Belthus.

name: 3rd Crystal of Defeat
description: An indication that the Summoner has been defeated in a battle. Take this to Summoner Belthus.

name: 3rd Crystal of Victory
description: An indication that the Summoner has been victorious in a battle. Take this to Summoner Belthus.

name: 4th Crystal of Starting
description: An indication that a Summoner battle has begun.

name: 4th Crystal of Inprogress
description: An indication that a Summoner battle is in progress.

name: 4th Crystal of Foul
description: An indication that foul play was involved in a Summoner battle. Take this to Summoner Basillia.

name: 4th Crystal of Defeat
description: An indication that the Summoner has been defeated in a battle. Take this to Summoner Basillia.

name: 4th Crystal of Victory
description: An indication that the Summoner has been victorious in a battle. Take this to Summoner Basillia.

name: 5th Crystal of Starting
description: An indication that a Summoner battle has begun.

name: 5th Crystal of Inprogress
description: An indication that a Summoner battle is in progress.

name: 5th Crystal of Foul
description: An indication that foul play was involved in a Summoner battle. Take this to Summoner Celestiel.

name: 5th Crystal of Defeat
description: An indication that the Summoner has been defeated in a battle. Take this to Summoner Celestiel.

name: 5th Crystal of Victory
description: An indication that the Summoner has been victorious in a battle. Take this to Summoner Celestiel.

name: 6th Crystal of Starting
description: An indication that a Summoner battle has begun.

name: 6th Crystal of Inprogress
description: An indication that a Summoner battle is in progress.

name: 6th Crystal of Foul
description: An indication that foul play was involved in a Summoner battle. Take this to Summoner Brynthea.

name: 6th Crystal of Defeat
description: An indication that the Summoner has been defeated in a Summoner battle. Take this to Summoner Brynthea.

name: 6th Crystal of Victory
description: An indication that the Summoner has been victorious in a Summoner battle. Take this to Summoner Brynthea.

name: Mark of Lord
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Test of the Lord. An item for occupational change.

name: Ordeal Necklace
description: A necklace given to those who are attempting the Test of the Lord. Go seek 5 Chiefs of different tribes and return with their approvals.

name: Varkee's Charm
description: The Atuba chief Varkee's charm. Go back to him after completing this task.

name: Tantus's Charm
description: The Neruga chief Tantus's charm. Go back to him after completing this task.

name: Hatos's Charm
description: The Urutu Chief Hatos's charm. Go back to him after completing this task.

name: Takuna's Charm
description: The Duda-Mara Chief Takuna's charm. Go back to him after completing this task.

name: Chianta's Charm
description: Gandi Chief Chianta's charm. Go back to him after completing this task.

name: Manakia's Orders
description: A document containing Seer Manakia's orders. It tells you to kill Breka orc shamans and Breka orc overlords and bring back 20 Breka orc fangs.

name: Breka Orc Fang
description: A Breka orc's fang. Collect 20 of them and take them to Seer Manakia.

name: Manakia's Amulet
description: A mark received after passing Manakia's test. Take this to Atuba Chief Varkees.

name: Huge Orc Fang
description: The totem of the Atuba tribe. Gather the totems of the 5 tribes and take them to Pa'agrio Lord Kakai.

name: Sumari's Letter
description: A letter from Blacksmith Sumari to Seer Somak in the Town of Dion.

name: Urutu Blade
description: A blade crafted by Blacksmith Sumari. Take this to Urutu Chief Hatos.

name: Timak Orc Skull
description: The skull of a slain Timak Orc. Gather 10 of these and take them to Urutu chief Hatos.

name: Sword Into Skull
description: The totem of the Urutu tribe. Gather the totems of the 5 tribes and take them to Pa'agrio Lord Kakai.

name: Neruga Axe Blade
description: The blade portion of a ceremonial axe. Take this to Neruga Chief Tantus.

name: Axe of Ceremony
description: The totem of the Neruga tribe. Gather the totems of the 5 tribes and take them to Pa'agrio Lord Kakai.

name: Marsh Spider's Feeler
description: A key ingredient in making the Duda-Mara tribe totem. Gather 10 of these and take them to Duda-Mara Chief Takuna.

name: Marsh Spider's Feet
description: A key ingredient in making the Duda-Mara tribe totem. Gather 10 of these and take them to Duda-Mara Chief Takuna.

name: Handiwork Spider Brooch
description: The totem of the Duda-Mara tribe. Gather the totems of the 5 tribes and take them to Pa'agrio Lord Kakai.

name: Enchanted Monster Cornea
description: A key ingredient in making the Gandi tribe totem. Gather 20 of these and take them to Gandi Chief Chianta.

name: Monster Eye Woodcarving
description: The totem of the Gandi tribe. Gather the totems of the 5 tribes and take them to Pa'agrio Lord Kakai.

name: Bear Fang Necklace
description: The totem of the Hestui tribe. Take this and go to the Ancestor Martankus in the Cave of Trials.

name: Martankus's Charm
description: The talisman of the Ancestor Martankus. Go back to him after completing this task.

name: Ragna Orc Head
description: The head of a slain Ragna Orc. Take this to the Ancestor Martankus.

name: Ragna Chief Notice
description: He who destroys the Lord of Flame shall be appointed Chief. Take this to the ancestral spirit Martankus.

name: Immortal Flame
description: The mark received after passing the Ancestor Martankus' test. Take this to Pa'agrio Lord Kakai.

name: Animal Lover's List
description: Go and seek Gatekeeper Bella in the Town of Gludio, Guard Metty in the Town of Dion, and Accessory Jeweler Ellie in the Town of Giran.

name: Animal Slayer's 1st List
description: Destroy the animal slayers of Talking Island: giant spiders, talon spiders, and bladers.

name: Animal Slayer's 2nd List
description: Destroy the animal slayers of the Elven Forest: crimson spiders, hook spiders, and the pincer spiders.

name: Animal Slayer's 3rd List
description: Destroy the animal slayers of the Dark Elven Forest: lesser dark horrors, dark horrors, and prowlers.

name: Animal Slayer's 4th List
description: Destroy the animal slayers of the Indomitable Plateau: kasha spiders, kasha poker spiders, and kasha blade spiders.

name: Animal Slayer's 5th List
description: Destroy the animal slayers of the Spine Mountains Mining Zone: hunter tarantulas and plunder tarantulas.

name: Bloody Fang
description: A fang dripping with animal blood. Collect 50 of these and take them to Martin, the Pet Manager of the Town of Gludin.

name: Bloody Claw
description: A claw dripping with animal blood. Collect 50 of these and take them to Martin, the Pet Manager of the Town of Gludin.

name: Bloody Nail
description: A nail dripping with animal blood. Collect 50 of these and take them to Martin, the Pet Manager of the Town of Gludin.

name: Bloody Kasha Fang
description: A fang of a kasha dripping with animal blood. Collect 50 of these and take them to Martin, the Pet Manager of the Town of Gludin.

name: Bloody Tarantula Nail
description: A nail of a tarantula dripping with animal blood. Collect 50 of these and take them to Martin, the Pet Manager of the Town of Gludin.

name: Crystal Brooch
description: A brooch received from Warehouse Keeper Wilford. Present this to Lilith of the temple at the Village of Talking Island.

name: Spellbook: Greater Heal
description: Spellbook needed to learn Greater Heal. Used by Bishops, Elders, and Shillien Elders.\\nRequired level: Bishop- 40, Elder, Shillien Elder 48

name: Spellbook: Greater Battle Heal
description: Amulet required for the Greater Battle Heal spell. Used by Bishops.\\nRequired level: 40

name: Spellbook: Greater Group Heal
description: Spellbook needed to learn Greater Group Heal. Used by Bishops, Shillien Elders, and Elders.\\nRequired level: Bishop: 40, Shillien Elder and Elder: 48

name: Spellbook: Remedy
description: Amulet required for the Remedy spell. Used by Paladins.\\nRequired level: 40

name: Cargo Box
description: Freight box on which the mark of Aden Commercial Guild is stamped.

name: Cargo Box
description: Freight box on which the mark of Aden Commercial Guild is stamped.

name: Cargo Box
description: Freight box on which the mark of Aden Commercial Guild is stamped.

name: Cargo Box
description: Freight box on which the mark of Aden Commercial Guild is stamped.

name: Gludio Apples
description: Apple cultivated in the Gludio region. Can be sold at shops.

name: Dion Corn Meal
description: Powder made from corn cultivated in Dion. Can be sold at shops.

name: Dire Wolf Pelts
description: Tanned Dire Wolf pelts. Can be sold at shops.

name: Moonstone
description: Jewel of blue and white light called Moonjang Stone or Moonstone. Can be sold at shops.

name: Gludio Wheat Flour
description: Powder made from wheat cultivated in the Gludio region. Can be sold at shops.

name: Spidersilk Rope
description: Strong rope made of weaving tarantula spider silk. Can be sold at shops.

name: Alexandrite
description: Precious jewel that shines green in the sunlight and red in the moonlight. Can be sold at shops.

name: Silver Tea Service
description: High-quality teacup and dish set crafted of silver. Can be sold at shops.

name: Mechanic Golem Spare Parts
description: A component of mechanic golems. Useless for anything else, it is best sold.

name: Fire Emerald
description: Precious jewel that shines with an intense red light. Can be sold at shops.

name: Avellan Silk Frock
description: High-quality silk dress imported from Avellan of the east. Can be sold at shops.

name: Feriotic Porcelain Urn
description: As a water cup made for their rituals, it is a relic of the ancient Ferios empire. Can be sold at shops.

name: Imperial Diamond
description: Jewel of brilliant light used in decorating the crown of the Elmoreden emperor. Can be sold at shops.

name: Statue of Shilen - Head
description: Part of a broken statue. Can be sold at shops. If you collect the remaining pieces of the statue...?

name: Statue of Shilen - Torso
description: Part of a broken statue. Can be sold at shops. If you collect the remaining pieces of the statue...?

name: Statue of Shilen - Arm
description: Part of a broken statue. Can be sold at shops. If you collect the remaining pieces of the statue...?

name: Statue of Shilen - Leg
description: Part of a broken statue. Can be sold at shops. If you collect the remaining pieces of the statue...?

name: Complete Statue of Shilen
description: Statue of Shilen made in the time of the ancient Elmoreden empire. Can be sold at shops for a high price.

name: Fragment of Ancient Tablet: 1st Piece
description: Fragment of ancient clay tablet. If you collect the remaining pieces of the tablet...?

name: Fragment of Ancient Tablet: 2nd Piece
description: Fragment of ancient clay tablet. If you collect the remaining pieces of the tablet...?

name: Fragment of Ancient Tablet: 3rd Piece
description: Fragment of ancient clay tablet. If you collect the remaining pieces of the tablet...?

name: Fragment of Ancient Tablet: 4th Piece
description: Fragment of ancient clay tablet. If you collect the remaining pieces of the tablet...?

name: Complete Ancient Tablet
description: A large clay tablet upon which ancient texts are engraved. You can sell it to a store at a high price.

name: Wish Potion
description: Magic potion that is said to make wishes come true.

name: Ancient Crown
description: Crown that is full of jewels but is too big to wear on the head. Let's sell it.

name: Certificate of Royalty
description: Certificate of royalty but nobody knows who made it.

name: Gold Bar
description: Heavy lump of pure gold.

name: Fairy Dust
description: Powder that falls from the body of fairy. Is sold at an expensive price at shops.

name: Dragonflute of Wind
description: A flute used to call up a Hatchling of the Wind. It takes away some of the experience points the Pet Master earns.

name: Dragonflute of Star
description: A flute used to call up a Hatchling of Star. It takes away some of the experience points the Pet Master earns.

name: Dragonflute of Twilight
description: A flute used to call up a Hatchling of Twilight. It takes away some of the experience points the Pet Master earns.

name: Deliverymen Decertificate
description: Official certification for making deliveries. Issued by the Iron Gate Guild. Seal of Lockirin of the Iron Gate is affixed.

name: Kirunas Horn
description: Item that Warehouse Chief Gesto entrusted saying to take it to High Prefect Penatus. You must deliver it quickly.

name: Mithril Mold
description: Item that Warehouse Chief Gesto entrusted saying to take it to Blacksmith Rupio. You must deliver it quickly.

name: Bloody Letter
description: Item that Warehouse Chief Gesto entrusted saying to take it to Martin. You must deliver it quickly.

name: Supplies to Alex
description: Supply item. It's really heavy. Let's take it to Alex in Florin Village.

name: Supplies to Endrigo
description: Supply item. It's really heavy. Let's take it to Warden Endrigo at the Execution Grounds.

name: Alex's Coins
description: Return gift given by Alex as expression of thanks for having brought enough of the supply item.

name: Wardens Appreciation
description: Letter of thanks given by Warden Endrigo of the Execution Grounds as expression of thanks for having brought enough of the supplied items.

name: Blackbox to Orim
description: Item that Warehouse Chief Gesto entrusted saying to take it to Orim the Shadow. What could be inside...?

name: Deluxe Windsus Ham
description: Item that Warehouse Chief Gesto entrusted saying to take it to Orim the Shadow. What could be inside...?

name: Heart of Silenos
description: Heart obtained by killing silenos. Item specially ordered by Orim the Shadow.

name: Request Giran
description: Order received from the warehouse of Town of Giran. You can receive the delivery fee by taking this and the receipt confirmation document.

name: Request Gludin
description: Order received from the warehouse of the Town of Gludio. You can receive the delivery fee by taking this and the receipt confirmation document.

name: Request Hunters
description: Order received from the warehouse of Hunter Village. You can receive the delivery fee by taking this and the receipt confirmation document.

name: Delivery Score Red
description: Certificate received each time a delivery is completed successfully. If you collect 50 certificates, you can exchange it for a blue delivery statement.

name: Delivery Score Blue
description: Certificate that you can receive if you successfully complete 50 deliveries. The delivery fee increases by 4% for each certificate.

name: Deliverymen Advanced Certificate Super
description: Certificate of master deliveryman received for having successfully completed 1000 deliveries. 120% delivery fee added!

name: 1st Confirmation Document
description: Confirmation form the person receiving delivery of an item signs. Collect three sheets and take it to Warehouse Chief Gesto.

name: 2nd Confirmation Document
description: Confirmation form the person receiving delivery of an item signs. Collect two sheets and take it to Warehouse Chief Gesto.

name: Delivery Goods 01
description: Scroll to be taken to Magister Baulro of Einhasad Temple on Talking Island.

name: Delivery Goods 02
description: Letter to be taken to Lighthouse Keeper Rockswell of Talking Island.

name: Delivery Goods 03
description: Book to be taken to Marius at the private beach house on the north side of Talking Island.

name: Delivery Goods 04
description: Document to be taken to Matheo at the ruins near the port on Talking Island.

name: Delivery Goods 05
description: Letter to be taken to Sir Collin Windawood in front of the Obelisk of Victory on Talking Island.

name: Delivery Goods 06
description: Shaft to be taken to Orc Guild High Prefect Osborn of Gludin Village.

name: Delivery Goods 07
description: Letter to be taken to Lighthouse Keeper Perrin at the wharf in Gludin Village.

name: Delivery Goods 08
description: Picture to be taken to Wharf Manager Clancy of Gludin Village.

name: Delivery Goods 09

name: Delivery Goods 21

name: Delivery Goods 22

name: Delivery Goods 24
description: Statue to be taken to Sir Kiel Nighthawk in the Town of Dion.

name: Delivery Goods 25

name: Delivery Goods 26
description: Book to be taken to Cardinal Seresin of Einhasad Temple in the Town of Oren.

name: Delivery Goods 27
description: Scroll to be taken to Duda-Mara Chief Takuna near the Orc Guild in the Town of Oren.

name: Delivery Goods 29
description: Fabric to be taken to Guard Makhis in Hunter Village.

name: Delivery Goods 30
description: A jar which should be taken to Elder Cronos in Hunter Village.

name: Delivery Goods 31
description: Diamond to be taken to Grand Magister Scraide of Magic Guild in Hunter Village.

name: Delivery Goods 32
description: Jewelry box to be taken to Grocer Pano in Floran Village.

description: Gold nuggets to be taken to Alex in Floran Village.

description: Shaft to be taken to Militiaman Leirynn in Floran Village.

description: Letter to be taken to Fisherman Evert in Floran Village.

description: Fabric to be taken to Astrologer Creta in Floran Village.

name: Delivery Goods 38
description: Ore to be taken to Rex in the underground shopping area at the Ivory Tower.

name: Delivery Goods 39
description: Medicine bottle to be taken to Uruha near the waterfall in the north of the marshlands in the Dark Elven region.

name: Delivery Goods 40
description: Small boxes to be taken to Sentry Irene in front of the western bridge of the Neutral Zone.

name: Delivery Goods 41
description: Document to be taken to Sentinel Trionell in front of the eastern bridge of the Neutral Zone.

name: Delivery Goods 42
description: Scroll to be taken to Northwind in front of the Underground Fortress in the Elven region.

name: Delivery Goods 43
description: Document to be taken to Thalia on the east side of Iris Lake in the Elven region.

name: Delivery Goods 44
description: Box to be taken to Peter of the Turek orc encampment in the south of the Dark Elven autonomous region.

name: Delivery Goods 45
description: A shaft to be taken to Bodyguard Jax on the coastal road in the Southern Wastelands.

name: Delivery Goods 46
description: Key to be taken to Researcher Lorain near the entrance to Cruma Tower.

name: Delivery Goods 47

name: Eye of Seer
description: Eye obtained from killing a floating eye seer. Item specially ordered by Samed.

name: Pincher Claw
description: Claw obtained from killing pincher spider. Item specially ordered by Blacksmith Pinter.

name: Ol Mahum Uniform
description: Ol Mahum uniform received from Ol Mahum captain and Ol Mahum lord. Item specially ordered by Sir Ortho Lancer.

description: Head of Enku orc champion. Item specially ordered by High Prefect Clogg.

description: Special item obtained by killing ghost fire. Item specially ordered by Sorceress Kaiena.

name: Returned Delivery Goods 30

name: Returned Delivery Goods 33
description: Gold bar being returned by Alex. Let's take this to a nearby shipping service warehouse.

name: Returned Delivery Goods 37
description: Book being returned by Sorceress Kaiena. Let's take this to a nearby shipping service warehouse.

name: Returned Delivery Goods 45
description: Sack being returned by Bodyguard Jax. Let's take this to a nearby shipping service warehouse.

name: Returned Delivery Goods 55
description: Urn being returned by Preacher Sla. Let's take this to a nearby shipping service warehouse.

name: Returned Delivery Goods 60
description: Small boxes being returned by Shaman Varika. Let's take this to a nearby shipping service warehouse.

name: Sophya's 1st Order
description: Order from Chief Mercenary Sophya. Says to destroy the undead at the Execution Grounds.

name: Sophya's 2nd Order
description: Order from Chief Mercenary Sophya. It says to destroy Ol Mahums in the Fortress of Resistance.

name: Sophya's 3rd Order
description: Order from Chief Mercenary Sophya. Says to destroy Delu lizardmen of the southern areas of the Dion and Giran regions.

name: Sophya's 4th Order
description: Order from Chief Mercenary Sophya. Says to destroy marsh stakatos of the Cruma Marshland.

name: Lion's Claw
description: Mark given to the person that achieves distinguished merits in the Black Lion Mercenaries.

name: Lion's Eye
description: Mark given to the person that achieves very distinguished merits in the Black Lion Mercenaries.

name: Guild Coin
description: Commemorative coin given as thanks by the members of the Aden Commercial Guild.

name: Alchemy Text
description: A book that can be obtained from Alchemist Matild. According to the instructions written in the book, go find the secret keeper tree located in the Cruma Marshlands and obtain the secret book.

name: Secret Book of Potion
description: Ancient book received from the guardian trees of the secret. Take this to Alchemist Matild.

name: 1st Potion Recipe
description: Scale of amber basilisk, wind soulstone of whispering wind, glass eye of glass jaguar, blood of Turak bugbear

name: 2nd Potion Recipe
description: Silenos's horn, ant soldier aphid, tyrant's chitin, and horror ectoplasm of horror mist ripper.

name: Matild's Orb
description: Certificate of friendship from Alchemist Matild.

name: Forbidden Love Scroll
description: The secrets of depraved but rapturous love are written. May be sold at a high price to an interested person...

name: Amber Scale
description: Necessary ingredient for making wish potion. Take it with the other ingredients to Alchemist Matild.

name: Wind Soulstone
description: Necessary ingredient for making wish potion. Take it with the other ingredients to Alchemist Matild.

name: Glass Eye
description: Necessary ingredient for making wish potion. Take it with the other ingredients to Alchemist Matild.

name: Horror Ectoplasm
description: Necessary ingredient for making wish potion. Take it with the other ingredients to Alchemist Matild.

name: Silenos Horn
description: Necessary ingredient for making wish potion. Take it with the other ingredients to Alchemist Matild.

name: Ant Soldier Aphid
description: Necessary ingredient for making wish potion. Take it with the other ingredients to Alchemist Matild.

name: Tyrant's Chitin
description: Necessary ingredient for making wish potion. Take it with the other ingredients to Alchemist Matild.

name: Bugbear Blood
description: Necessary ingredient for making wish potion. Take it with the other ingredients to Alchemist Matild.

name: 1st Circle Hunter License
description: Certificate that proves eligibility as a 1st circle hunter. You must have this to be able to carry out orders given by the Hunter Guild.

name: 2nd Circle Hunter License
description: Certificate that proves eligibility as a 2nd circle hunter. You must have this to be able to carry out orders given by the Hunter Guild.

name: Laurel Leaf Pin
description: Mark given to hunters that successfully carry out requests of the guild. The more experienced a hunter is, the more of these he or she has.

name: 1st Test Instructions
description: Instructions of the test for the 1st circle hunter certificate. Says to complete at least three of the six tasks presented by Grey.

name: 2nd Test Instructions
description: Instructions of the test for the 2nd circle hunter certificate. Says to complete at least three of the six tasks presented by Grey.

name: Cybellin's Request
description: Asks you to raise the purity of blood crystal by killing Leto lizardmen or Harit lizardmen with cybellin dagger.

name: Blood Crystal: Purity 1
description: Bloody jewel that contains dreary magical power. Purity 1. The higher the purity of the crystal is, the higher the value.

name: Blood Crystal: Purity 2
description: Bloody jewel that contains dreary magical power. Purity 2. The higher the purity of the crystal is, the higher the value.

name: Blood Crystal: Purity 3
description: Bloody jewel that contains dreary magical power. Purity 3. The higher the purity of the crystal is, the higher the value.

name: Blood Crystal: Purity 4
description: Bloody jewel that contains dreary magical power. Purity 4. The higher the purity of the crystal is, the higher the value.

description: Bloody jewel that contains dreary magical power. Purity 5. The higher the purity of the crystal is, the higher the value.

name: Blood Crystal: Purity 6
description: Bloody jewel that contains dreary magical power. Purity 6. The higher the purity of the crystal is, the higher the value.

name: Blood Crystal: Purity 7
description: Bloody jewel that contains dreary magical power. Purity 7. The higher the purity of the crystal is, the higher the value.
