name: Blood Crystal: Purity 10
description: Bloody jewel that contains dreary magical power. Purity 10. The higher the purity of the crystal is, the higher the value.

name: Broken Blood Crystal
description: Blood crystal broken by magical inequality.

name: Guardian Basilisk Scale
description: Scale that was peeled off the corpse of guardian basilisk. Collect 40 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

name: Karut Weed
description: Blade of grass that Leto lizardman shamans use for medication. Collect 20 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

name: Haka's Head
description: Certificate proving that Breka overlord Haka was killed. Take it together with heads of Jaka and Marka to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

name: Jakas' Head
description: Certificate proving that breka overlord jaka was killed. Take it together with heads of haka and marka to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

name: Marka's Head
description: Certificate demonstrating that breka overlord marka was killed. Take it together with heads of haka and jaka to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

name: Windsus Aleph Skin
description: Skin peeled off after killing Windsus Aleph. Take it to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

name: Indigo Spirit Ore
description: Spirit Ore obtained from killing manashen or enchanted stone golem. Collect 20 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

name: Sporesea Seed
description: Spore that comes out of the body of giant fungus. Collect 30 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

name: Timak Orc Totem
description: Small statue that Timak orc fighters carry on their bodies. Collect 20 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

name: Trisalim Silk
description: Strong spider web that comes out of the body of trisalim. Collect 20 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

name: Ambrosius Fruit
description: Tree fruit obtained from killing valley treants. Collect 30 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

name: Balefire Crystal
description: Crystal of ill will obtained from killing tairim. Collect 20 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

name: Imperial Arrowhead
description: Arrowhead used by archers of the ancient Elmoreden empire. Collect 20 and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

name: Athu's Head
description: Certificate proving that talk raider Athu was killed. Collect heads of five raiders and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

name: Lanka's Head
description: Certificate proving that talk raider Lanka was killed. Collect heads of five raiders and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

name: Triska's Head
description: Certificate proving that talk raider Triska was killed. Collect heads of five raiders and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

name: Motura's Head
description: Certificate proving that talk raider Motura was killed. Collect heads of five raiders and take them to Hunter Guild Member Grey.

name: Kalath's Head
description: Certificate proving that talk raider Kalath was killed. Collect heads of five raiders and take them to Hunter Guild Member Greay.

name: 1st Circle Request: 1C
description: Kill Leto lizardman archer or soldier and get 40 totems of War Hero Kadesh.

name: 1st Circle Request: 2C
description: Kill timak orc warrior or overlord and get 50 timak jade necklaces.

name: 1st Circle Request: 3C
description: Kill enchanted stone golems, collect and bring back 50 of the fragments.

name: 1st Circle Request: 4C
description: Get 30 pieces of giant floating eye.

name: 1st Circle Request: 5C
description: Kill dire Wyrms and collect and bring 40 eggs.

name: 1st Circle Request: 6C
description: Collect and bring 100 claws of guardian basilisk.

name: 1st Circle Request: 7C
description: Kill fettered souls and get 50 revenant's chains.

name: 1st Circle Request: 8C
description: Collect and bring 30 tusks of Windsus.

name: 1st Circle Request: 9C
description: Collect and bring 100 skulls of grandis.

name: 1st Circle Request: 10C
description: Kill taik orc archer or warrior and collect and bring 50 taik obsidian necklaces.

name: 1st Circle Request: 11C
description: Bring 30 heads of karul bugbear.

name: 1st Circle Request: 12C
description: Kill tamlin orc or tamlin orc archer and collect and bring 40 tamlin ivory amulets.

name: 1st Circle Request: 1B
description: Kill leto chief narak and bring the head.

name: 1st Circle Request: 2B
description: Collect and bring 50 enchanted gargoyle's horns.

name: 1st Circle Request: 3B
description: Kill breka orc warrior or shaman and get 50 coiled serpent totems.

name: 1st Circle Request: 4B
description: Kill leto shaman ketz and get demon kadesh totem.

name: 1st Circle Request: 5B
description: Kill timak raider kaikee and bring the head.

name: 1st Circle Request: 6B
description: Get and bring 30 kronbe venom sacs.

name: 1st Circle Request: 1A
description: Kill spore zombie in the Spore Sea and bring 30 amulets of Eva.

name: 1st Circle Request: 2A
description: Kill grandis chief gok magok and bring back the Titan stone tablet.

name: 1st Circle Request: 3A
description: Kill Karul Chief Orooto and bring back the Book of Shunaiman.

name: 2nd Circle Request: 1C
description: Kill rot tree in the Sea of Spores and gather and bring 40 seeds.

name: 2nd Circle Request 2C
description: Gather and bring 40 trisalim venom sacs.

name: 2nd Circle Request 3C
description: Kill taik orc shaman or captain and get 50 taik orc totems.

name: 2nd Circle Request: 4C
description: Kill Harit Lizardman Soldier, Archer and Warrior and collect and bring 40 Harit Barbed Necklaces.

name: 2nd Circle Request: 5C
description: Kill the Harat Ratmen who dwell on the War-Torn Plains and collect 20 coins from the ancient empire and take them to Guild Member Tor.

name: 2nd Circle Request: 6C
description: Bring 30 farcran leathers.

name: 2nd Circle Request: 7C
description: Kill flines in the Enchanted Valley, collect and bring back 40 tempest shards.

name: 2nd Circle Request: 8C
description: Kill lieles in the Enchanted Valley, collect and bring back 40 tsunami shards.

name: 2nd Circle Request: 9C
description: Kill satyr or satyr elder and collect and bring 40 manes that were obtained.

name: 2nd Circle Request: 10C
description: Kill forest runner and collect and bring 40 hamadryadesung shards.

name: 2nd Circle Request: 11C
description: Kill vanor silenos soldier, scout or warrior and collect and bring 30 of their manes.

name: 2nd Circle Request: 12C
description: Kill taik bugbear warriors and collect and bring 30 talk bugbear totems.

name: 2nd Circle Request: 1B
description: Kill timak overlord okun and bring the head.

name: 2nd Circle Request: 2B
description: Kill taik overlord kakran and bring the head.

name: 2nd Circle Request: 3B
description: Destroy mirrors of the Forest of Mirrors and collect and bring 40 narcissus soulstones.

name: 2nd Circle Request: 4B
description: Collect and bring 20 diprive eyes.

name: 2nd Circle Request: 5B
description: Bring 20 unicorn horns.

name: 2nd Circle Request: 6B
description: Kill vanor chief kerunos and remove and bring the mane.

name: 2nd Circle Request: 1A
description: Kill grave wanderers and collect and bring 20 skulls of executed persons.

name: 2nd Circle Request: 2A
description: Kill Harit Chieftain Kubel, recover the bust of King Travis and bring it.

name: 2nd Circle Request: 3A
description: Kill judges of marsh and collect and bring 10 swords of bodyguards of King Cadmus.

name: Charm of Kadesh
description: Totem obtained from killing Leto lizarman archers or soldiers. Collect 40 and take them to Hunter Guild.

name: Timak Jade Necklace
description: Necklace obtained from killing Timak orc warriors or warlords. Collect 50 and take them to Hunter Guild.

name: Enchanted Golem Shard
description: Fragment of destroyed enchanted stone golem. Collect 50 and take them to Hunter Guild.

name: Giant Monster Eye Meat
description: Piece cut for food from the corpse of a giant monster eye. Collect 30 and take them to Hunter Guild.

name: Dire Wyrm Egg
description: Egg obtained from female dire Wyrm. Collect 40 and take them to Hunter Guild.

name: Guardian Basilisk Talon
description: Claw removed from guardian basilisk corpse. Collect 100 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

name: Revenant's Chains
description: Chain wrapped around the body of a fettered soul. Collect 50 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

name: Windsus Tusk
description: Giant tooth of a Windsus. Collect 30 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

name: Grandis's Skull
description: Skull obtained from killing grandis. Collect 100 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

name: Taik Obsidian Amulet
description: Amulet obtained from killing Taik orc archers or warriors. Collect 50 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

name: Karul Bugbear Head
description: Head cut off after killing Karul bugbears. Collect 30 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

name: Tamlin Ivory Charm
description: Charm obtained from killing Tamlin orcs or Tamlin orc archers. Collect 40 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

name: Fang of Narak
description: Certificate of having killed Leto elder Narak. Take it to Guild Member Tor.

name: Enchanted Gargoyle's Horn
description: Horn obtained from destroyed enchanted gargoyle body. Collect 50 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

name: Coiled Serpent Totem
description: Statue obtained from killing Breka orc warriors or shamen. Collect 50 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

name: Totem of Kadesh
description: Statue of demon Kadesh obtained from killing Leto shaman Ketz. Take it to Guild Member Tor.

name: Kaiki's Head
description: Certificate of having killed Timak raider Kaikee. Take it to Guild Member Tor.

name: Kronbe Venom Sac
description: Venom sac obtained from killing kronbe. Collect 30 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

name: Eva's Charm
description: Charm carried on the bodies of ancient Elven warriors. Collect 30 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

name: Titan's Tablet
description: Ancient stone tablet recovered from grandis chief Gok Magok. Take it to Guild Member Tor.

name: Book of Shunaiman
description: Ancient document recovered from Karul Chief Orooto. Take it to Guild Member Tor.

name: Rotting Tree Spores
description: Seed collected from rot tree trunks. Collect 40 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

name: Trisalim Venom Sac
description: Venom sac removed from trisalim corpse. Collect 40 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

name: Taik Orc Totem
description: Statue obtained from killing Taik orc shamen or captains. Collect 50 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

name: Harit Barbed Necklace
description: Necklace obtained from killing Harit lizardman soldiers, archers or warriors. Collect 40 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

name: Coin of Old Empire
description: Coin used during the time of the ancient Elmoreden Empire. Collect 20 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

name: Skin of Farcran
description: Skin removed after killing farcran. Collect 30 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

name: Tempest Shard
description: Spirit ore obtained by killing a fline. Collect 40 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

name: Tsunami Shard
description: Spirit ore obtained by killing a liele. Collect 40 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

name: Satyr Mane
description: Mane obtained from killing satyr or satyr elders. Collect 40 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

name: Hamadryad Shard
description: Spirit Ore obtained from killing forest runner. Collect 40 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

name: Vanor Silenos Mane
description: Mane of vanor silenos soldiers, scouts or warriors. Collect 30 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

name: Talk Bugbear Totem
description: Small statue that talk bugbear warriors carry around on their bodies. Collect 30 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

name: Okun's Head
description: Certificate of having killed timak overlord okun. Take it to Guild Member Tor.

name: Kakran's Head
description: Certificate of having killed taik overlord kakran. Take it to Guild Member Tor.

name: Narcissus's Soulstone
description: Fragment of destroyed mirror. Collect 40 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

name: Deprive Eye
description: Eye obtained from deprive corpse. Collect 20 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

name: Unicorn's Horn
description: Horn obtained from killing unicorn or unicorn elder. Collect 20 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

name: Kerunos's Gold Mane
description: Mane removed after killing vanor chief kerunos. Take it to Guild Member Tor.

name: Skull of Executed
description: Skull obtained from killing grave wanderer. Collect 20 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

name: Bust of Travis
description: Bust of King Travis recovered from hatar chieftain kubel. Take it to Guild Member Tor.

name: Sword of Cadmus
description: Sword of bodyguard of King Cadmus recovered from judge of marsh. Collect 10 and take them to Guild Member Tor.

name: Coin Diagram
description: An illustration of the coin that Warehouse Keeper Sorint wants you to retrieve. Meet with Hunter Guild President Bernard who will instruct you on what to do next.

name: Kaldis Gold Dragon
description: Coin that is the same as that which Hunter Guild President Bernard has. Take this to Warehouse Keeper Sorint.

name: Coin Collector Membership 1
description: Level 1 coin collector club membership card. You must have this to exchange coins with members of other places.

name: Coin Collector Membership 2
description: Level 2 coin collector club membership card. You must have this to exchange coins with level 2 or level 3 members of other places.

name: Coin Collector Membership 3
description: Level 3 coin collector club membership card. You must have this to exchange coins with level 3 members of other places.

name: Fairy Stone
description: Jewel required to meet and talk with fairy Mimyu.

name: Deluxe Fairy Stone
description: Jewel required to meet and talk with fairy Mimyu. Be careful because creatures living in Enchanted Valley disappear when killed.

name: Fairy Stone List
description: 10 pieces of coal, 10 pieces of charcoal, 1 D-grade gemstone, 3 silver nuggets and 10 pieces of toad lord back skin.

name: Deluxe Fairy Stone List
description: 10 pieces of coal, 10 pieces of charcoal, 1 C-grade gemstone, 1 stone of purity, 5 nuggets of silver and 20 pieces of toad lord back skin.

name: Toad Lord Back Skin
description: Haggard backskin of a toad lord. Ingredient used for removing impurities from fairy stone.

name: Juice of Monkshood
description: Medicine needed to talk with drakes or Wyrms.

name: Scale of Drake Exarion
description: Scale of drake exarion. Take this and recover 20 eggs from leto lizardman warriors near Oren Castle.

name: Egg of Drake Exarion
description: Egg of drake exarion recovered from leto lizardman warriors.

name: Scale of Drake Zwov
description: Scale of drake zwov. Take this and recover 20 eggs from marsh spiders of Cruma Marshlands.

name: Egg of Drake Zwov
description: Egg of drake zwov recovered from marsh spiders.

name: Scale of Drake Kalibran
description: Scale of Drake Kalibran. Take this and recover 20 Eggs from Road Scavengers near Death Pass.

name: Egg of Drake Kalibran
description: Drake Kalibran Egg recovered from Road Scavengers.

name: Scale of Wyvern Suzet
description: Scale of Wyvern Suzet. Take this and recover 20 eggs from Breka Orc Overlords in northern Giran.

name: Egg of Wyvern Suzet
description: Egg of Wyvern Suzet recovered from Breka Orc Overlords.

name: Scale of Wyvern Shamhai
description: Scale of wyvern shamhai. Take this and recover 20 eggs from deadseekers of the Execution Grounds.

name: Egg of Wyvern Shamhai
description: Egg of wyvern shamhai recovered from deadseekers.

name: Herb of Harit
description: One ingredient of antidote. Take all four antidote ingredients to the clan leader within the time.

name: Herb of Vanor
description: One ingredient of antidote. Take all four antidote ingredients to the clan leader within the time.

name: Herb of Oel Mahum
description: One ingredient of antidote. Take all four antidote ingredients to the clan leader within the time.

name: Blood of Eva
description: One ingredient of antidote. Take all four antidote ingredients to the clan leader within the time.

name: Athrea's Coin
description: If you collect three Athrea's coins and take them to Witch Athrea, you will be able to obtain Eva's Blood.

name: Symbol of Loyalty
description: Certificate exchanged for life of clan member. Take this to clan leader.

name: Recipe: Titan's Powerstone
description: For Dwarves only. Recipe for Quest. Required to make a Titan's Powerstone. Requires Create Item - Skill Level 2. The success rate is 25%.

name: Mist Drake's Egg
description: Egg of mist drake. The clan leader must collect ten of each of four kinds of eggs and take them to Martien.

name: Blitz Wyrm Egg
description: Egg of blitz Wyrm. The clan leader must collect ten of each of four kinds of eggs and take them to Martien.

name: Drake's Egg
description: Egg of drake. The clan leader must collect ten of each of four kinds of eggs and take them to Martien.

name: Thunder Wyrm Egg
description: Egg of thunder Wyrm. The clan leader must collect ten of each of four kinds of eggs and take them to Martien.

name: Brooch of the Magpie
description: This brooch that was left by a dying Dwarf to be delivered to Head Blacksmith Kusto, his younger brother in Town of Giran.

name: Nebulite Crystals
description: Soulshot of unknown identity. The clan leader must collect ten each of this and Titan's powerstones and take it all to Balthazar.

name: Broken Titan's Powerstone
description: Titan's Powerstone. It is broken and useless.

name: Titan's Powerstone
description: Titan's Powerstone. The clan leader must collect ten of these and also, ten Nebulite Crystals and take them all to Balthazar.

name: Imperial Key
description: Key used when opening imperial coffer. Must have all six to open the coffer.

name: Undead Ash
description: Ash dust remaining after an undead of the Execution Grounds is destroyed. Collect this and take it to Mercenary Sophya.

name: Bloody Axe Insignia
description: Insignia obtained from killing Ol Mahums in the Fortress of Resistance. Collect these and take them to Mercenary Sophya.

name: Delu Lizardman Fang
description: Tooth removed after killing a Delu Lizardman. Collect these and take them to Mercenary Sophya.

name: Stakato Talon
description: Claw cut off after killing marsh stakatos of the Cruma Marshlands. Collect this and take it to Mercenary Sophya.

name: Feather of Gabrielle
description: Mark given by Seal Guardian Gabrielle. Receive recognition for your abilities after taking this and meeting the other guardians.

name: Marsh Stalker Horn
description: The horn that was cut off of a marsh stalker after it was killed. Take it to Magister Kaiena, the Watchman of the Seal.

name: Marsh Drake Talons
description: The talons that were removed from a marsh drake after it was killed. Take them to Magister Kaiena, the Watchman of the Seal.

name: Kranrot Skin
description: The skin that was removed from a Kranrot after it was killed. Take it to Prefect Chakiris, the Watchman of the Seal.

name: Hamrut Leg
description: The leg that was removed from a Hamrut and skinned after it was killed. Take it to Prefect Chakiris, the Watchman of the Seal.

name: Remains of Sacrifice
description: The remains of a sacrificed soul. Take them to High Priest Orven, the Watchman of the Seal.

name: Totem of Land Dragon
description: The totem created by Harit lizardmen who worship Antharas. Take it to Master Kendra the Watchman of the Seal.

name: 1st Fragment of Abyss Jewel
description: A fragment obtained by destroying an abyss jewel in Gludio. Take it to Warehouse Chief Moke, the Watchman of the Seal.

name: 2nd Fragment of Abyss Jewel
description: A fragment obtained by destroying an abyss jewel in Oren. Take it to Blacksmith Helton, the Watchman of the Seal.

name: 3rd Fragment of Abyss Jewel
description: Fragment obtained from destroying abyss jewel. Take this to Antharas Watchman Theodric at the entrance to Antharas' Lair.

name: Mara Fang
description: The proof obtained after killing jewel guardian Mara. Take it to Warehouse Chief Moke, the Watchman of the Seal.

name: Musfel Fang
description: The proof obtained after killing jewel guardian Musfel. Take it to Blacksmith Helton, the Watchman of the Seal.

name: Mark of Watchman
description: Certificate of having been recognized by seal guardian. Return to Gabrielle after receiving certificates from guardians of each region.

name: Portal Stone
description: Item needed to activate the teleport crystal that teleports to Antharas' Lair.

name: Gustav's 1st Letter
description: A secret letter sent by Sir Gustav Athebaldt to his aides. Get a hold of it and take it to Martien of the Town of Giran.

name: Gustav's 2nd Letter
description: A letter sent by Sir Gustav Athebaldt to those supporting him. Take it to Balthazar of Hunter Village.

name: Gustav's 3rd Letter
description: A letter sent by Sir Gustav Athebaldt to those supporting him. Take it to Sir Eric Rodemai of the Town of Aden.

name: Scepter of Judgment
description: Scepter bestowed on Founding Emperor Shunaiman of the ancient Elmoreden Empire by the god of light. Certificate representing the emperor's authority.

name: Seal of Aspiration
description: Item needed for a clan leader to raise the clan to level 5.

name: Black Anvil Coin
description: Commemorative coin given as an expression of gratitude by the Black Anvil Guild.

name: Antidote Recipe List
description: Herb of Vanor, herb of Oel Mahum, herb of harit and blood of Eva.

name: Voucher of Faith
description: If you take this document to Sir Kristof Rodemai, you will receive the Alliance Manifesto.

name: Alliance Manifesto
description: Item needed for a clan leader to raise the clan to level 4.

name: Potion of Recovery
description: Remedy that can neutralize the poison of Witch Kalis. If the clan leader uses this, the poisoning is healed.

name: Herald of Slayer
description: Certificate showing eligibility to participate in the group to conquer Antharas. Take this and go meet Antharas Watchman Gilmore.

name: L2Day - Scroll of Guidance
description: Accuracy increases.

name: L2Day - Scroll of Death Whisper
description: Critical Damage increases.

name: L2Day - Scroll of Focus
description: Critical Rate increases.

name: L2Day - Scroll of Greater Acumen
description: Spell Casting Spd. increases.

name: Spellbook: Restore Life
description: Spellbook needed to learn Restore Life. Used by Bishops.\\nRequired level: 44

name: Spellbook: Resist Shock
description: Spellbook needed to learn Resist Shock. Used by Elven Elders.\\nRequired level: 40

name: Spellbook: Life Leech
description: Spellbook needed to learn Life Leech. Used by Shillien Knights.\\nRequired level: 40

name: Amulet: Pa'agrio's Tact
description: Amulet required for the Pa'agrio's Tact spell. Used by Overlords.\\nRequired level: 40

name: Amulet: Pa'agrio's Rage
description: Amulet required for the Pa'agrio's Rage spell. Used by Overlords.\\nRequired level: 44

name: Spellbook: Curse Gloom

name: Change of Heart - Piece 1
description: Used only during the Change of Heart event. Complete a heart and take it to Buzz the Cat to claim your prize.

name: Change of Heart - Piece 2
description: Used only during the Change of Heart event. Complete a heart and take it to Buzz the Cat to claim your prize.

description: Used only during the Change of Heart event. Complete a heart and take it to Buzz the Cat to claim your prize.

name: Change of Heart - Piece 9
description: Used only during the Change of Heart event. Complete a heart and take it to Buzz the Cat to claim your prize.

name: L2 Day - Scroll of Mana Regeneration
description: MP Recovery Rate increases.

name: Dice
description: A simple game of chance! Roll 'em!!

name: Blade Mold
description: Cargo that Trader Arodin needs to send to the Dark Elves. Find all 20 of them and take them to Trader Tyra.

name: Tyra's Bill
description: A note from Trader Tyra. Take it to Trader Arodin in Gludin Village.

name: Ranger's Report - Part 1
description: First piece of a ranger's report. Find all 4 pieces and take them to Guard Alvah.

name: Ranger's Report - Part 2
description: Second piece of a ranger's report. Find all 4 pieces and take them to Guard Alvah.

name: Ranger's Report - Part 3
description: Third piece of a ranger's report. Find all 4 pieces and take them to Guard Alvah.

name: Ranger's Report - Part 4
description: Fourth piece of a ranger's report. Find all 4 pieces and take them to Guard Alvah.

name: Weapons Trade Contract
description: The contract that was carried by an Ol Mahum General. It is stamped with the Mark of the Dwarves. Take it to Guard Alvah.

name: Attack Directives
description: An operation order that was carried by an Ol Mahum General. Take it to Guard Alvah.

name: Certificate of the Silver Scale Guild
description: Certificate that verifies one's membership to the Silver Scale Guild.

name: Rolento's Cargobox
description: The war supplies that the Dwarven trader Rolento promised to send to Turek orcs. First, show it to Guard Alvah.

name: Ol Mahum Captain's Head
description: A severed head of an Ol Mahum captain. Collect 30 of them and take them to Turek Chief Burai.

name: Jade Crystal
description: Jade gemstone from the Enchanted Valley. Collect them and take them to Bentley of Hunters Village.

name: Ancient Statue of Goddess
description: A statue of a goddess from an old empire that has been discovered in the cemetery. Take it to Priestess Flownia of Town of Aden.

name: GalfRedo Romer's Bust
description: A statue created by the ancient sculptor Berona. Take it to Trader Galibredo of the Town of Oren.

name: Eye of the Shadow
description: Collect 50 eyes of the Shadow and take them to Warehouse Keeper Sorint.

name: Certificate of Participation: Battle Royal
description: The certificate that allows one to participate in a Battle Royal. This game is played by grade 1 members of the Coin Collectors Club.

name: Trade Cargo
description: The cargo boxes that have been robbed from the wagon of the Trade Guild. Collect 30 of them and take them to Guard Weisz.

name: Agnes's Holy Symbol
description: The Crucifix of the goddess of Einhasad. This article was left by Priestess Agnes after her death. Take it along with Agnes's Rosary to Priest Adonius.

name: Agnes's Rosary
description: A rosary used while praying. It was left by Priestess Agnes after her death. Take it along with the Crucifix of the goddess of Einhasad to Priest Adonius.

name: Sinister Totem
description: A black colored totem that exudes an evil aura. Take it to High Priestess Levian.

name: Bear Skin
description: The pelts obtained by hunting bears. Collect 20 of them and take them to Grocer Pano of Floran Village.

name: Enku Orc's Head
description: Beheaded head of an Enku Orc. Collect 100 of them and take them to Orc Lady Jennifer.

name: Orc Heads Bouquet -1
description: A bouquet made by tying 100 orc heads together. On behalf of Jennifer who is shy, deliver it to High Prefect Drikus.

name: Orc Heads Bouquet -2
description: A bouquet made by tying 100 orc heads together. On behalf of Jennifer who is shy, deliver it to Priest Manuel.

name: Orc Heads Bouquet -3
description: A bouquet made by tying 100 orc heads together. On behalf of Jennifer who is shy, deliver it to Vuku Chief Driko.

name: Orc Heads Bouquet -4
description: A bouquet made by tying 100 orc heads together. On behalf of Jennifer who is shy, deliver it to Seer Somak.

name: Orc Heads Bouquet -5
description: A bouquet made by tying 100 orc heads together. On behalf of Jennifer who is shy, deliver it to Prefect Dowki.

name: Orc Heads Bouquet -6
description: A bouquet made by tying 100 orc heads together. On behalf of Jennifer who is shy, deliver it to Warden Endrigo.

name: Orc Heads Bouquet -7
description: A bouquet made by tying 100 orc heads together. On behalf of Jennifer who is shy, deliver it to Captain Lucas.

name: Jennifer's Box
description: The box that a man who is smitten by Orc Lady Jennifer asked this to be delivered to her. What do you think is in the box...?

name: Articles of Dead Heroes
description: The articles of dead soldiers who were sent as an expeditionary force 1,000 years ago. These articles have been collected by hunting cave servants. Take them to Antharas Watchman Gilmore.

name: Old Key
description: An article left by a dead soldier. His descendent Sir Kristof Rodemai is living in Town of Giran. Take it to him.

name: Old Hilt
description: An article left by a dead soldier. His descendant Duelist Kaien is living in the Town of Oren. Take it to him.

name: Totem Necklace
description: An article left by a dead soldier. His descendent, High Prefect Garvarentz, is living in Hunters Village. Take it to him.

name: Einhasad Crucifix
description: An article left by a dead soldier. Take it to High Priest Orven of Einhasad Temple in Town of Aden where the dead soldier used to be stationed.

name: Victim's Arm Bone
description: The arm bone of a victim who has been eaten by a Crokian. Collect the five types of bones and take them to Xenovia.

name: Victim's Thigh Bone
description: The thigh bone of a victim who has been eaten by a Crokian. Collect the five types of bones and take them to Xenovia.

name: Victim's Skull
description: The skull of a victim who has been eaten alive by a Crokian. Collect the five types of bones and take them to Xenovia.

name: Victim's Rib Bone
description: The rib bone of a victim who has been eaten by a Crokian. Collect the five types of bones and take them to Xenovia.

name: Victim's Spine
description: The spine of a victim who has been eaten by a Crokian. Collect the five types of bones and take them to Xenovia.

name: Jar of Bones
description: An urn that contains the bones of all the victims. Ask Mad Doctor Orpheus to resurrect the victims.

name: Useless Bone Pieces
description: Useless bone pieces obtained after hunting Crokians. If you take them to Orpheus, perhaps something good will happen...?

name: Powder to Summon Dead Souls
description: The magic powder bought from Magister Xenovia. Throw it along with the victims' bones into the Psychic Medium's Urn.

name: Sack of the Dead
description: A sack containing a victim's soul. An urn was possessed by the victim's soul. Take it to Locksmith Dorothy.

name: Frog Prince
description: What are you waiting for? You promised to help me! Release me from this curse immediately! I must regain my appearance as soon as possible!!!

name: Fly Powder
description: Powder made by grinding dried flies. Use it when you fail in your attempt to transform a frog.

name: Calculator
description: The latest model of calculator. Take it to Blacksmith Brunon.

name: Gemstone Beast's Crystal
description: Crystal obtained by slaying a gemstone beast. Collect 10 of these and take them to Blacksmith Silvera.

name: Titan's Powerstone
description: The Titan's Powerstone that has been extracted from the corpse of a Giant. Take it to Magister Hanellin.

name: Hanellin's 1st Letter
description: A letter that Hanellin entrusted you with. Take it to Magister Harne of the Dark Elven Village and receive your next assignment from her.

name: Hanellin's 2nd Letter
description: A letter that Hanellin entrusted you with. Take it to Claudia Athebaldt of Town of Aden and receive your next assignment from her.

name: Hanellin's 3rd Letter
description: A letter that Hanellin entrusted you with. Take it to Martien of the Town of Giran and receive your next assignment from him.

name: 1st Key of Ark
description: The key that was found upon the corpse of the guardian of the sacred ark. Use this key to open the sacred ark and retrieve the sacred object.

name: 2nd Key of Ark
description: The key that was taken after killing Elberos, the guardian of the sacred ark. Use the key to open the sacred ark and retrieve the sacred object.

name: 3rd Key of Ark
description: The key that was taken after killing Shadowfang, the guardian of the sacred ark. Use the key to open the sacred ark and retrieve the sacred object.

name: White Fabric
description: A large piece of white cloth given by Magister Hanellin. Kill the Platinum Tribe Shamans and Overlords and soak the cloth with their blood.

name: Blooded Fabric
description: A piece of cloth soaked in the blood of angels and the Platinum race. Hanellin has told you that in order to challenge Baium, you must wrap this blood-soaked cloth around your body.

name: Order of Gosta
description: The order states that you should hunt Tasaba Lizardmen and Tasaba Lizardman Shaman and bring back their fangs as proof.

name: Lizard Fang
description: The fangs that have been collected as proofs that Tasaba Lizardmen and Tasaba Lizardman Shaman have been hunted.

name: Barrel of League
description: This seems to be the cargo that was stolen from Iason Heine's wagon by Tasaba Lizardmen.

name: Operation Document - 1/10
description: This document was found in the cargo of the Trade Guild. The document contains various information regarding Innadril. How could this have happened...?

name: Operation Document - 2/10
description: This document was found in the cargo of the Trade Guild. The document contains various information regarding Innadril. How could this have happened...?

name: Operation Document - 3/10
description: This document was found in the cargo of the Trade Guild. The document contains various information regarding Innadril. How could this have happened...?

name: Operation Document - 4/10
description: This document was found in the cargo of the Trade Guild. The document contains various information regarding Innadril. How could this have happened...?

name: Operation Document - 5/10
description: This document was found in the cargo of the Trade Guild. The document contains various information regarding Innadril. How could this have happened...?

name: Operation Document - 6/10
description: This document was found in the cargo of the Trade Guild. The document contains various information regarding Innadril. How could this have happened...?

name: Operation Document - 7/10
description: This document was found in the cargo of the Trade Guild. The document contains various information regarding Innadril. How could this have happened...?

name: Operation Document - 8/10
description: This document was found in the cargo of the Trade Guild. The document contains various information regarding Innadril. How could this have happened...?

name: Operation Document - 9/10
description: This document was found in the cargo of the Trade Guild. The document contains various information regarding Innadril. How could this have happened...?

name: Operation Document - 10/10
description: This document was found in the cargo of the Trade Guild. The document contains various information regarding Innadril. How could this have happened...?

name: Completed Operation Order
description: A book consisting of 10 pages of operation orders bound together. Who should we take it to...?

name: Iason Heine's Bill
description: The bill's face value is 1,000 adena. If you take it to Roman of the Blacksmith Guild in Innadril, you can use it to purchase various ingredients.

name: Gillian's Diary
description: Gillian's diary. The last entry was made one year ago.

name: Gillian's Notes
description: Partial lyrics of a song Gillian was jotting down.

name: Unfinished Music
description: An unfinished music score of a song that Gilian composed for a former lover.

name: Gillian's Heart
description: The heart that Gillian threw out to forget his feelings of love. Return it to the Revenant of Gillian.

name: Gandi Tribe's Relic
description: The sacred object of the Gandi Tribe that has been recovered from Bugbears. Take it to Gandi Chief Chianta in the Town of Dion.

name: Swan's Flute
description: A flute that Troubadour Swan had obtained as a gift for Musician Nanarin.

name: Swan's Letter
description: A love letter that Troubadour Swan wants to send to Musician Nanarin along with the flute. Take them to Musician Nanarin.

name: Event Clothes
description: A gift that Musician Nanarin is sending to Musician Barbado. Take it to Barbado.

name: Nanarin's Flute
description: A gift that Musician Nanarin is sending to Musician Barbado. Take it to Barbado.

name: Sabrin's Black Beer
description: A gift that Musician Nanarin is sending to Musician Barbado. Take it to Barbado.

name: Stolen Black Beer
description: Black beer that was stolen from Jonas. Take it to Trader Sabrin.

name: Stolen Event Clothes
description: Event clothes that were stolen from Trader Sonia. Take them to Guard Xaber.

name: Clothes Chest Key
description: The key given by Bard Swan. Use this key to open the clothes chest and retrieve the event clothes.

name: Beer Chest Key
description: The key given by Bard Swan. Use this key to open the beer chest and get the black beer out of it.

name: Fairy Leaf
description: A leaf given by Fairy Mimyu to put on the fairy's neck wound that was inflicted by a Hatchling.

name: Ratman Scavenger's Skull
description: Heads of Ratman Scavengers that you hunted after receiving a request from Katari. Collect 10 of them and take them to Katari.

name: Turek War Hound's Tail
description: The tails of Turek war Hounds that Piotur asks you to catch. Collect 10 of them and take them to Piotur.

name: Tyrant Kingpin's Heart
description: Tyrant Kingpin's Heart. Take it to Elder Casian.

name: Trisalim Tarantula's Venom Sac
description: The venom sacs of Trisalim Tarantulas that Magister Joan asked you to hunt. Collect three and take them to Magister Joan.

name: Penitent's Manacles
description: A heavy set of manacles forged at the Black Judge's behest. Take them to the Black Judge.

name: Manual of Manacles
description: Blacksmith's Frame x 1, Steel x 5, Adamantite Nugget x 2, Silver Nugget x 10, Cokes x 10

name: Tarlk Amulet
description: A mark that can be obtained by catching a Tarlk Bugbear or a Tarlk Basilisk. Collect 30 and take them to a Clan Hall Herald.

name: Contest Certificate
description: A certificate that one can present to participate in the hunt for Tarlk Basilisks, a preliminary contest for a Clan Hall Siege War.

name: Ant's Ichor
description: Bodily fluids extracted from ants or ant captains. Collect 20 and take them to Elder Casian.

name: Noble Ant's Nerve Tissue
description: The nerve tissue harvested from a Noble Ant's head. Take it to Elder Casian along with the Ant's Ichor.

name: Casian's Enzyme
description: Enzyme created by Elder Casian. Find the Ant Larvae sleeping within the  Ant Nest Dungeon and administer the enzyme to them.

name: Alligator Leather
description: Pelts obtained from alligators caught on Alligator Island. You can sell it to Enverun.

name: Blue Back Alligator Leather
description: Leather from Blue Back Alligators caught on Alligator Island. You can sell it to Enverun at a high price.

name: Jewel Studded Alligator Leather
description: A piece of Jewel Studded Alligator Leather caught on Alligator Island. You can sell it to Enverun at a high price.

name: Certificate of Approval to Create a Belt
description: If you take a sufficient amount of Alligator Leather and show it to Gabana, a master leather craftsman, you can have an Alligator Leather Belt made.

name: Certificate of Approval to Create a Purse
description: If you take a sufficient amount of Alligator Leather and show it to Gabana, a master leather craftsman, you can have an Alligator Leather Purse made.

name: Water Crystal
description: A lump of crystal that contains the energy of water. You should find the Stone Statue of Water and dedicate it to the statue.

name: Fire Crystal
description: A lump of crystal that contains the energy of fire. You should find the Stone Statue of Fire and dedicate it to the statue.

name: Wind Crystal
description: A lump of crystal that contains the energy of wind. You should find the Stone Statue of Wind and dedicate it to the statue.

name: Earth Crystal
description: A lump of crystal that contains the energy of earth. You should find the Stone Statue of Earth and dedicate it to the statue.

name: Dark Crystal
description: A lump of crystal that contains the energy of darkness. You should find the Stone Statue of Darkness and dedicate it to the statue.

name: Crystal of Light
description: A lump of crystal that contains the energy of light. You should find the Stone Statue of Light and dedicate it to the statue.

name: Jade Crystal
description: Jade crystals that had been gathered from the Enchanted Valley. Collect them and take them to Bentley of Hunters Village.

name: Bust of Ancient Goddess
description: A statue of a goddess that was created by the ancient sculptor Berona in ancient times.

name: The Work of the ancient sculptor Berona
description: A statue created by the ancient sculptor Berona. It has not been evaluated by antique experts yet.

name: Ancient Statue of Goddess: Prototype
description: A statue created by Berona, an ancient sculptor. - Prototype

name: Ancient Statue of Goddess: Original
description: A statue created by Berona, a sculptor in ancient times. - Original

name: Ancient Statue of Goddess: Replica
description: Replicated statues that have been created by present day sculptors who imitated Berona's works.

name: Ancient Statue of Goddess: Forgery
description: Forgeries that have been created in imitation of the ancient sculptor Berona's works.

name: Blue Eva
description: Special Coin

name: Gold Einhasad
description: Special Coin

name: Silver Shilen
description: Special Coin

name: Bloody Pa'agrio
description: Special Coin

name: Barrel of Liquor
description: A barrel that is filled to the brim with delicious and fragrant liquor. The barrel is very heavy.

name: Precious Scarab
description: A scarab that is transparent and shines like a precious stone. Among hustlers it is traded at a high price.

name: Simbelmyne
description: A type of flower that is believed to have the power to heal sickness. It is a favorite of elves.

name: Odd (looking) Doll
description: It is a strange looking statue of a living creature that looks like an imp. It is an orc's favorite item.

name: Scarlet Dress
description: A very attractive scarlet Aden-style dress designed for a virtuous lady.

name: Nebulite Orb
description: It is made by cutting Nebulite into a spherical shape. Take this to Magic Trader Cema in Hardin's Academy.

name: Ectoplasm Liqueur
description: An exotic tasting liqueur made from ectoplasm. Very popular among connoisseurs.

name: Prince's Trophy
description: The winning trophy that Prince Malcom won in a dance competition. You can sell it at a store or keep it as a souvenir.

name: Prince's Autobiography
description: The autobiography of Prince Malcom that bears his hand-written signature. Sell it at a store.

name: Prince's Bust
description: A statue of Prince Malcom made of pure gold. Although quite ugly, it will fetch a handsome price.

name: Silk Handkerchief
description: A beautiful and elaborate handkerchief decorated with a flower pattern and lace. Its design could attract the attention of princes and princesses.

name: Luxurious Goblet
description: A luxuriously designed goblet. It seems to be an object made during the period of the Elmo Aden Empire.

name: Scepter of Darkness
description: A staff that gives off dark M. Atk. On its handle, the words "Great Demon King" are engraved.

name: Succubus Perfume
description: Perfume used by Succubus noblewomen. A very strong fragrance, not popular among Elves and Humans.

name: Succubus Mirror
description: A mirror used by Succubus noblewomen when they put on cosmetics. It is also said to be used occasionally by blood queens.

name: Heart of Darkness
description: A heart-shaped stone piece that gives off the aura of dark M. Atk. On its reverse, the words "I love you Merkenis!" are engraved.

name: Royal Orc Totem
description: A totem made by carving out a whole lump of red granite.

name: Pearl Trodden/Trampled By A Wild Hog
description: A walnut sized bead that is smeared with dirt. Perhaps, it is a pearl.

name: Boar's Tusk
description: The tusk of a boar that looks somewhat similar to the ivory of an elephant.

name: Sweet Potato
description: A large sized sweet potato that was just plucked out of the soil. You s it or roast it. It will make a delicious treat.

name: Beast's Claws
description: White lion's sharp claws. It is rumored that it is being traded among collectors at a high price.

name: Beast's Mane
description: A white lion's luxuriant mane. It is rumored to be sold at a high price among collectors.

name: Ginseng Root
description: Rare medicine imported from the Orient.

name: Honey Jar
description: A jar containing sweet honey.

name: Bear's Gall
description: The gall of a bear that is known to be highly effective in promoting one's health and well-being as well as having mysterious healing properties.

name: Fresh Samon
description: A fresh salmon that seems to have been just caught from a river.

name: Sushi Riceball
description: The Schuttgart type sushi rice ball. The delicious seasoning of well minced meat gets absorbed into the rice and produces a wonderful taste.

name: Avellan Spice
description: Exotic spice that has been imported from Avella of the Orient.

name: Lucky Rabbit Weed
description: Rabbit weed that is supposed to bring luck. It is the favorite food of rabbits and elpys.

name: Malcom's Check
description: A check of tremendous face value signed by Prince Malcom. It can be cashed at a warehouse in Town of Giran.

name: Deposit Box Key
description: A key for a private deposit box located in a warehouse in Town of Giran.

name: Dwarven Royal Seal
description: A royal seal made of carved jade. It is engraved with the seal of the Dwarven royal family.

name: Dwarven Royal Crown
description: A king's crown made of gold. It is engraved with the seal of the Dwarven royal family.

name: Dwarven Dance Manual
description: A dance manual that details ballroom dancing techniques. This book will make you a dancing hero!

name: Calculator
description: Allows one to perform a simple calculation.

name: Hanellin's White Flower
description: A mark of Hanellin. Along with your companions each carrying a red flower and yellow flower respectively, go to Town of Aden to see her.

name: Hanellin's Red Flower
description: A mark of Hanellin. Along with your companions each carrying a white flower and yellow flower respectively, go to Town of Aden to see her.

name: Hanellin's Yellow Flower
description: A mark of Hanellin. Along with your companions each carrying a white flower and red flower respectively, go to Town of Aden to see her.

name: Book of Saint
description: The book of Saint Solina. Take it along with the blood of a Saint and the bough of a Saint to Magister Hanellin.

name: Blood of Saint
description: The blood of Saint Solina, hardened into a dark-colored substance contained in a glass bottle. Take it, along with the Book of Saint and the Bough of Saint to Magister Hanellin.

name: Bough of Saint
description: The Scepter of Saint Solina. It appears to be just a dead dry tree branch. Take it along with the book of a Saint and the blood of a Saint and take it to Magister Hanellin.

name: White Fabric
description: A large piece of white cloth given by Magister Hanellin. Hanellin will tell you its purpose.

name: Green Dimensional Stone
description: Activates a Dimensional Vortex. Allows you to move to the 1st to 3rd floor of the Tower of Insolence.

name: Blue Dimensional Stone
description: Activates a Dimensional Vortex. Allows you to move to the 4th to 6th floor of the Tower of Insolence.

name: Red Dimensional Stone
description: Activates a Dimensional Vortex. Allows you to move to the 7th to 10th floor of the Tower of Insolence.

name: Green Dimensional Stone - Shard
description: A broken shard of the green Dimensional Stone. Collect these and take them to Researcher Kaplan.

name: Blue Dimensional Stone - Shard
description: A broken shard of the blue Dimensional Stone. Collect these and take them to Researcher Euclie.

name: Red Dimensional Stone - Shard
description: A broken shard of the red Dimensional Stone. Collect these and take them to Researcher Pitagon.

name: Bill of Iason Heine
description: Its value is 1000 adena, redeemable by Roman of the Blacksmith Guild in Innadril. You can use it to buy various ingredients.

name: Musical Score - Theme of Love
description: Posthumously released musical score of Gillian. If you take it to Maestro Melody, you can have an echo crystal made.

name: Musical Score - Theme of Battle
description: The musical score for the Battle March of Flames. If you take it to Maestro Melody, you can have an echo crystal made.

name: Musical Score - Theme of Journey
description: A musical score composed by Troubadour Swan. If you take it to Maestro Melody, you can have an echo crystal made.

name: Echo Crystal - Theme of Journey
description: An echo crystal that plays the theme music of a journey. May only be used once.

name: Echo Crystal - Theme of Battle
description: An echo crystal that plays the theme music of a battle.

name: Echo Crystal - Theme of Love
description: An echo crystal that plays the theme music of love. May only be used once.

name: Echo Crystal - Theme of Solitude
description: An echo crystal that plays the theme music of solitude. May only be used once.

name: Echo Crystal - Theme of the Feast
description: An echo crystal that plays the theme music of a feast. May only be used once.

name: Echo Crystal - Theme of Celebration
description: An echo crystal that plays the theme music of a celebration. May only be used once.

name: Echo Crystal - Theme of Comedy
description: An echo crystal that plays the theme music of a comedy. May only be used once.

name: Musical Score - Theme of Celebration
description: A musical score containing the theme music of a celebration. If you take it to Maestro Melody, you can have an echo crystal made.

name: Musical Score - Theme of Comedy
description: A musical score containing the theme music of a comedy. If you take it to Maestro Melody, you can have an echo crystal made.

name: Musical Score - Theme of Solitude
description: A musical score composed by Musician Nanarin. If you take it to Maestro Melody, you can have an echo crystal made.

name: Musical Score - Theme of the Feast
description: A musical score composed by Musician Barbado. If you take it to Maestro Melody, you can have an echo crystal made.

name: Dragon Bugle of Wind
description: A bugle used to summon a Wind Strider. This pet uses some of the experience points earned by its master.

name: Dragon Bugle of Star
description: A bugle used to summon a Star Strider. This pet uses some of the experience points earned by its master.

name: Dragon Bugle of Twilight
description: A bugle used to summon a Twilight Strider. This pet uses some of the experience points earned by its master.

name: Penitent's Manacles
description: The heavy manacles used to summon a Sin Eater. Summoning the Sin Eater consumes all the summoner's Exp. The Sin Eater must be fed Food for Wolves.

name: Manacles of Penitent
description: Having consumed your sins, the Sin Eater has disappeared, leaving you with this ordinary pair of manacles. To repeat this quest, take them back to the Black Judge.

name: Alligator Leather Belt
description: An Alligator Leather Belt designed and created by Verche, a master leather craftsman.

name: Blue Alligator Leather Belt
description: An Alligator Leather Belt designed and created by Verche, a master leather craftsman. It is made from a rare blue type of Leather.

name: Bejeweled Leather Belt
description: An Alligator Leather Belt designed and created by Verche, a master leather craftsman. It is made from a Leather that is studded with rare jewels.

name: Alligator Leather Purse
description: An Alligator Leather Purse designed and created by Verche, a master leather craftsman.

name: Blue Alligator Leather Purse
description: An Alligator Leather Purse designed and created by Verche, a master leather craftsman. It is made from a rare blue type of Leather.

name: Bejeweled Purse
description: An Alligator Leather Purse designed and created by Verche, a master leather craftsman. It is made of Leather studded with rare jewels.

name: Elemental Stone Powder
description: Elemental stone powder obtained from a stone statue in the Forgotten Temple. Can be sold at any store or taken to Magister Nell.

name: Elemental Stone Shards
description: The shards of elemental stones obtained from stone statues in the Forgotten Temple. Can be sold at any store or taken to Magister Nell.

name: Elemental Stone Lump
description: The lumps of elemental stone obtained from stone statues in the Forgotten Temple. Can be sold at any store or taken to Magister Nell.

name: Bentley's Request
description: A request to find and bring back jade crystals from creatures such as Fline, Liele, Satyr etc. that inhabit the Enchanted Valley.

name: Carson's Request
description: A request to recover the works of the ancient sculptor Berona from Hatar Ratmen and Vanor Silenos in the area near the Cemetery.

name: Knuckle Duster Edge
description: An essential ingredient needed by a Dwarf to make a Knuckle Duster. It can be bought from a regular store.

name: Avadon Shield Fragment
description: An essential ingredient needed by a Dwarf to make an Avadon Shield. It can be bought from a regular store.

name: Recipe: Knuckle Duster
description: For Dwarves only. The recipe for a Knuckle Duster. Requires Create Item - Skill Level 5. The success rate is 100%.

name: Recipe: Avadon Shield
description: For Dwarves only. The recipe for an Avadon Shield. Requires Create Item - Skill Level 6. The success rate is 100%.

name: Lottery Ticket
description: A lottery ticket from Aden, redeemable at any lottery sales location. Winning numbers are posted every Saturday at 7 p.m. You can't win if you don't play! Good luck!

name: Monster Race Ticket - Single
description: A winning ticket from the monster race. Redeemable at the cashier of the race.

name: Monster Race Ticket - Double
description: A winning daily double ticket from the monster race. Redeemable at the cashier of the race.

name: Dye of STR <Str+1 Con-3>
description: Dye of STR <Str+1 Con-3> - Collect and take 10 units of this magical dye to the symbol maker in town and you will receive a symbol that boosts your abilities. Can be used after completion of first class transfer and prior to completion of second class transfer by all classes.

description: Dye of STR <Str+1 Dex-3> - Collect and take 10 units of this magical dye to the symbol maker in town and you will receive a symbol that boosts your abilities. Can be used after completion of first class transfer and prior to completion of second class transfer by all classes.

name: Greater Dye of STR <Str+1 Con-3>
description: Greater Dye of STR <Str+1 Con-3>. Collect and take 10 units of this type of magical dye to the symbol maker in town and you will receive a symbol that boosts your abilities tattooed onto your body. Can be used by all classes after completion of their second class transfer, and can be kept and used after the completion of the third class transfer as well.

Can be used by the Wizard class after completion of their second class transfer, and can be kept and used after the completion of the third class transfer as well.

name: Greater Dye of INT <Int+1 Wit-3>
description: Greater Dye of INT <Int+1 Wit-3>. Collect and take 10 units of this type of magical dye to the symbol maker in town and you will receive a symbol that boosts your abilities tattooed onto your body. Can be used by the Wizard class and the Warrior class after completion of their second class transfer, and can be kept and used after the completion of the third class transfer as well.

name: Hallate's Infernium Scepter
description: A scepter made of infernium that was recovered from the Death Lord Hallate. Take it to Maestro Reorin.

name: Maestro Reorin's Hammer
description: A hammer used by a blacksmith. It is made by processing an adamantite nugget of high purity. Take it to Maestro Reorin.

name: Maestro Reorin's Mold
description: A mold used by Dwarven Artisans to manufacture top grade equipment. Take it to Maestro Reorin.

name: Infernium Varnish
description: Varnish used when manufacturing an infernium weapon. Take it to Maestro Reorin.

name: Red Pipette Knife
description: Pipette knife that holds Baium's blood. Bring it to Magister Casper at Hardin's Academy.

name: Potion of Critical Escape
description: Misdirects enemy attack, inhibits speed of user.

name: Decrease Haste Potion
description: Decreases one's level of Aggression.

name: Bless of Eva
description: Allows one to breathe under water for extended periods.

name: Potion of Revenge
description: Reduces P. Def. and reflects damage back upon enemy.

name: Seed: Chilly Cobol
description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Innadril area and it will bear the fruit of the Chilly Cobol. For best results, a level 29-39 character must plant it on a level 29-39 monster.

description: A Spiritshot: No Grade for use by newbies.

name: Spellbook: Aqua Splash
description: Spellbook needed to learn Aqua Splash. Used by Spellsingers.\\nRequired level: 58

name: Spellbook: Rain of Fire
description: Spellbook needed to learn Rain of Fire. Used by Sorcerers and Spellsingers.\\nRequired level: 58

name: Spellbook: Mass Slow
description: Spellbook needed to learn Mass Slow. Used by Necromancers.\\nRequired level: 62

name: Spellbook: Servitor Empowerment
description: Spellbook needed to learn Servitor Empowerment. Used by Warlocks, Elemental Summoners and Phantom Summoners.\\nRequired level: 52

name: Spellbook: Servitor Cure
description: Spellbook needed to learn Servitor Cure. Used by Warlocks, Elemental Summoners and Phantom Summoners.\\nRequired level: 40

name: Spellbook: Servitor Blessing
description: Spellbook needed to learn Servitor Blessing. Used by Warlocks, Elemental Summoners and Phantom Summoners.\\nRequired level: 62

name: Spellbook: Wild Magic
description: Spellbook needed to learn Wild. Used by Elven Elders and Shillien Elders.\\nRequired level: 62

name: Spellbook: Advanced Block
description: Spellbook needed to learn Advanced Block. Used by Elven Elders.\\nRequired level: 58

name: Blessed Scroll of Escape: Clan Hall
description: A magical scroll that transports you to your clan hall. If you don't belong to a clan that possesses a clan hall, this scroll will have no effect.

name: Blessed Scroll of Escape: Castle
description: A magical scroll that transports you to your castle. If you don't belong to a clan that controls a castle, this scroll will have no effect.

name: Lienrik Egg
description: Lienrik's egg. It's the item that Pet Manager Rood of Heine asked you to find for him.

name: Lienrik Egg
description: Lienrik's shiny red egg. Pet Manager Rood of Heine asked you to find it for him, but...?

name: Stone of Contract
description: In order to obtain the power of darkness, you will first need to secure this item. Take it to Trader Galman in Dragon Valley.

name: Alligator Tooth
description: Sharp canine tooth of the Alligator. Bring this to the warehouse keeper of Heine.

name: Mysterious Map Piece
description: A faded piece of paper. Possibly part of a map.

name: Carnivore Spore
description: A tissue sample collected from a spore zombie from the Sea of Spores. It is used as research material by Magister Gauen of the Ivory Tower.

name: Herbivorous Spore
description: A spore sample collected from a rotting tree from the Sea of Spores. It is used as research material by Magister Gauen of the Ivory Tower.

name: Jade Crystal
description: A jade crystal collected from the Enchanted Valley. Take it to Warehouse Freightman Silva of Hunters Village.

name: Snake Scale
description: A snake scale from the bodies of Falibati and Trives. Take it to Grand Master Oltran of Town of Aden.

name: Remains of Aden Residents
description: Remains of residents of Aden Castle who were killed during the Aden-Elmore war. Collect 60 of them and take them to High Priest Orven.

name: Receipt of Supply
description: A document made from collected mysterious document pieces. Take it to Guard Coleman.

name: Suspicious Document Piece
description: A piece of document that seems to contain some suspicious contents. If you collect 5 of them, you may be able to decipher the information the document conveys.

name: Supply Items
description: Supply items for Taik Orcs. Take it to Guard Coleman and he will give you a reward.

name: Pirate's Treasure Chest
description: A treasure chest that was obtained by slaying Zaken's followers. Take it to Warehouse Keeper Randolf of Town of Giran.

name: Sairon's Silver Hair
description: Sairon's hair. Take it to Magister Dieter of Town of Giran.

name: Titan Lamp
description: It is called a Titan lamp. It is not lit.

name: Titan Lamp
description: It is called a Titan lamp. It is burning dimly.

name: Titan Lamp
description: It is called a Titan lamp. It is lit.

name: Titan Lamp
description: It is called a Titan lamp. It is lit.

name: Titan Lamp
description: It is called a Titan lamp. It is shining brightly.

name: Broken Titan Lamp
description: A broken Titan lamp. Take it to Lorain.

name: Blade Stakato Fang
description: A fang that was obtained from killing a blade stakato. Take it to Eva's Priestess Restina in Heine.

name: Flare Shard
description: A flare shard obtained from the Forgotten Temple. Take it to Magister Nell of Gludin Village.

name: Freezing Shard
description: A water shard obtained from the Forgotten Temple. Take it to Magister Nell of Gludin Village.

name: Cave Beast Tooth
description: An ingredient used by Orc Shamans during a ritual. Take it to Seer Manakia.

name: Death Wave Light
description: An ingredient used by Orc Shamans during their ritual. Take it to Seer Manakia.

name: Sealed Mysterious Stone
description: A pebble that radiates a strange aura. It sends out a dim light.

name: Mysterious Stone
description: A pebble that radiates a strange aura. It is shining brightly.

name: Karik Horn
description: An ingredient used by Orc Shamans during a ritual. Take it to Seer Manakia.

name: Cave Howler Skull
description: An ingredient used by Orc Shamans during a ritual. Take it to Seer Manakia.

name: Mysterious Book
description: A book obtained from The Giant's Cave. Written in an ancient language, its contents cannot be deciphered.

name: Ancient Language Dictionary: Basic Level
description: A simple dictionary published by scholars of ancient times. By using this, you can interpret some of the texts of the Titans.

name: Ancient Language Dictionary: Intermediate Level
description: A dictionary published by scholars of ancient times. By using this, you can interpret the entire texts of the Titans.

name: Leaf of Eucalyptus
description: One of the ingredients used to make wine. Collect 80 of them and take them to Guard Harlan located in the Town of Dion.

name: Stone of Chill
description: A magical stone used by Enku Orc Shamans when they cast ice magic. Collect 100 of these and take them to Guard Harlan located in the Town of Dion.

name: Ritron's Fruit
description: A fruit with a tough, hard outer skin and a fragrant smell. Collect 4 of these and take them to Magister Rollant in the Town of Dion.

name: Moon Face Flower
description: A flower that is said to bloom only under moonlight. Collect 20 of these and take them to Magister Rollant in the Town of Dion.

name: Leech Fluids
description: The bodily fluids of a Leech that can be obtained from the Cruma Marshlands. Collect 10 of these and take them to Magister Rollant in the Town of Dion.

name: Royal Membership
description: It's a coin collectors' dream! Take it to Head Blacksmith Vergara.

name: Kail's Coin
description: A coin owned by Sorcerer Kail who used to be an aid of Beleth. Take it to Warehouse Keeper Sorint.

name: Coin Collecting Album
description: A high quality coin collecting album made of leather.

name: Blood Offering
description: Blood that can be obtained by killing a Monster of Offering. The number of this item will determine your score.

name: Scroll of Ancient Magic
description: A scroll that contains ancient magic. Take it to Gatekeeper Ziggurat.

name: Ancient Ash Urn
description: An ancient urn that was found in the Tower of Insolence. Take it to Seer Reva of Town of Aden.

name: Wesley's Mixing Stone
description: A small gemstone that is given by Wesley. This item is required to use a mixing urn.

name: Magister's Mixing Stone
description: A gemstone that activates the mixing urn in the basement of the Ivory Tower.

name: 5th Anniversary Gift Box (10 Honey Rice Cake Set)
description: Commemorating the 5th anniversary of Lineage 2, this wrapped gift box contains 10 multi-colored honey rice cakes and 1 Lineage 2 Commemorative Mark. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: 5th Anniversary Gift Box (9 Honey Rice Cake Set)
description: Commemorating the 5th anniversary of Lineage 2, this wrapped gift box contains 9 multi-colored honey rice cakes and 1 Lineage 2 Commemorative Mark. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Red Soul Crystal: Stage 13
description: Red Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 13. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. Every time it is used, it consumes 26 of MP. However, the Soul Crystal of this stage absorbs souls by itself, so there is no need for using the Soul Crystal to monsters.

name: 5th Anniversary Gift Box (8 Honey Rice Cake Set)
description: Commemorating the 5th anniversary of Lineage 2, this wrapped gift box contains 8 multi-colored honey rice cakes and 1 Lineage 2 Commemorative Mark. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

description: Commemorating the 5th anniversary of Lineage 2, this wrapped gift box contains 7 multi-colored honey rice cakes and 1 Lineage 2 Commemorative Mark. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Green Soul Crystal: Stage 13
description: Green Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 13. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. Every time it is used, it consumes 26 of MP. However, the Soul Crystal of this stage absorbs souls by itself, so there is no need for using the Soul Crystal to monsters.

name: 5th Anniversary Gift Box (3 Honey Wheat Cake Set)

name: Blue Soul Crystal: Stage 13
description: Blue Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 13. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. Every time it is used, it consumes 26 of MP. name: Food for Wyvern
description: When the hunger gauge of a wyvern drops to 55% or below, its food will be consumed automatically.

name: Mixing Manual
description: A manual received from Magic Trader Wesley, with instructions for using the material mixing urn located in the basement of  the Ivory Tower.

name: Blood Fire
description: Dark flames from Purgatory. The only way to melt true gold.

name: Mimir's Elixir
description: A legendary elixir said to bestow ultimate wisdom. Take it to Magister Ladd.

name: Pure Silver
description: An essential ingredient of Mimir's Elixir. Take it to Magister Ladd.

name: True Gold
description: An essential ingredient of Mimir's Elixir. Take it to Magister Ladd.

name: Sage's Stone
description: An essential ingredient of Mimir's Elixir. Take it to Magister Joan.

name: Amulet: Pa'agrio's Honor
description: Amulet required for the Pa'agrio's Honor spell. Used by Overlords.\\nRequired level: 66

name: Amulet: Ritual of Life
description: Amulet required for the Ritual of Life spell. Used by Overlords.\\nRequired level: 64

name: Spellbook: Prayer
description: Spellbook needed to learn Prayer. Used by Bishops.\\nRequired level: 66

name: Blue Gemstone
description: A gemstone obtained from gremlins. Take it to a newbie helper.

name: Blue Seal Stone
description: A fragment of an ancient seal. Collect them all. Valued at 3 Ancient Adena.

name: Green Seal Stone
description: A fragment of an ancient seal. Collect them all to break the seal. Valued at 5 Ancient Adena.

name: Red Seal Stone
description: A fragment of an ancient seal. Collect them all to break the seal. Valued at 10 Ancient Adena.

name: Stolen Infernium Ore
description: Infernium ore once owned by the Iron Gate Guild. Take it to Warehouse Keeper Romp of Town of Aden to play bingo.

name: Blessed Scroll of Resurrection for Pets
description: A magic scroll that resurrects a dead pet and restores its Exp. completely.

name: Lord of the Manor's Certificate of Approval
description: This certificate allows the bearer to join the Lords of Dawn without belonging to a castle-owning clan.

name: Squash Seed
description: Squish Your Squash Event - Double-click it and a young squash will appear.

name: Large Squash Seed
description: Squish Your Squash Event - Double-click it and a large young squash will appear.

name: Nectar
description: L2 Gourd & Watermelon Event - Used to exchange with Puss the Cat for gourd seeds and watermelon seeds or for growing gourds and watermelons.

name: Event - Medal
description: L2 Medal Collection Event - If you take it to an Event Manager, he will trade it for a prize item of your choice.

name: Event - Glittering Medal
description: L2 Medal Collection Event - It is used to raise the grade of a collector during the event.

name: Amulet: Chant of Predator
description: Amulet required for the Chant of Predator spell. Used by Warcryers.\\nRequired level: 48

name: Amulet: Chant of Eagle
description: Amulet needed to learn the Chant of Eagle incantation. Used by Warcryers.\\nRequired level: 48

name: Amulet: Chant of Vampire
description: Amulet required for the Chant of Vampire spell. Used by Warcryers.\\nRequired level: 44

name: Spellbook: Body of Avatar
description: Spellbook needed to learn Body of Avatar. Used by Bishops.\\nRequired level: 48

name: Badge of Rabbit
description: The badge that indicates that its bearer's event collector grade is "rabbit."  Without this badge, one cannot prove one'S-Grade.

name: Badge of Hyena
description: The badge that indicates that its bearer's event collector grade is "hyena."  Without this badge, one cannot prove one'S-Grade.

name: Badge of Fox
description: The badge that indicates that its bearer's event collector grade is "fox."  Without this badge, one cannot prove one'S-Grade.

name: Badge of Wolf
description: The badge that indicates that its bearer's event collector grade is "wolf."  Without this badge, one cannot prove one'S-Grade.

name: Star Shard
description: Starlight Festival Event – A gift from the sky. When it is thrown, it creates a small explosion. Can be used as an ingredient to make other types of fireworks.

name: Gunpowder
description: Starlight Festival Event - Black powder. An ingredient used to make larger fireworks.

name: Magnesium
description: Starlight Festival Event - A chemical compound that generates a powerful flash when ignited. It is needed to make large fireworks.

name: Firework
description: An explosive device that brilliantly lights up the sky.

name: Large Firework
description: A large explosive device that ignites to light up the sky.

name: 2006 Battle Tournament - CP Potion
description: Restores CP by 200.

name: 2006 Battle Tournament - Quick Healing Potion
description: A magical potion that quickly restores HP. However, its effects do not last.

name: Event bait
description: Bait for fishing that increases chance of getting the treasure chest.

name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (A-Grade)
description: Increases P. Atk. of an A-Grade weapons such as sword/one-handed, blunt/one handed, dagger, spear and etc. type by 4. P. Atk. of sword/two-handed, blunt/two-handed, dual swords, and fists type will increase by 5 and bow type by 8. The M.Atk of all weapons will increase by 3. From +4, the added bonuses for P.Atk/M.Atk are double the above value. When fail on enchanting, item does not get crystallized but it's enchant value will return to 0.

name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Armor (A-Grade)
description: Increases P. Def. of A-Grade armor or accessory. Can be safely enchanted up to +3, although 1-piece armor can be enchanted up to +4. Also increases HP when armor is enchanted above +4.

name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (B-Grade)
description: Increases P. Atk. of a B-Grade weapons such as sword/one-handed, blunt/one handed, dagger, spear and etc. type by 3. P. Atk. of sword/two-handed, blunt/two-handed, dual swords, and fists type will increase by 4 and bow type by 6. The M.Atk of all weapons will increase by 3. From +4, the added bonuses for P.Atk/M.Atk are double the above value. When fail on enchanting, item does not get crystallized but it's enchant value will return to 0.

name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Armor (B-Grade)
description: Increases P. Def. of B-Grade armor or accessory. Can be safely enchanted up to +3, although 1-piece armor can be enchanted up to +4. Also increases HP when armor is enchanted above +4.

name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (C-Grade)
description: Increases P. Atk. of a C-Grade weapons such as sword/one-handed, blunt/one handed, dagger, spear and etc. type by 3. P. Atk. of sword/two-handed, blunt/two-handed, dual swords, and fists type will increase by 4 and bow type by 6. The M.Atk of all weapons will increase by 3. From +4, the added bonuses for P.Atk/M.Atk are double the above value. When fail on enchanting, item does not get crystallized but it's enchant value will return to 0.

name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Armor (C-Grade)
description: Increases P. Def. of C-Grade armor or accessory. Can be safely enchanted up to +3, although 1-piece armor can be enchanted up to +4. Also increases HP when armor is enchanted above +4.

name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (D-Grade)
description: Increases P. Atk. of a D-Grade weapons such as sword/one-handed, blunt/one handed, dagger, spear, sword/two-handed, blunt/two-handed, dual swords, and fists, etc. type will increase by 2 and bow type by 4. The M.Atk of all weapons will increase by 2. From +4, the added bonuses for P.Atk/M.Atk are double the above value. When fail on enchanting, item does not get crystallized but it's enchant value will return to 0.

name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Armor (D-Grade)
description: Increases P. Def. of D-Grade armor or accessory. Can be safely enchanted up to +3, although 1-piece armor can be enchanted up to +4. Also increases HP when armor is enchanted above +4.

Atk. of sword/two-handed, blunt/two-handed, dual swords, and fists type will increase by 6 and bow type by 10. The M.Atk of all weapons will increase by 4. From +4, the added bonuses for P.Atk/M.Atk are double the above value. When fail on enchanting, item does not get crystallized but it's enchant value will return to 0.

name: Old Golden Spice
description: Food for creatures on the Beast Farm. - When this food is fed to monsters that are capable of evolving, they will do so at various rates. Once a monster reaches a certain level of growth, it can then become a pet. This food also causes monsters to only drop adena.

name: Old Crystal Spice
description: Food for creatures on the Beast Farm. - When this food is fed to monsters that are capable of evolving, they will do so at various rates. Once a monster reaches a certain level of growth, it can then become a pet. This food also causes monsters to only drop materials.

name: Beast Soulshot
description: The light of a spirit is bestowed upon a pet/servitor and temporarily increases the power of attack. The number of soulshots consumed can be viewed in the Pet/Servitor Information window. (Used in the master's inventory.)

name: Beast Spiritshot
description: The light of a spirit is bestowed upon a pet/servitor and temporarily increases the power of M. Atk. The number of spiritshots consumed can be viewed in the Pet/Servitor Information window. (Used in the master's inventory.)

name: Blessed Beast Spiritshot
description: The light of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a pet/servitor and temporarily increases the power of M. Atk. The number of blessed spiritshots consumed can be viewed in the Pet/Servitor Information window. (Used in the master's inventory.)

name: Baby Buffalo Panpipe

name: Baby Cougar Chime

name: Baby Kookaburra Ocarina
