name: Fruit Basket
description: A basket full of fruit. Emily asked you to bring it to her.

name: Avellan Spice
description: Spice imported from Avella. Has a special fragrance. Emily asked you to bring it to her.

name: Honey Pouch
description: Well sealed pouch of honey collected from bees. Take this to Emily.

name: Bracelet of Lizardman
description: A bracelet that Leto Lizardman wears. Take this to Guard Rath in Town of Giran.

name: Cross of Einhasad
description: A holy item that was found in the Forest of the Dead. Take this to the priest of the Rune Township.

name: Cross of Einhasad
description: A holy cross that was found in the Forest of the Dead. The Priest of the Rune Township returned it to you. Take this to Dark Elf Magister Tifaren.

name: Lost Skull of Elf
description: A skull of an elf that Grand Magister Tifaren asked you to bring.

name: Letter of Innocentin
description: A contract between High Priest Innocentin and the dead explorer is in this letter.

name: Jewel of Adventurer
description: Jewel that the explorer possessed. The color of jewel changes by the explorer's call.

name: Jewel of Adventurer
description: Jewel that the explorer possessed. The color of jewel changes by the explorer's call.

name: Sealed Report Box
description: Explorer's report box. It is sealed multiple times. Take this to the ghost of explorer.

name: Report Box
description: Explorer's report box. The box is locked. Take this to High Priest Innocentin.

name: Lidia's Hairpin
description: Lidia's hair pin that has moonlight flower shape.

name: Silver Key
description: A silver spear is engraved on this key. There must be a lock that can be opened with this key.

name: Silver Spear
description: A reward that is given to the family with highest merit by the royal member of Elmore land. It is a model spear thus it has no P. Atk.

name: Suspicious Totem Doll
description: A totem doll you have obtained while hunting black magi according to the instructions of Lidia's maid. Take this to the mysterious magus and question him.

name: Flower Bouquet
description: A flower bouquet that Dorian asked you to lay at the gravestone in the south.

name: Silver Cross of Einhasad
description: A talisman given by Dorian. He asked you to find information about the monsters that appear in the Forest of the Dead at night.

name: Broken Silver Cross of Einhasad
description: A talisman given by Dorian. It seems to have been cracked by a powerful force.

name: Lidia's Dress
description: A red dress that was unearthed from the grave of Rose. It exhibits an aristocratic taste.

name: Suspicious Totem Doll
description: The totem doll that was returned by the mysterious magus. Take it to the priests of the Rune Township and question them about it.

name: Gemstone Key
description: A gemstone studded key. It has a nickname of "bejeweled staff" that indicates the authority of the king.

name: Suspicious Totem Doll
description: A suspicious totem doll that one obtains after slaying the underlings of Triol.

name: Box of Cookies
description: Well sealed box of cookies.

name: Luxury Wine
description: Premium wine that is on delivery.

name: Skein of Yarn
description: Yarn made of twisted spider web. Tenacious and sturdy.

name: Rough Jewel
description: Rough stone of jewel. Becomes a beautiful jewel when processed.

name: Enchanted Iron
description: Sturdier than generic iron. Tools made of this iron are said to be priceless.

name: Signet Ring
description: A seal that represents noble family.

name: Map
description: A map that is drawn for Miki the Cat.

name: Medicinal Herb
description: A medicinal herb that Miki the Cat found in Devil's Isle. Gentler is in need of this herb.

name: Crystal of Seal
description: A crystal that is used to activate the sealing in the altar.

name: Blood of Saint
description: Saint's blood that has power of holiness.

name: Blood of Saint
description: The blood obtained at the time of Kel Mahum's death. It contains the power of Einhasad.

name: Seal of Light
description: A seal from a Mysterious Necromancer. It uses the power of light.

name: Bead of Obedience
description: A gem from Kel Mahum that has power of Einhasad.

name: Gem of Saints
description: A gem that is left after the cremation of a saint. It has power of holiness.

name: Feather Ornament
description: A warrior symbol for Langk Lizardman.

name: Tooth of Totem
description: A tooth that has mysterious power.

name: Tooth of Dragon
description: A tooth of Langk Lizardman Commanders that strengthens their warriors.

name: Letter of Iris
description: A letter from Iris to Magister Rohmer in the Town of Gludio.

name: Letter of Rohmer
description: A letter from Rohmer to Magister Iris in Gludin Village.

name: Black Bone Necklace
description: A charm of Maille Lizardman Warriors.

name: Red Bone Necklace
description: A charm of Maille Lizardman Commanders.

name: Incense Pouch
description: A pouch of incense with mysterious scent.

name: Gem of Maille Lizardman
description: A gem of Maille Lizardman that has mysterious power.

name: Patrol's Report
description: A report from Guard Praga to Magister Rohmer.

name: Shining Gem
description: A gem that controls Araneid.

name: Shining Red Gem
description: A gem in Araneid's head that controls them.

name: Jewel of Innocence
description: A white jewel from the beast that brings back fond memories.

name: Horn of Buffalo
description: Buffalo horn fragments used by Ketra Orcs as currency.

name: Nepenthes Seed
description: Nepenthes seed used by Varka Silenos as currency.

name: Proof of Avenger
description: Certificate acquired when one becomes an avenger.

name: Eye of Darkness
description: A mark that proves membership of Daimon's family.

name: Evil Spirit of Darkness
description: An object substantiating the intrinsic darkness of Daimon the White-Eyed.

name: Broken Crystal
description: A fraction of the crystal used to summon Daimon.

name: Unfinished Summon Crystal
description: A fraction of the crystal used to summon Daimon. Still in an unfinished state.

name: Summon Crystal
description: A crystal used to summon Daimon. Emits golden shine.

name: Essence of Daimon
description: A crystal of darkness that constitutes Daimon.

name: Boiled Eggs
description: Delicious eggs boiled in spring water.

name: Fee of Boiled Egg
description: Price of the boiled egg.

name: Special Drink
description: Special drink at hot springs.

name: Fee of Special Drink
description: Price of the special drink.

name: Leaf of Flava
description: Rare ingredient for food.

name: Buffalo Meat
description: Rare ingredient for food.

name: Antelope Horn
description: Rare ingredient for food.

name: Trunk of Nepenthes
description: Rare ingredient for food.

name: Foot of Bandersnatchling
description: Rare ingredient for food.

name: Secret Spice
description: Piquant smelling spice.

name: Soy Sauce Jar
description: Sauce imported across the sea from the Gracian Kingdom.

name: Boiled Eggs for Delivery
description: Delicious egg boiled in spring water.

name: Special Drink for Delivery
description: Special drink at hot springs.

name: Hot Food Box
description: Box of delicious food. Very hot.

name: Food for Bumbalump
description: Favorite food of Icicle Prince Bumbalump.

name: Special Yeti Meat
description: Legendary ingredient that can only be attained from the strongest Yeti.

name: Mark of Ketra's Alliance - Level 1
description: A necklace given to those who build an alliance with the Ketra Orc Tribe. Stage 1 - Prudent alliance relations.

name: Mark of Ketra's Alliance - Level 2
description: A necklace given to those who build an alliance with the Ketra Orc Tribe. Stage 2 - Dependent alliance relations.

name: Mark of Ketra's Alliance - Level 3
description: A necklace given to those who build an alliance with the Ketra Orc Tribe. Stage 3 - Friendly alliance relations.

name: Mark of Ketra's Alliance - Level 4
description: A necklace given to those who build an alliance with the Ketra Orc Tribe. Stage 4 - Firm alliance relations.

name: Mark of Ketra's Alliance - Level 5
description: A necklace given to those who build an alliance with the Ketra Orc Tribe. Stage 5 - Steadfast firm alliance relations.

name: Varka's Badge - Soldier
description: A badge attained by slaying Varka Silenos Soldiers.

name: Varka's Badge - Captain
description: A badge attained by slaying Varka Silenos Captains.

name: Varka's Badge - General
description: A badge attained by slaying Varka Silenos Generals.

name: Totem of Valor
description: A totem presented to the warriors of the Ketra Orc tribe to attest their valor.

name: Totem of Wisdom
description: A totem presented to the warriors of the Ketra Orc tribe to attest their wisdom.

name: Mark of Varka's Alliance - Level 1
description: A charm given to those who build an alliance with the Varka tribe. Stage 1 - Prudent alliance relations.

name: Mark of Varka's Alliance - Level 2
description: A charm given to those who build an alliance with the Varka tribe. Stage 2 - Dependent alliance relations.

name: Mark of Varka's Alliance - Level 3
description: A charm given to those who build an alliance with the Varka tribe. Stage 3 - Friendly alliance relations.

name: Mark of Varka's Alliance - Level 4
description: A charm given to those who build an alliance with the Varka tribe. Stage 4 - Firm alliance relations.

name: Mark of Varka's Alliance - Level 5
description: A charm given to those who build an alliance with the Varka tribe. Stage 5 - Steadfast firm alliance relations.

name: Ketra's Badge - Soldier
description: A badge attained by slaying Ketra Orc Soldiers.

name: Ketra's Badge - Captain
description: A badge attained by slaying Ketra Orc Captains.

name: Ketra's Badge - General
description: A badge attained by slaying Ketra Orc Generals.

name: Feather of Valor
description: A feather presented to the warriors of Varka Silenos tribe to attest their valor.

name: Feather of Wisdom
description: A feather presented to the warriors of Varka Silenos tribe to attest their wisdom.

name: Munitions Box
description: A munitions box that is on delivery to Ketra Orc tribe.

name: Munitions Box
description: A munitions box that is on delivery to Varka Silenos tribe.

name: Varka's Mane
description: A mane attained from slaying Varka Silenos.

name: Molar of Ketra Orc
description: A molar attained from slaying Ketra Orcs.

name: Head of Shadith
description: A proof of slaying Shadith.

name: Head of Mos
description: A proof of slaying Mos.

name: Stolen Green Totem
description: A stolen green totem from the post of Varka Silenos.

name: Green Totem
description: A totem used to summon Water Spirit Ashutar.

name: Ice Heart of Ashutar
description: A crystalline shard of ice attained from slaying Water Spirit Ashutar.

name: Head of Hekaton
description: A proof of slaying the Hero of Ketra, Hekaton.

name: Head of Tayr
description: A proof of slaying the Commander of Ketra, Tayr.

name: Stolen Red Totem
description: A stolen red totem from the base of Ketra Orcs.

name: Red Totem
description: A totem used to summon Fire Spirit Nastron.

name: Fire Heart of Nastron
description: A Spirit, ore of fire attained from slaying Fire Spirit Nastron.

name: Supply Box
description: A supply box that is on delivery to Golden Ram Army.

name: Golden Ram Badge - Recruit
description: A badge that is given to recruits of Golden Ram Army.

name: Golden Ram Badge - Soldier
description: A badge that is given to soldiers of Golden Ram Army.

name: Splinter Stakato Chitin
description: A striped chitin from Splinter Stakatos.

name: Needle Stakato Chitin
description: A striped chitin from Needle Stakatos.

name: Talon of Stakato
description: A talon from Stakatos in Swamp of Scream.

name: Golden Ram Coin
description: A coin used by Golden Ram Army as currency.

name: Krorin's Journal
description: A journal found in body of Krorin.

name: Letter to Archaeologist
description: A letter to an archaeologist who left to Imperial Tomb to explore.

name: Broken Relic Part
description: A fragment of relic found in Imperial Tomb. Looks like it has no value because it is broken.

name: Sealed Box
description: A sealed box found in the 4th sepulcher. This box is sealed with a mysterious power.

name: Goblet of Alectia
description: A goblet attained by slaying Shadow of Halisha in the 4th sepulcher.

name: Goblet of Tishas
description: A goblet attained by slaying Shadow of Halisha in the 4th sepulcher.

name: Goblet of Mekara
description: A goblet attained by slaying Shadow of Halisha in the 4th sepulcher.

name: Goblet of Morigul
description: A goblet attained by slaying Shadow of Halisha in the 4th sepulcher.

name: Chapel Key
description: A key used to open the chapel door.

name: Used Grave Pass
description: A used pass necessary for entry into the 4th sepulcher at the Imperial Tomb. Cannot be used again. It may be useful when meeting the ghost of Elmoreden Chamberlain.

name: Antique Brooch
description: A luxurious looking old brooch that displays a magnificent symbol. It may be useful when meeting the Nameless Spirit.

name: Package to Vulcan
description: A package that needs to be delivered to Vulcan who's in Valakas' Cave.

name: Torch
description: A torch that Vulcan requested to collect.

name: Vacualite Ore
description: A ore required to make Vacualite.

name: Vacualite
description: Complete Vacualite. Take it to Klein.

name: Vacualite Floating Stone
description: Stone needed to reach the entrance to the Hall of Flames. If you bring it and speak to Valakas' Watcher Klein, you will be permitted to go up to the entrance to the Hall of Flames.

description: A mysterious wine made with using an Ice Crystal.

name: Donath's' Dish
description: A dish made by Donath.

name: Donath's' Note - Vol.1
description: A note that has cooking tips written by Donath.

name: Shaved Ice
description: Lilly's most favorite dessert that is made of a mixture of shaved ice and sweet flavorings.

name: Ice Cream
description: Sweet, soft and cold scoop of ice cream.

name: Ice Crystal Gemstone
description: When sunlight reflects on it, it shines brightly with a rainbow of colors.

name: Offering
description: Food that is dedicated to Saint Agnes. It is tightly sealed to preserve its freshness.

name: Offering
description: Food that is dedicated to Saint Agnes. It is tightly sealed to preserve its freshness.

description: Food that is dedicated to Saint Agnes. It is tightly sealed to preserve its freshness.

name: Ancient Language Dictionary
description: A dictionary that is used to decipher an ancient language.

name: Ancient Language Dictionary
description: A dictionary that is used to decipher an ancient language.

name: Spinneret
description: A spider's anatomical structure from which spider web is produced.

name: Investigative Report
description: A document received from Information Broker Mist. It contains the results of an investigation requested by Magister Justin.

name: Investigative Report
description: A document received from Information Broker Mist. It contains the results of an investigation requested by Magister Alminas.

name: Investigative Report
description: A document received from Information Broker Mist. It contains the results of an investigation requested by Magister Kamilen.

name: Investigative Report
description: A document received from Information Broker Bavarin. It contains the results of an investigation requested by Guard Baird.

name: Investigative Report
description: A document received from Information Broker Mist. It contains the results of an investigation requested by High Priest Gregory.

name: Ice Cold Flower
description: An ice crystal that is wrapped in fish scales and emits cold, icy air. Since it is beautifully created with a highly skilled hand, it looks like a flower.

name: Pure Ice
description: A chunk of purest ice that is made by freezing purified water. It is known to contain the power of the gods from the beginning of the world.

name: Bitter Cold Beer
description: The beer requested by Blacksmith Feynn. Just touching it makes your hands feel like they are freezing.

name: Multiple Course Meal
description: An elaborate meal requested by the Arena Manager. It is said to be eaten by duelists in ancient times to strengthen their stamina the day before their match.

name: Dead Souls Fish Soup
description: A soup that is supposed to contain all the nutrition of the fish it is made from. According to legend, depending on the fish you use to make it, it can have the effect of increasing or decreasing one's lifespan.

name: Bitter Cold Vodka
description: A legendary liquor that is made by dipping hot flames into cold, freezing ice. Although it feels cold to the lips it becomes hot in one's body.

name: Silver Crystal
description: The type of crystal that is needed to store wedding march music.

name: Red Crystal
description: The type of crystal that is needed to store birthday party music.

name: Vampire's Heart
description: The heart that is ripped out of the body of a vampire. It is still beating and pumping out blood.

name: Zombie's Brain
description: A piece of brain collected from an undead monster in the Forest of the Dead. It may contain the memory of the moment of its death.

name: Rib Bone of a Black Magus
description: The remaining bone that is left in the place where a necromancer died and disappeared. Perhaps it was used to transfix the shape of the necromancer.

name: Zombie's Liver
description: A liver that is rotting and emitting a strong stench. It is known to be a source of magical power of undead.

name: Top Quality Meat
description: A piece of top quality meat that is obtained by slaughtering a wild beast of proper age. Only one piece of this high quality meat can be obtained from one beast.

name: Young Wild Beast Meat
description: A piece of meat obtained by slaughtering a wild beast that is too young. Although it may have a pleasant aroma, it doesn't give good flavor when eating it.

name: Map Piece
description: A piece of a map that was once possessed by Monster Eyes.

name: Yellow Map
description: A map that contains a plot of the beasts. Take it to Mercenary Captain Sophya.

name: Map Piece
description: A piece of map obtained from the ghostly apparitions that haunt the Execution Grounds.

name: Ivory Colored Map
description: A map that contains strange information. By the way, sometime ago, Trader Galladucci complained that one of the maps he was supposed to receive didn't arrive...?

name: Broken Gemstone Fragment
description: A fragment of gemstone that can be obtained by hunting Maille Lizardmen.

name: Gold Colored Gemstone
description: A gold colored orb. High Priest Drikus is supposed to be looking for it.

name: Scroll of Escape: Talking Island Village
description: A magical scroll that relocates you to Talking Island.

name: Scroll of Escape: Elven Village
description: A magical scroll that relocates you to Elven Village.

name: Scroll of Escape: Dark Elven Village
description: A magical scroll that relocates you to Dark Elven Village.

name: Scroll of Escape: Orc Village
description: A magical scroll that relocates you to Orc Village.

name: Scroll of Escape: Dwarven Village
description: A magical scroll that relocates you to Dwarven Village.

name: Scroll of Escape: Town of Giran
description: A magical scroll that relocates you to Town of Giran.

name: Fishing Manual
description: An instructional book of fishing techniques. You can double-click it to read it.

name: Dimensional Diamond
description: A crystal that is filled with magical power. It is needed when casting Teleportation magic. If you collect this item and take them to a gatekeeper, you can trade them for various types of Scroll of Escape.

name: Galladucci's Order (Document)
description: A document with Galladucci's trader order. Take it to Trader Gentler at his magic shop.

name: Galladucci's Order (Document)
description: A document with Galladucci's trader order. Take it to Jeweler Sandra at her shop.

name: Galladucci's Order (Document)
description: A document with Galladucci's order. Take it to Priest Dustin at his shop.

name: Purified Magic Necklace
description: It's the item given by Priest Dustin. It seems to be the item Trader Galladucci has been looking for.

name: Gemstone Powder
description: The item given by Jeweler Sandra. This seems to be the item Trader Galladucci has been looking for.

name: Magic Sword Hilt
description: An item given by Trader Gentler. This seems to be the item Trader Galladucci has been looking for.

name: Four-leaf Golden Clover Coin
description: A gold coin that is engraved with a four-leaf clover design.

name: Mark of Traveler
description: A certificate to prove to Trader Galladucci the traveler's identity.

name: Baulro's Letter
description: The letter sent by Magister Baulro to Archon Sir Windawood.

name: Ariel's Recommendation
description: A letter of recommendation Trader Ariel wrote for you to be sent to Hierarch Asterios.

name: Roselyn's Note
description: A note Roselyn wrote while being angry and wrathful. You should deliver it to Magister Harne.

name: Very Expensive Necklace
description: A gift from Head Blacksmith Reed for Priest of the Earth Gerald. It looks very expensive.

name: Draconic Bow Shaft
description: Main ingredient essentially required for a Dwarf to make a Draconic Bow. Can also be sold at ordinary shops.

name: Recipe: Draconic Bow (60%)
description: For Dwarves only. The recipe for a Draconic Bow. Requires Create Item - Skill Level 9. The success rate is 60%.

name: Recipe: Draconic Bow (100%)
description: For Dwarves only. The recipe for a Draconic Bow. Requires Create Item - Skill Level 9. The success rate is 100%.

name: Baby Spice
description: When the food gauge of a baby buffalo, a baby cougar or a baby kookaburra drops to 55% or below, this feed will be consumed automatically.

name: Sweet Fluid
description: A type of fluid with a sweet fragrance. It is used as an ingredient to make a fishing shot.

name: Legend of Seventeen
description: A record of the seventeen heroes who fought against Antharas, the Land Dragon.

name: Faded Poetry Book
description: A poetry book written by an unknown Elven bard several hundred years ago.

name: Echo Crystal - Forgotten Song
description: An echo crystal that contains the song of Forgotten Heroes.

name: Strand of Golden Hair
description: A strand of hair that seems to have fallen from a blonde-haired lady.

name: Ring of Goddess: Waterbinder
description: Ring with a subtle blue gem. When picked up, it makes a sound like a flowing brook.

name: Necklace of Goddess: EverGreen
description: A necklace with a clear and bright bluish green crystal as a medallion. The moment when you hold it in your hand, you smell the scent of grass,  wet with spring rain.

name: Staff of Goddess: Rain Song
description: A wooden staff that is embedded with a light blue orb at the top of it. It gives you a feeling of an ocean breeze filled with moisture blowing gently in your face.

name: Relic Box
description: Box containing 3 relics of Goddess

name: Orb of Binding
description: A silver colored orb that emanates a strong feeling of magical power.

name: Sorcery Ingredient
description: A sorcery ingredient that is used by Witch  Kalis.

name: Malruk Succubus Claw
description: Thin and sharp claw obtained from Malruk Succubus

name: Crimson Moss
description: Crimson Moss obtained from Swamp of Screams

name: Rahorakti's Miraculous Medicine
description: Remedy prescribed by Grand Seer Rahorakti for Dwarf Girl Kassandra

name: Worn Tarot Card - Wealth
description: An old and worn out tarot card given by the Lady of the Lake. This card symbolizes wealth.

name: Worn Tarot Card - Power
description: An old and worn out tarot card given by the Lady of the Lake. This card symbolizes power.

name: Worn Tarot Card - Love
description: An old and worn out tarot card given by the Lady of the Lake. This card symbolizes love.

name: Worn Tarot Card - Knowledge
description: An old and worn out tarot card given by the Lady of the Lake. This card symbolizes knowledge.

name: Summoner Keats' Letter
description: A clumsily written letter written by Summoner Keats who was turned into a frog.

name: Miracle Potion of Transferred Life
description: An Elven miracle cure mixed by Priest Cerenas.

name: Kamilen's Antidote
description: A medicine made by Magister Kamilen to cure Summoner Noctisse.

name: Coolant of the Repaired Wilma #3
description: The cooling system refrigerant of repaired time machine "Wilma 3".

name: Sealed Envelope
description: A sealed envelope given by Information Broker Bavarin.

name: Proof of Catching a Fish
description: A fishing certificate. If you collect it and take it to a member of the Fishermen's Guild, you can learn a skill that is related to expanding a slot.

name: Wind Fishing Lure
description: A lure that was given out by Lanosco. It contains the hidden power of wind. It is not easy to use this lure. Only those who are highly skilled in fishing should use it.

name: Icy Air Fishing Lure
description: A lure that was given out by O'Fulle. It contains the hidden power of icy air. It is not easy to use this lure. Only those who are highly skilled in fishing should use it.

name: Earth Fishing Lure
description: A lure that was given out by Willie. It contains the hidden power of earth. It is not easy to use this lure. Only those who are highly skilled in fishing should use it.

name: Flaming Fishing Lure
description: A lure that was given out by Linnaeus. It contains the hidden power of flames. It is not easy to use this lure. Only those who are highly skilled in fishing should use it.

name: Chest Caught by Wind Fishing Lure
description: A chest that was brought up out of the bait of wind by using the wind fishing lure.

name: Chest Caught by Icy Air Fishing Lure
description: A chest that was brought up out of the bait of icy air by using the wind fishing lure.

name: Chest Caught by Earth Fishing Lure
description: A chest that was brought up out of the bait of earth by using the wind fishing lure.

name: Chest Caught by using a Flaming Fishing Lure
description: A chest that was brought up out of the bait of fire water by using the wind fishing lure.

name: Scroll of Escape: Ketra Orc Village
description: A magical scroll that relocates you to Ketra Orc Village. Cannot be sold in shops.

name: Scroll of Escape: Varka Silenos Village
description: A magical scroll that relocates you to Varka Silenos Village. Cannot be sold in shops.

name: Trash
description: Saint's blood that has power of holiness.

name: Essence of Wind
description: Essence of wind extracted from Singing Wind. It is an item requested by Lanosco.

name: Lost Bait Ingredient
description: The lost bait that was recovered from a Fettered Soul. O'Fulle asked you to bring it back to him.

name: Eye of Tarlk Basilisk
description: An eye harvested from a Tarlk Basilisk. Willie asked you to bring it back to him.

name: Crimson Drake Heart
description: Heart of a Crimson Drake surrounded by flames. Linnaeus asked you to bring it back to him.

name: Strange Golem Blueprint
description: A golem blueprint with an unusual design that is different from any other golem blueprint. It seems to be designed by Shaling.

name: Kiki's Letter
description: A completely sealed letter. On the envelope,  Kiki's name is written as its recipient.

name: Small Glass Box
description: A beautiful box made of glass. It is engraved with the names of Anabel and Liesel.

name: Rukal's Musical Score
description: A musical score of  beautiful music. Its author is written down as Composer Rukal.

name: Looted Goods - White Cargo box

description: Pouch looted from a trader's wagon. Seems to have valuable goods. Double-click to see the contents.

name: Key of Splendor Room

name: Silver Hemocyte
description: The Ice Queen's pets' favorite food.

name: Lockup Research Report
description: Dr. Chaos's research report. It's locked.

name: Research Report
description: Unlock the padlock to read Dr. Chaos's research report.

name: Key of Enigma
description: The small journal key that was included with the memo.

name: Scribbled Memo
description: Dr. Chaos's research report.

name: Blood of Maille Lizardman
description: Blood obtained by killing Maille Lizardmen.

name: Leg of King Araneid
description: The legs obtained by defeating King Araneid.

name: Visitor's Mark
description: Permits entry to the Pagan Temple. Don't lose it!

name: Faded Visitor's Mark
description: This faded mark permits entry to the Pagan Temple.

name: Necromancer's Heart
description: Obtain this necromantic heart by slaying Bone Animators, Bone Slayers or Skull Animators.

name: Pagan's Mark
description: Permits entry and access to the chapel of the Pagan Temple.

name: Pagan Totem
description: The totem obtained by defeating the Pagans.

name: Monk's Scripture
description: The scripture obtained by defeating the monks within the Monastery of Silence.

name: Water Bottle
description: The bottle from Greymore. Pour the water into the Holy Grail in the Splendor Room and take it with you.

name: Bottle of water from the Holy Grail
description: The bottle containing the water from the Holy Grail in the Splendor Room. Take it to Greymore.

name: Antelope Skin
description: The exceptional hide needed to create the magical scroll.

name: Frintezza's Magic Force Field Removal Scroll
description: The scroll that permits passage though Frintezza's Magic Force Field. Meet his guide near the Imperial Tomb entrance and he will let you enter the forbidden area.

name: Watching Eyes
description: This "Wandering Eye" has been harassing the farmers of Floran. Take it to Almankel in Floran Village.

name: Roughly Hewn Rock Golem Shard
description: This is a fragment from a Roughly Hewn Rock Golem. Take it to Almankel in Floran Village.

name: Delu Lizardman's Scale
description: This is a scale of the Delu Lizardman that has been harassing the farmers of Floran. Take it to Almankel in Floran Village.

name: Silver Ice Crystal
description: A crystal obtained from a monster. When processed, it becomes the Black Ice Crystal.

name: Black Ice Crystal
description: When stuck into a target, the character becomes violent.

name: Misa's Letter
description: A secret letter from Misa to Rafforty. Don't break the seal!

name: Rafforty's Letter
description: A secret letter from Rafforty to Misa.

name: Piece of Tablet
description: An unknown tablet fragment.

name: Report Piece
description: A fragment of the report from the stone statue.

name: Scout's Memo
description: A scribbled note written by a scout searching the nest.

name: Crystal of Purity
description: This white crystal was expelled by a wild beast whose heart was pure.

name: Fang of Stakato
description: Fangs gained from killing Stakatos.

name: Box Containing the Fire of Holy Spirit
description: Box containing the Fire of the Holy Spirit

name: Cursed Doll
description: An enchanted doll that has been said to control the evil creatures of the Ragna Orcs.

name: Orc Grave Goods
description: Remains stolen by graverobbers.

name: Cursed Grave Goods
description: Items made by angry spirits to use physical force.

name: Electric Wave Detector

name: Electric Wave Detector
description: This rod lights up in the presence of strong electric waves. It is presently lit.

name: Telescope Golem's Corpse

name: Golem's Dispatcher
description: Dispatcher obtained from hunting the Telescope Golem.

name: Storage Medium

description: The storage medium taken from the Golem. It contains information.

name: Herb of Magic

name: Fisherman's Potion - Green
description: By lowering one's fishing skill level, this potion allows one to catch a green fish (level 1~3 fish). If one uses a potion that is designed for a higher fishing skill level than one's own, the potion will have no effect.

name: Fisherman's Potion - Jade
description: By lowering one's fishing skill level, this potion allows one to catch a jade fish (level 4~6 fish). If one uses a potion that is designed for a higher fishing skill level than one's own, the potion will have no effect.

name: Fisherman's Potion - Blue
description: By lowering one's fishing skill level, this potion allows one to catch a blue fish (level 7~9 fish). If one uses a potion that is designed for a higher fishing skill level than one's own, the potion will have no effect.

name: Fisherman's Potion - Yellow
description: By lowering one's fishing skill level, this potion allows one to catch a yellow fish (level 10~12 fish). If one uses a potion that is designed for a higher fishing skill level than one's own, the potion will have no effect.

name: Fisherman's Potion - Orange
description: By lowering one's fishing skill level, this potion allows one to catch an orange fish (level 13~15 fish). If one uses a potion that is designed for a higher fishing skill level than one's own, the potion will have no effect.

name: Fisherman's Potion - Purple
description: By lowering one's fishing skill level, this potion allows one to catch a purple fish (level 16~18 fish). If one uses a potion that is designed for a higher fishing skill level than one's own, the potion will have no effect.

name: Fisherman's Potion - Red
description: By lowering one's fishing skill level, this potion allows one to catch a red fish (level 19~21 fish). If one uses a potion that is designed for a higher fishing skill level than one's own, the potion will have no effect.

name: Fisherman's Potion - White
description: By lowering one's fishing skill level, this potion allows one to catch a white fish (level 22~24 fish). If one uses a potion that is designed for a higher fishing skill level than one's own, the potion will have no effect.

name: Fisherman's Potion - Black
description: By lowering one's fishing skill level, this potion allows one to catch a green fish (level 25~27 fish). If one uses a potion that is designed for a higher fishing skill level than one's own, the potion will have no effect.

name: Fisherman's Potion
description: Restores a player's fishing mastery level, which was lowered by the Fisherman's Potion, back to the previous level.

name: Seed: Sea Coba
description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Rune area and it will bear the fruit of the Sea Coba. For best results, a level 74-84 character must plant it on a level 74-84 monster.

name: Seed: Alternative Sea Coba
description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Rune area and it will bear the fruit of the Alternative Sea Coba. For best results, a level 74-84 character must plant it on a level 74-84 monster.

name: Seed: Twin Coba
description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Rune area and it will bear the fruit of the Twin Coba. For best results, a level 77-87 character must plant it on a level 77-87 monster.

name: Seed: Alternative Twin Coba
description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Rune area and it will bear the fruit of the Alternative Twin Coba. For best results, a level 77-87 character must plant it on a level 77-87 monster.

name: Seed: Great Coba
description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Rune area and it will bear the fruit of the Great Coba. For best results, a level 80-90 character must plant it on a level 80-90 monster.

name: Seed: Alternative Great Coba

name: Adventurer's Box: C-Grade Accessory (Low Grade)
description: Has a chance of containing a C-Grade, low quality accessory.

name: Adventurer's Box: C-Grade Accessory (Medium Grade)
description: Has a chance of containing a C-Grade, medium quality accessory.

name: Adventurer's Box: C-Grade Accessory (High Grade)
description: Has a chance of containing a C-Grade, high quality accessory.

name: Adventurer's Box: B-Grade Accessory (Low Grade)
description: Has a chance of containing a B-Grade, low quality accessory.

name: Adventurer's Box: B-Grade Accessory (High Grade)
description: Has a chance of containing a B-Grade, high quality accessory.

name: Adventurer's Box: Hair Accessory
description: Has a chance of containing a Raider's Hair Accessory.

name: Adventurer's Box: Cradle of Creation
description: Has a chance of containing a Cradle of Creation.

name: Newbie Travel Token
description: This token is used to help novice travelers move to various places. Characters under level 20 may redeem it at a Newbie Guide for travel between Talking Island Village, Dark Elven Village, Elven Village, Dwarven Village, Orc Village, and Kamael Village.

name: Bead Parcel
description: Take this parcel of woven beads to Warehouse Chief Yasheni in the Town of Schuttgart.

name: Timora Orc's Head
description: Severed head of the cowardly Timora Orc who betrayed his own tribe and joined the Ragna Orcs.

name: Kasha Spider's Tooth
description: This crooked spider's tooth was pulled out by hand during close combat.

name: Horn of Baar Dre Vanul
description: This smooth, flawless horn comes from Baar Dre Vanul, who inhabits the Immortal Plateau's Southern Region.

name: Old Box
description: An old box that can be caught by fishing in the Hot Springs area. If you double-click it, you can obtain the Certificate for Participation in a Clan Hall war in the Hot Springs at a certain rate of chance.

name: Hot Springs Lure
description: This fishing lure can be used to catch old box while fishing in the Hot Springs area in Goddard. Only characters with Fishing Mastery Level 20 or higher can haul in the old box.

name: Bruin Lizardman Blood
description: Blood obtained by slaying a Bruin Lizardman.

name: Picot Araneid's Leg
description: Leg obtained by slaying a Picot Araneid.

name: Box of Cheerleading Gear Used to encourage victory.
description: Box of Cheerleading Items for Cheering on the Red Devils. If you double-click it, it will randomly change to a different item.

name: Red Mask of Victory, Fabric
description: The essential ingredient needed to make a Mask of the Red Devils. It can be sold at a regular store.

name: Recipe: Red Mask of Victory (100%)
description: For All Tribes. Recipe for a Mask of the Red Devils. Requires Create Common Item Skill Level 4.

name: Echo Crystal - Viva Victory Korea
description: Echo Crystal that plays the theme music of the World Cup. It disappears after one use.

name: Dewdrop of Destruction
description: Clicking the Dewdrop of Destruction causes the portrait to disappear. It cannot be dropped, but is deleted upon entering the Last Imperial Tomb.

name: Event Gift Box
description: PC cafe coupon event item. When double clicked, it turns to another random item. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. (Can be used when the weight gauge is below 80% and there are more than 10 empty inventory slots.)

name: Weapon Exchange Coupon - No Grade
description: An item that is used for the PC Café coupon event. An exchange coupon that can be used to exchange for a no grade weapon at Adventurers' Guide.

name: Weapon Exchange Coupon (C-Grade)
description: An item that is used for the PC Café coupon event. An exchange coupon that can be used to exchange for a D grade weapon at Adventurers' Guide.

name: Scroll: Recovery (No Grade)
description: This scroll recovers a character's abilities from the effects of death. This item can only be used on self by a character of level 19 or below. This scroll cannot be used by chaotic characters.

name: Scroll: Recovery (Grade D)
description: This scroll recovers a character's abilities from the effects of death. This item can only be used on self by a character whose level is between 20 and 39. This scroll cannot be used by chaotic characters.

name: Scroll: Recovery (Grade C)
description: This scroll recovers a character's abilities from the effects of death. This item can only be used on self by a character whose level is between 40 and 51. This scroll cannot be used by chaotic characters.

name: Scroll: Recovery (Grade S)
description: This scroll recovers a character's abilities from the effects of death. This item can only be used by a character whose level is 76 or higher. This scroll cannot be used by chaotic characters.

name: Summoning Crystal
description: A crystal imbued with mystical power. Used for teleportation magic.

name: Spellbook: Summon Friend
description: Spellbook needed to learn Summon Friend. Used by Warlocks, Elemental Summoners and Phantom Summoners.\\nRequired level: 56

name: Spellbook: Word of Invitation
description: Spellbook needed to learn Word of Invitation. Used by Sorcerers, Spellsingers and Spellhowlers.

name: Ancient Book: Divine Inspiration (Modern Language Version)
description: Restores forgotten abilities. The book was re-published after being translated into the modern language. (Can only be used by characters level 52 or higher.)

name: Ancient Book: Divine Inspiration (Original Language Version)
description: Restores forgotten abilities. This book was published by ancient scholars for research purposes. It contains more information than the modern language version. (Can only be used by characters level 61 or higher.)

name: Ancient Book: Divine Inspiration (Manuscript)
description: Restores forgotten abilities. This book is a hand-written copy of the original. It is almost the same as the original version. (Can only be used by characters level 76 or higher.)

name: Ancient Book: Divine Inspiration (Original Version)
description: Awakens a forgotten ability. Those who lack the requisite knowledge cannot understand its contents. (Can only be used by characters level 76 or higher.)

name: Trap Stone
description: A stone used in the Elrokian Trap.

name: Red Gem
description: Shiny red gems collected by Warehouse Chief Klump of Town of Aden. You can play the card game if you bring Klump more than 50 of these gems.

name: Spirit Bead
description: Beads collected by Blacksmith Wilbert of Town of Aden. You can play the game if you bring him more than 50.

name: Tyrannosaurus Claw
description: This claw can be obtained by defeating a Tyrannosaurus.

name: Diary Fragment
description: This is a piece of a missing expedition member's diary. Deliver it to the expedition leader, Captain Marquez.

name: Expedition Member's Letter
description: This is a letter that a missing expedition member sent to his Elrokian friend Kirikachin. Deliver it to Kirikachin.

name: Ornithomimus Claw
description: Take this to Asamah, the chief's son.

name: Deinonychus Bone
description: Take this to Asamah, the chief's son.

name: Pachycephalosaurus Skin
description: Take this to Asamah, the chief's son.

name: Practice Elrokian Trap
description: Take this practice trap, which is necessary for learning a special Elrokian tribal skill, to Kirikachin.

name: Dinosaur Tissue
description: This Dinosaur Tissue is a research ingredient for magicians and Dwarven craftsmen.

name: Dinosaur Egg
description: This Dinosaur Egg is a research ingredient (along with Dinosaur Tissue) for magicians and Dwarven craftsmen.

name: Bones of a Plains Dinosaur
description: This is a research ingredient for Shilen's priests and magicians.

name: Ancient Creatures and How I Long To Be With Them
description: Found in Rune's main library, this book contains information about ancient creatures.

name: Mantarasa Egg
description: This mysterious item can cure any illness. It can be obtained in the Primeval Isle's Lost Nest.

name: Ornithomimus Claw
description: This dinosaur claw can be used by the Elrokian Shaman Karakawei to perform a special ritual.

name: Deinonychus Bone Fragment
description: This dinosaur bone fragment can be used by the Elrokian Shaman Karakawei to perform a special ritual.

name: Epitaph of Wisdom
description: This epitaph can be obtained from the Chuta Kaimu Pillar of Wisdom in the Lost Nest.

name: Gazkh Fragment
description: This is a fragment of the axe Gazkh that Shilen gave to the Elrokian warriors long ago.

name: Bone Powder
description: These ash-like remains of an ancient Elrokian warrior can be obtained after performing a memorial service at the Warrior's Grave.

name: Gazkh
description: This ancient axe, Gazkh, can be reformed by Shilen's Stone Statue. It is necessary to battle Sailren.

name: Dinosaur Fang Necklace
description: This necklace is the mark of the ancient Elrokians who raid the wharf.

name: Primeval Potion
description: Increases Resistance to poison and anesthesia.

name: Sprigant's Fruit
description: This fruit, dropped by Sprigants, increases Resistance to poison and anesthesia.

name: Ziggo's Gemstone
description: This bright, shiny gemstone looks as though it would fetch a good price if you sold it at the shop.

name: Shadow Item Exchange Coupon (D-Grade)
description: This exchange coupon allows you to obtain a D-Grade Shadow Item. Take it to a Grand Master for your occupation to exchange it for a shadow item.

name: Shadow Item Exchange Coupon (C-Grade)
description: This exchange coupon allows you to obtain a C-Grade Shadow Item. Take it to a Grand Master for your occupation to exchange it for a shadow item.

name: Strategy Guide
description: This book contains information about the methods and strategies used to lead a Command Channel. Use it to create a Command Channel.

name: Flash Gunpowder
description: This specially processed gunpowder doesn't create smoke. It is consumed while using the swoop cannon skill.

name: Phoenix Blood
description: A consumption item for using Soul of the Phoenix.

name: Einhasad's Holy Water
description: A consumption item for using Cleanse or Salvation.

name: Battle Symbol
description: A consumption item for using the skill learned with the Ancient Tactical Manual.

name: Magic Symbol
description: A consumption item for using the skill learned with the ancient spellbook.

name: Fire Stone
description: The power of fire increases by 5 when given to a weapon. The power of fire increases by 6 and the water resistance becomes stronger when given to armor. Element attribute can be given between the attribute level 1 and 3, and it cannot be given above level 3. In addition, maximum three types of attribute enhancing are possible. Opposite attributes cannot be endowed together.

name: Red Soul Crystal - Stage 14
description: Red Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 14. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. Every time it is used, it consumes 26 of MP. However, the Soul Crystal of this stage absorbs souls by itself, so there is no need for using the Soul Crystal to monsters.

name: Orders
description: These Ol Mahum Orders can be found in the deserted campground. Collect them, as well as Ol Mahum Organization Charts, and give them to Kamael Master Sione.

name: Organization Chart
description: This Ol Mahum Organization Chart can be found in the deserted campground. Collect them, as well as the Ol Mahum Orders, and give them to Kamael Master Sione.

name: Gobie's Orders
description: Based on documents of the Ol Mahum, these orders outline the strategy for facing them. It should be delivered to Kamael Master Gobie.

name: Letter to the Humans
description: This letter, written to the Human allies of the Kamael, should be delivered to Captain Bathis in the town of Gludio.

name: Humans' Reply

name: Letter to the Dark Elves

description: Magister Clayton has been searching for this material. If you bring him a sufficient amount, he will give you information.

name: Enmity Crystal Core
description: This magic item is made from Enmity Crystals. Give it to Blacksmith Poitan of Dion.

name: Manuscript Page
description: Warehouse Keeper Holvas is searching for these pages. Collect them all and give them to him.

name: Encoded Page on the Ancient Race
description: This coded document discusses new races. Holvas says that Kamael Grand Master Meldina can decode it.

name: Kamael Inquisitor Trainee Mark
description: Show this to Selsia, the head of the Kamael Intelligence Agency, to take the class transfer test.

name: Fragment of Attack Orders
description: Fragments of attack orders gathered by killing Grandis. Collect all the fragments to discover who is behind the attack.

name: Grandis' Attack Orders
description: Complete attack orders which say the attack was requested by Ivory Tower Magister Gaius. Let's interrogate Gaius with the request.

name: Manashen's Talisman
description: Pieces of a control charm obtained by killing Manashen. You may find out who controlled Manashen if you can find every piece of the charm.

name: Research on the Giants and the Ancient Race
description: This research document on the Giants' relationship to the hidden race was carried by Beleth's minion, the Crimson Duchess. Take it to Master Selsia.

name: Kamael Inquisitor Mark
description: This mark proves that you have successfully passed the Inquisitor test. Show it to a Kamael Grand Master to be transferred to Arbalester.

name: Echo Crystal of Free Thought
description: This crystal originally belonged to the Mother of Witches. Can be used to help a witch recover her memories.

name: Parme's Letter
description: This letter from the Witch of Water Dragon following the recovery of her memory should be delivered to Priest Karnis.

name: Refined Crystal Sample
description: This magic material sought by a Wizard who was sent to the Ivory Tower to keep Hellbound Island under observation. Give it to him and try to talk with him.

name: Stabilized Ectoplasm
description: Hardin requires this material for his studies on transformation magic. Deliver it to him to enable him to carry on with his experiments.

name: Ectoplasm
description: This material is necessary for creating stabilized ectoplasm, which can be used in transformation magic.

name: Hardin's Instructions
description: Written by Hardin concerning transformation magic, this should be delivered to Magister Clayton of Dion.

name: Glass Jaguar Crystal
description: One of the materials requested by Hardin. Deliver it to Magister Clayton.

name: Blank Sealbook
description: This empty, sealed letter can store powers and seals for Hardin's transformation magic. It should be delivered to Hardin.

name: Transform Sealbook: Onyx Beast
description: A sealed letter that carries powers and seals of initial transformation magic. If you give it to 2nd floor of the Ivory Tower to the Wizard of Transformation, you can be transformed.

name: Warehouse Manifest
description: A supply confirmation for a warehouse in Kamael. It should be delivered to Zerstorer Marcela.

name: Grocery Store Manifest
description: A supply confirmation for a Grocery Store in Kamael. It should be delivered to Zerstorer Marcela.

name: Weapon Shop Manifest
description: A supply confirmation for a Weapon Shop in Kamael. It should be delivered to Zerstorer Marcela.

name: Supply Report
description: Zerstorer Marcela's report on supplies. It should be delivered to Hierarch Casca.

name: Hills of Gold Monster Claw
description: The claw of a monster found in the Hills of Gold. It should be taken to Zerstorer Marcela.

name: Dungeon Leader Mark
description: A mark that signifies the leader of the monsters which appear in the Dungeon. It should be delivered to a Manager at the Fortress Monster Prison Camp.

name: Fragment of the Dungeon Leader Mark
description: A badge fragment that signifies a leader of the monsters which appear in the Dungeon. It should be delivered to a Manager at the Fortress Monster Prison Camp.

name: Wolf Tail
description: This tail possesses rich, luxurious fur.

name: Ranku's Blueprint
description: This is a blueprint belonging to Ranku that Matras requested.

name: Demon Prince's Blueprint
description: This is a blueprint belonging to a Demon Prince that Matras requested.

name: Safe Key
description: This key, crafted by Blacksmith Noel, should be given to Warehouse Chief Mona.

name: Sealed Document
description: This document was sent by Kaitnat to the Hierarch Casca.

name: Wyrm Heart
description: This is the heart of the Wyrm that Kekropus requested.

name: Kekropus' Recommendation
description: This letter of recommendation written by Kekropus should be shown to Bitus in Giran.

name: Soul Breaker Certificate
description: Show this Soul Breaker Certificate to a nearby Grand Master and you can become a Soul Breaker.

name: Wolf Tail
description: Perwan has requested this wolf tail for the Rite of Warriors.

name: Muertos Claw
description: Collect 10 of these sharp Muertos claws and take them to Kekropus.

name: Grey Keltir Tooth
description: Marksman Bixon will pay well for this Grey Keltir Tooth.

name: Black Wolf Tooth
description: Marksman Bixon will pay well for this tooth of a Black Wolf.

name: Fortress Certificate
description: Use this to trade for supplies with a Detention Camp Warden.

name: Castle Certificate
description: Use this to trade for supplies with a Prison Warden.

name: Memento Mori
description: Obtained by attacking a Raid Boss, you can assemble this Crystal of Life and trade it for something useful.

name: Dragon Heart
description: Obtained by attacking a Raid Boss, you can assemble this Crystal of Life and trade it for something useful.

name: Earth Egg
description: Obtained by attacking a Raid Boss, you can assemble this Crystal of Life and trade it for something useful.

name: Nonliving Nucleus
description: Obtained by attacking a Raid Boss, you can assemble this Crystal of Life and trade it for something useful.

name: Angelic Essence
description: Obtained by attacking a Raid Boss, you can assemble this Crystal of Life and trade it for something useful.

name: Basic Caravan Certificate
description: A certificate of friendship with Caravans.

name: Standard Caravan Certificate
description: A certificate of business relations with Caravans.

name: Premium Caravan Certificate
description: A certificate indicating a unique friendship with Caravans.

name: Mark of Friendship and Trust
description: A mark to show the highest grade of relationship Caravans.

name: Diploma
description: Take this Diploma to Second Hierarch Perwan.

name: Great Wolf Necklace
description: A necklace used to summon Great Wolf. It takes away some of the experience points the Pet Master earns.

name: Scroll of Transformation - Pig
description: Scroll of Transformation that transforms you into a pig for 60 minutes. It will have no effect if used while in a transformed state.

name: SP Scroll: Highest Grade
description: A scroll that can load 500,000 SP.

name: Blood Oath
description: An item needed for a clan leader to raise the clan up to level 9. It can also be used to strengthen subordinate forces. Cannot be traded, dropped or sold.

name: Blood Alliance
description: An item needed for a clan leader to raise the clan up to level 10. It can also be used to strengthen subordinate forces. Cannot be traded, dropped or sold.

name: Knight's Epaulette
description: A mark obtained after defeating enemies. It can be used to purchase special items after Fortress battles.

name: Sealed Dynasty Sigil Piece
description: Ingredient needed for a Dwarf to make a Dynasty Sigil. It can be sold to public stores.

name: Recipe: Sealed Dynasty Sigil (60%)
description: For Dwarves only. The recipe for the Sealed Dynasty Sigil. Requires Create Item Skill - Level 9. 60% success rate.

name: Recipe: Sealed Dynasty Sigil (100%)
description: Exclusive to Dwarves. Recipe for making a Sealed Dynasty Sigil. Requires Create Item - Skill Level 9. The success rate is 100%.

name: Chaotic Sealed Dynasty Sigil
description: A rare Sealed Dynasty Sigil that requries a thorough varnishing. It can be varnished by the Blacksmith of Mammon.

name: Chaotic Dynasty Sigil
description: A rare Sealed Dynasty Sigil that requires a thorough varnishing. It can be varnished by the Blacksmith of Mammon.

name: Scroll of Escape: Fortress
description: A magical scroll that transports you to your Fortress. If you don't have a Fortress, it will relocate you to the nearest village.

name: Blessed Scroll of Escape: Fortress
description: A magical scroll that transports you to your Fortress quickly.

name: Transformation Scroll: Onyx Beast
description: A Scroll that transforms you into an Onyx Beast for 30 minutes.

name: Transformation Scroll: Death Blader
description: A Scroll that transforms you into a Death Blader for 30 minutes.

name: Transformation Scroll: Grail Apostle
description: A Scroll that transforms you into a Grail Apostle for 30 minutes.

name: Transformation Scroll: Unicorn
description: A Scroll that transforms you into a Unicorn for 30 minutes.

name: Transformation Scroll: Lilim Knight
description: A Scroll that transforms you into a Lilim Knight for 30 minutes.

name: Transformation Scroll: Golem Guardian
description: A Scroll that transforms you into a Golem Guardian for 30 minutes.

name: Transformation Scroll: Inferno Drake
description: A Scroll that transforms you into a Inferno Drake for 30 minutes.

name: Transformation Scroll: Dragon Bomber
description: A Scroll that transforms you into a Dragon Bomber for 30 minutes.

name: Battleground Spell - Shield Master
description: Effects of Wind Walk Lv 2, Shield Lv 3, Magic Barrier Lv 2, Bless Shield Lv 6, and Haste Lv 1 can be obtained for a certain period of time. Can only be used in Siege and Fortress war.

name: Battleground Spell - Wizard
description: Effects of Wind Walk Lv 2, Shield Lv 3, Magic Barrier Lv 2, Acumen Lv 1, and Empower Lv 1 can be obtained for a certain period of time. Can only be used in Siege and Fortress war.

name: Battleground Spell - Healer
description: Effects of Wind Walk Lv 2, Shield Lv 3, Magic Barrier Lv 2, Acumen Lv 1, and Heal Empower Lv 1 can be obtained for a certain period of time. Can only be used in Siege and Fortress war.

name: Battleground Spell - Dagger Master
description: Effects of Wind Walk Lv 2, Might Lv 3, Magic Barrier Lv 2, Focus Lv 1, and Haste Lv 1 can be obtained for a certain period of time. Can only be used in Siege and Fortress war.

name: Battleground Spell - Bow Master
description: Effects of Wind Walk Lv 2, Might Lv 3, Magic Barrier Lv 2, Guidance Lv 1, and Haste Lv 1 can be obtained for a certain period of time. Can only be used in Siege and Fortress war.

name: Battleground Spell - Berserker
description: Effects of Berserker Spirit Lv 2 and Clarity Lv 1 can be obtained for a certain period of time. Can only be used in Siege and Fortress war.

name: Battleground Blessed Scroll of Escape
description: Relocates you to the nearest village. Can only be used in Siege and Fortress war.

name: Battleground Blessed Scroll of Resurrection
description: Resurrects a dead character and restores his or her Exp. completely. Can only be used in Siege and Fortress war.

name: Battleground Transform Spell
description: When used, it transforms you into a pixy for a certain amount of time. It can only be used on the battleground during a siege battle or a fortress battle. It will have no effect if used while in a transformed state.

name: Battle Health Recovery Potion
description: Recovers HP when in use. Characters below Level 52 are not affected. Usable only during a Siege or Fortress war.

name: Battle Mana Recovery Potion
description: Recovers MP when in use. Characters below Level 52 are not affected. Usable only during a Siege or Fortress war.

name: Battle CP Recovery Potion
description: Recovers CP when in use. Characters below Level 52 are not affected. Usable only during a Siege or Fortress war.

name: Mental Strengthening Potion
description: Increases Resistance to Hold and Sleep for a certain period of time. Can only be used in Siege and Fortress war.

name: Medusa's Potion
description: Becomes invincible temporarily. Can only be used in Siege and Fortress war.

name: Instant Haste Potion
description: Increases Speed instantly. Can only be used in Siege and Fortress war.

name: Capture Rope
description: Disturbs movement of targets. Can only be used in Siege and Fortress war.

name: Cursed Red Soul Crystal - Stage 14
description: A red crystal that is cursed by the darkness, stage 14. Take this to Legendary Blacksmith Shadai in Hellbound to process.

name: Cursed Blue Soul Crystal - Stage 14
description: A blue crystal that is cursed by the darkness, stage 14. Take this to Legendary Blacksmith Shadai in Hellbound to process.

name: Cursed Green Soul Crystal - Stage 14
description: A green crystal that is cursed by the darkness, stage 14. Take this to Legendary Blacksmith Shadai in Hellbound to process.

name: Wolf Collar
description: Necklace used to summon wolves. It takes away some experience points the Pet Master earns.

name: Animal Slayer's List
description: Destroys the animal slayers of the Mimir Forest, the Crimson Spiders.

name: Bloody Red Claw
description: A claw dripping with animal blood. Collect 50 of these and take them to Martin, the Pet Manager of the Town of Gludin.

name: Hot Springs CP Potion
description: Instantly recovers 1000 CP when used.

name: Seed: Dark Coda
description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Aden area and it will bear the fruit of the Dark Coda. For best results, a level 5-15 character must plant it on a level 5-15 monster.

name: Seed: Red Coda
description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Aden area and it will bear the fruit of the Red Coda. For best results, a level 8-18 character must plant it on a level 8-18 monster.

name: Sweet Fruit Cocktail
description: A Cocktail made of various rare fruits. When consumed, it bestows temporary effects of Might, Shield, Wind Walk, Focus, Death Whisper, Guidance, Bless Shield, Bless Body, Haste, and Vampiric Rage for a certain amount of time.

name: Fresh Fruit Cocktail
description: A Cocktail made of various rare fruits. When consumed,  it bestows temporary effects of Berserker Spirit, Blessed Body, Magic Barrier, Shield, Wind Walk, Blessed Soul, Empower, Acumen, and Clarity effects for a certain amount of time.

description: Battle Manual needed to learn Soul Gathering. Used by Berserkers, Arbalesters, Soul Breakers, and Inspectors.\\nRequired level: 46

description: Double-click to obtain white seed of evil.

description: Double-click to obtain black seed of evil.

description: Delicious beverage made with rare fruits. Atk. Spd. increases by 33% when used.

name: Accuracy Juice
description: Delicious beverage made with rare fruits. Increases Accuracy by 4 when used.

name: Critical Hit Juice
description: Delicious beverage made with rare fruits. Critical Damage increases by 35% when used.

name: Speed Juice

name: Defense Juice
description: Delicious beverage made with rare fruits. P. Def. increases by 15% when used.

name: MP Consumption Juice
description: Delicious beverage made with rare fruits. Decreases physical skill MP consumption by 10%, magic skill MP consumption by 4%, and song/dance skill MP consumption by 10%.

name: Treasure Sack Piece
description: You can exchange 50 Treasure Sack Pieces for a Treasure Sack if you bring them to Snow.

name: Transformation Scroll: Rabbit
description: A scroll that transforms you into a rabbit for 10 minutes. Locates treasure when used on Fantasy Isle. It will have no effect if used while a pet or servitor is summoned or while in a transformed state.

name: Battle Manual - Warp
description: Battle Manual needed to learn Warp. Used by Warders.\\nRequired level: 32

name: Great Snow Wolf Necklace
description: Necklace used to summon a Great Snow Wolf. It takes away some of the experience points the Pet Master earns.

name: Red Dragon Bugle of Wind
description: Trumpet used to summon the Strider of the Red Wind. This takes some of experience which is acquired by the pet master.

name: Red Dragon Bugle of Star
description: Trumpet used to summon the Strider of the Red Star. This takes some of experience which is acquired by the pet master.

name: Red Dragon Bugle of Twilight
description: Trumpet used to summon the Strider of the Red Dusk. This takes some of experience which is acquired by the pet master.

name: Improved Buffalo Panpipe
description: Necklace used to summon an Improved Baby Buffalo. It takes away some of the experience points the Pet Master earns.

name: Improved Cougar Chime
description: Necklace used to summon an Improved Baby Cougar. It takes away some of the experience points the Pet Master earns.

name: Improved Kookaburra Ocarina
description: Necklace used to summon an Improved Baby Kookaburra. It takes away some of the experience points the Pet Master earns.

name: Evil Weapon
description: Weapon that can only be obtained from the evil spirits created at the Monster Foundry

name: Stolen Cargo
description: Cargo stolen from Warehouse Keeper Sonin of Florin Village. Return it to Sonin.

name: Hate Crystal
description: An important item that Grocer Pano of Florin Village is seeking. Give it to Pano.

name: Old Treasure Map
description: An important item that Captain Alex of Florin Village is seeking. Give it to Alex.

name: Sonin's Credentials
description: Give it to Priest Shegfield of Dion Village along with Pano's and Alex's Credentials.

name: Pano's Credentials
description: Give it to Priest Shegfield of Dion Village along with Sonin's and Alex's Credentials.

name: Alex's Credentials
description: Give it to Priest Shegfield of Dion Village along with Pano's and Sonin's Credentials.

name: Badge - Temple Executor
description: Give it to High Priest Sylvain along with the Temple of Einhasad's "Temple Executor" proof of identity and the "Badge - Temple Missionary."

name: Giants' Experimental Tool Fragment
description: Relic of the Giants found on the monsters and apostates in the Cruma Marshlands. Bring it to Spellbook Seller Rouke.

name: Giants' Experimental Tool
description: Experimental tool created by the Giants. Use it to lure the apostates in the Cruma Marshlands.

name: Giants' Technology Report
description: Proof of the traitor's defeat in the Cruma Marshlands. Bring it to Spellbook Seller Rouke.

name: Rouke's Report
description: Rouke's Report. Deliver it to Priest Glyvka.

name: Badge - Temple Missionary
description: Give it to High Priest Sylvain along with the Temple of Einhasad's "Temple Missionary" proof of identity and the "Badge - Temple Executor."

name: Report Fragment
description: A piece of the Investigation Report carried by the missing Temple investigator. Bring it to High Priest Sylvain.

name: Temple Manifesto
description: Temple's manifesto describing the only "righteousness"

name: Relics of the Dark Elf Trainee
description: Relics of a Dark Elf trainee who was killed during live training. Give it to Dark Elf Angus.

name: Angus' Recommendation
description: Token for helping Angus. Show it to Priestess Pupina.

name: Pupina's Recommendation
description: Proof of versatility and the right to contact the preachers. Show it to Preacher Sla.

name: Records Chest Key Fragment
description: Key fragment that is held by the Tasaba Lizardmen. If you bring it to Warehouse Keeper Mia, she can turn it into a Records Chest Key.

name: Records Chest
description: Records chest held by the Tasaba Lizardmen. Bring it to Warehouse Keeper Mia to inspect the contents.

name: Dark Crystal
description: Ingredient needed to create the Dark Oxide. Bring it to Magister Xenovia.

name: Dark Oxide
description: Substance on which Magister Xenovia is experimenting.

name: Cryptogram of the Goddess Sword
description: Secret document about the Sword of Sthelotte that the Goddess of Lake Eva gave to Rionelle, bring it to Kluck.

name: Predecessor's Report
description: Investigate report of the intelligence agency that records the death of Shadow Fox. Bring it to Warehouse Chief Natools.

name: Cryptogram of the Angel Search
description: Clue regarding the angel's location that was discovered by Shadow Fox's intelligence agency. Encoded as a Cryptogram. Decipher it through High Priest Raymond in the Town of Gludio.

name: Prophecy Fragment
description: Prophecy - Path of the God. When all the prophecy fragments are collected, they reveal the Fallen Angel's location.

name: Fallen Angel Blood
description: Proof of the eradication of the angel that was labeled a Fallen Angel by the Temple. Deliver it to High Priest Raymond in the Town of Gludio.

name: Sealed Prophecy - Path of the God
description: Sealed prophecy that foretells the location of the angel. Bring it to Grand Master Tobias in Gludio Castle.

name: Prophecy - Path of the God
description: Prophecy that foretells the location of the angel. Ask Elder Casian of the Wastelands to decipher it.

name: Empty Sound Crystal
description: A sound crystal for saving the angel's message. There is nothing recorded on it yet.

name: Angel Medicine
description: Medicine that Casian made for the injured angel. Administer it to the Fallen Angel.

name: Angel's Message
description: A sound crystal for saving the angel's message. Bring it to Grand Master Tobias in Gludio Castle.

name: Metallograph
description: Metal device obtained in Cruma Tower. It appears to be a recording device from the time of Giants.

name: Broken Metal Pieces
description: Metallograph shard obtained in Cruma Tower

name: Nikola's Map
description: Map that shows the location Nikola searched in Cruma Tower.

name: Loraine's Certificate
description: Voucher that proves you received the Metallograph that Loraine obtained in Cruma Tower. Hold onto it and return to her later.

name: Metallograph
description: Metallograph obtained in Cruma Tower. Appears to be a recording device of the giants.

name: Broken Metal Pieces
description: Metallograph shard obtained in Cruma Tower

name: Nikola's Map
description: Map that shows the location that Nikola searched in Cruma Tower.

name: Metallograph - Research Report
description: Metallograph obtained in Cruma Tower. It is confirmed as a recording device that was used in the Cruma Tower laboratory.

name: Leto Lizardman Accessory
description: Accessory held by the Leto Lizardmen. Blueprint Seller Luka in the Town of Oren likes it.

name: Metallograph
description: Metallograph obtained in Cruma Tower. Appears to be a recording device of the giants.

name: Broken Metal Pieces
description: Metallograph shard obtained in Cruma Tower

name: Metallograph - Decipher Pattern
description: Luka summarized the contents which have been decoded from the metal plate. Take this back to Lorain.

name: Repaired Metallograph
description: Dorothy repaired the metallograph shard obtained in Cruma Tower.

name: Red Stone
description: Item that Matras instructed to bring back as proof of the defeated agitators. He doesn't tell you its purpose.

name: Old Agathion
description: Old Agathion with the spirit's seal unbound. Double-click to unlock items.

name: A Bottle of Souls
description: A bottle that holds 5 Souls. Double-click to fill the bottle. For Kamael use only. Cannot be exchanged or dropped.

name: Full Bottle of Souls - 5 Souls
description: A bottle containing 5 Souls. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Kamael Exclusive Weapon. Disappears without effect if used by other races.

name: Full Bottle of Souls - 5 Souls (For Combat)
description: A bottle containing 5 Souls. Usable only in combat. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Kamael Exclusive Weapon. Disappears without effect if used by other races.

name: Full Bottle of Souls - 10 Souls
description: A bottle containing 10 Souls. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Kamael exclusive item. Disappears without effect if used by other races.

name: Dynastic Essence II
description: An item that can modify Dynasty Tunic. Powerful options are available for a modified Dynasty Tunic. Grants more powerful options than Dynastic Essence.

name: Improved Baby Pet Food
description: Automatically consumed when an improved baby pet's hunger gauge drops below 55%.

name: Fenrir Necklace
description: A necklace that can summon a Fenrir. It takes away some of the experience points the Pet Master earns.

name: Tully's Platinum Medal
description: Small, shiny platinum medal. It reads, 'Permission No.1 for Group Admission to Special Workshop'.

name: Tully's Tin Medal
description: Small, shiny tin medal. It reads, 'Permission No.2 for Group Admission to Special Workshop'.

name: Tully's Lead Medal
description: Small, shiny lead medal. It reads, 'Permission No.3 for Group Admission to Special Workshop'.

name: Tully's Zinc Medal
description: Small, shiny zinc medal. It reads, 'Permission No.4 for Group Admission to Special Workshop'.

name: Tully's Copper Medal
description: Small, shiny copper medal. It reads, 'Permission No.5 for Group Admission to Special Workshop'.

name: Magic Accessory Set
description: Obtain this Shadow Item by double-clicking. It cannot be exchanged or dropped.

name: Red Soul Crystal - Stage 15
description: Red Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 15. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. Every time it is used, it consumes 26 of MP. However, the Soul Crystal of this stage absorbs souls by itself, so there is no need for using the Soul Crystal to monsters.

name: Blue Soul Crystal - Stage 15
description: Blue Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 15. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. Every time it is used, it consumes 26 of MP. However, the Soul Crystal of this stage absorbs souls by itself, so there is no need for using the Soul Crystal to monsters.

name: Green Soul Crystal - Stage 15
description: Green Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 15. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. Every time it is used, it consumes 26 of MP. However, the Soul Crystal of this stage absorbs souls by itself, so there is no need for using the Soul Crystal to monsters.

name: Life Stone -  Level 82
description: General mineral created when a stone in a monster is solidified by a physical or magic hit. Usable by characters level 82 and above when augmenting weapons.

name: Mid-Grade Life Stone -  Level 82
description: Mid-Grade mineral created when a stone in a monster is solidified by a physical or magic hit. Usable by characters level 82 and above when augmenting weapons.

name: High-Grade Life Stone -  Level 82
description: High-Grade mineral created when a stone in a monster is solidified by a physical or magic hit. Usable by characters level 82 and above when augmenting weapons.

name: Top-Grade Life Stone -  Level 82
description: Top-Grade mineral created when a stone in a monster is solidified by a physical or magic hit. Usable by characters level 82 and above when augmenting weapons.

name: Beast Soulshot Compressed Pack
description: A small capsule of compressed Beast Soulshot. Changes into 500 Beast Soulshots when used.

name: Beast Spiritshot Compressed Pack
description: A small capsule of compressed Beast Spiritshot. Changes into 500 Beast Spiritshots when used.

name: Blessed Beast Spiritshot Compressed Pack
description: A small capsule of compressed Blessed Beast Spiritshot. Changes into 500 Blessed Beast Spiritshots when used.

name: Echo Crystal - Kuraki Mai
description: Echo Crystal that plays Kuraki Mai's music. It can be used once every 40 seconds and disappears after being used.

name: Rough Ore of Fire
description: The power of fire increases by 5 when given to a weapon. The power of fire increases by 6 and water resistance becomes stronger when given to armor. Element attribute can be given up until level 3, and it cannot be given above level 3. Cannot be exchanged or dropped.

name: Rough Ore of Water
description: The power of water increases by 5 when given to a weapon. The power of water increases by 6 and fire resistance becomes stronger when given to armor. Element attribute can be given up until level 3, and it cannot be given above level 3. Cannot be exchanged or dropped.

name: Rough Ore of the Earth
description: The power of the earth increases by 5 when given to a weapon. The power of the Earth increases by 6 and wind resistance becomes stronger when given to armor. Element attribute can be given up until level 3, and it cannot be given above level 3. Cannot be exchanged or dropped.

name: Rough Ore of Wind
description: The power of wind increases by 5 when given to a weapon. The power of wind increases by 6 and earth resistance becomes strong if given to defensive armor. Element attribute can be given up until level 3, and it cannot be given above level 3. Cannot be exchanged or dropped.

name: Rough Ore of Darkness
description: Increases dark power by 5 when given to a weapon. Increases dark power by 6 and increases resistance to holy attacks when given to armor. Element attribute can be given up until level 3, and it cannot be given above level 3. Cannot be exchanged or dropped.

name: Rough Ore of Divinity
description: Increases holy power by 5 when given to a weapon. Increases holy power by 6 and darkness resistance becomes stronger when given to armor. Element attribute can be given up until level 3, and it cannot be given above level 3. Cannot be exchanged or dropped.

name: Weapon-Type Enhance Backup Stone (D-Grade)

name: Extra Entrance Pass - Kamaloka (Hall of the Abyss)
description: Vitamin item\\nExtra entrance pass that lets you enter Kamaloka (Hall of the Abyss). Can cancel the limit on entrance if used while a limit on entrance to the Hall of the Abyss exists. Can only be used once a day outside the instant zone. After use, the effect disappears at the corresponding instant dungeon's reset time. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Can be shared between characters within the account through Vitamin Manager.

name: Extra Entrance Pass - Near Kamaloka
description: Vitamin item\\nExtra entrance pass that lets you enter Near Kamaloka. Can cancel the limit on entrance if used while a limit on entrance to Near Kamaloka exists. Can only be used once a day outside the instant zone. After use, the effect disappears at the corresponding instant dungeon's reset time. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Can be shared between characters within the account through Vitamin Manager.

name: Extra Entrance Pass - Kamaloka (Labyrinth of the Abyss)
description: Vitamin item\\nExtra entrance pass that lets you enter Kamaloka (Labyrinth of the Abyss). Can cancel the limit on entrance if used while a limit on entrance to the Labyrinth of the Abyss exists. Can only be used once a day outside the instant zone. After use, the effect disappears at the corresponding instant dungeon's reset time. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Can be shared between characters within the account through Vitamin Manager.
