name: Transformation Scroll: Schuttgart Dark Elf Mercenary
description: Allows you to transform into a Dark Elven mercenary. Can only be used by an ordinary mercenary in Schuttgart Territory.

name: Transformation Scroll: Schuttgart Orc Mercenary
description: Allows you to transform into an Orc mercenary. Can only be used by an ordinary mercenary in Schuttgart Territory.

name: Transformation Scroll: Schuttgart Dwarf Mercenary
description: Allows you to transform into a Dwarven mercenary. Can only be used by an ordinary mercenary in Schuttgart Territory.

name: Transformation Scroll: Schuttgart Kamael Mercenary
description: Allows you to transform into a Kamael mercenary. Can only be used by an ordinary mercenary in Schuttgart Territory.

name: Transformation Scroll: Schuttgart Knight Mercenary
description: Allows you to transform into a Knight mercenary. Can only be used by an elite mercenary in Schuttgart Territory.

name: Transformation Scroll: Schuttgart Archer Mercenary
description: Allows you to transform into an Archer mercenary. Can only be used by an elite mercenary in Schuttgart Territory.

name: Transformation Scroll: Schuttgart Wizard Mercenary
description: Allows you to transform into a Wizard mercenary. Can only be used by an elite mercenary in Schuttgart Territory.

name: Transformation Scroll: Schuttgart Kamael Captain Mercenary
description: Allows you to transform into a Kamael Captain Mercenary. Can only be used by an elite mercenary in Schuttgart Territory.

name: Transformation Scroll: Schuttgart Knight Captain Mercenary
description: Allows you to transform into a Knight Captain mercenary. Can only be used by an Exalted Mercenary in Schuttgart Territory.

name: Transformation Scroll: Schuttgart Commander Mercenary
description: Allows you to transform into a Commander mercenary. Can only be used by an Exalted Mercenary in Schuttgart Territory.

name: Gludio Disguise Scroll
description: Allows you to hide your name when participating in a battle in Gludio Territory.

name: Dion Disguise Scroll
description: Allows you to hide your name when participating in a battle in Dion Territory.

name: Giran Disguise Scroll
description: Allows you to hide your name when participating in a battle in Giran Territory.

name: Oren Disguise Scroll
description: Allows you to hide your name when participating in a battle in Oren Territory.

name: Aden Disguise Scroll
description: Allows you to hide your name when participating in a battle in Aden Territory.

name: Innadril Disguise Scroll

name: Goddard Disguise Scroll

name: Rune Disguise Scroll

name: Schuttgart Disguise Scroll
description: Allows you to hide your name when participating in a battle in Schuttgart Territory.

name: Sealed Knight's Cloak
description: Cloak with luxurious embroidery. When the seal is cancelled, it'll have Dark Attribute Defense +30 effect. The seal can be cancelled through the weaver Olf Kanore and Olf Adams. It cannot be worn before the seal cancellation. Enchantment, special abilities and augmentation are not possible. Cannot be exchnaged or dropped.

name: Mark of Keucereus - Stage 1
description: Mark given to an adventurer who successfully completes Keucereus' order to break through to the Hall of Suffering. This mark is required for taking on higher level missions.

name: Mark of Keucereus - Stage 2
description: Mark given to an adventurer who successfully completes Kucereus' order to conquer the Hall of Erosion. Mark given to prove heroic achievements at the Seed of Infinity.

name: Gracian Anniversary Coins
description: Gracian Anniversary Coins. When possessed, a reward can be acquired. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, deleted nor stored in a private warehouse.

name: Gracia Key
description: You can acquire Gracia Anniversary Coins by using a Gracian treasure box. Re-use time is 10 minutes. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, destroyed, or stored in a private warehouse.

name: Gludio Supply Box - Magic Pin
description: A box that has the symbol of Gludio. A low grade magic pin that's attached to the belt can be acquired at a certain rate.

name: Dion Supply Box - Magic Pin
description: A box that has the symbol of Dion. A low grade magic pin that's attached to the belt can be acquired at a certain rate.

name: Schuttgart Supply Box - Belt

name: Design: High Quality MP Recovery Stone
Design: High Quality HP MP Recovery Stone
Design: Energy Star Stone
description: Design for making an Energy Star Stone. The Create Command requires a level 9 item. Success rate is 100%.

name: Design: Greater Quality Energy Start Stone
description: Design for making a High-quality Energy Star Stone. The Create Command requires a level 9 item. Success rate is 100%.

name: Expert Text - Star Stone Extraction Skill. Level 1
description: When double clicked, the Star Stone Extraction skill level 1 can be learned. Can be acquired by level 75 and above.

name: Expert Text - Star Stone Extraction Skill. Level 2
description: Expert Text that teaches the Star Stone Collection skill. Level 2 Expert Text.

name: Expert Text - Star Stone Extraction Skill. Level 3
description: Expert Text that teaches the Star Stone Collection skill. Level 3 Expert Text.

name: Blessed Scroll of Escape: Gludio
description: Magically teleports you to the Town of Gludio.

name: Blessed Scroll of Escape: Dion
description: Magically teleports you to the Town of Dion.

name: Blessed Scroll of Escape: Giran
description: Magically teleports you to the Town of Giran.

name: Blessed Scroll of Escape: Oren
description: Magically teleports you to the Town of Oren.

name: Blessed Scroll of Escape: Aden
description: Magically teleports you to the Town of Aden.

name: Blessed Scroll of Escape: Innadril
description: Magically teleports you to the Town of Innadril.

name: Blessed Scroll of Escape: Goddard
description: Magically teleports you to the Town of Goddard .

name: Blessed Scroll of Escape: Rune
description: Magically teleports you to Rune Township.

name: Blessed Scroll of Escape: Schuttgart
description: Magically teleports you to the Town of Schuttgart.

name: Emery Piece
description: A small piece obtained on the Aerial Cleft battlefield. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Though weak, it seems as if a great amount of energy is condensed into it.

name: Warrior's Temporary Healing Potion
description: Magic potion that temporarily restores stamina.

name: Gludio Territory Badge
description: Badge bearing the mark of Gludio territory.

name: Dion Territory Badge
description: Badge bearing the mark of Dion territory.

name: Giran Territory Badge
description: Badge bearing the mark of Giran territory.

name: Oren Territory Badge
description: Badge bearing the mark of Oren territory.

name: Aden Territory Badge
description: Badge bearing the mark of Aden territory.

name: Innadril Territory Badge
description: Badge bearing the mark of Innadril territory.

name: Goddard Territory Badge
description: Badge bearing the mark of Goddard territory.

name: Rune Territory Badge
description: Badge bearing the mark of Rune territory.

name: Schuttgart Territory Badge
description: Badge bearing the mark of Schuttgart territory.

name: Ordinary Mercenary Certificate
description: Certificate showing your qualification as a mercenary.

name: Elite Mercenary Certificate
description: Certificate showing your qualification as a mercenary.

name: Top Elite Mercenary Certificate
description: Certificate showing your qualification as a mercenary.

name: Artificial Regeneration Incubator
description: By putting catalyzer inside Seed of Infinity, the device creates artificial tissue to eliminate the monsters that attack the Seed of Life. Can be used only to defend the instant dungeon Hall of Erosion in the Seed of Infinity. Exclusively used by Dwarf Fighters, Artisans, Warsmiths, and Maestros. Cannot be exchnaged or dropped.

name: Strong Alkaline Ointment
description: It's an ointment that's made of the ingredients easily found in daily life and almost completely blocks the skin oxidation. It lessens the effects of lethal de-buff skills inside the Hall of Erosion. Can be used only inside Hall of Erosion instant dungeons.

name: Life Aid Bandage
description: A wondrous curative cloth that almost completely blocks the foreign contagion, which is the true nature of the Seed of Infinity, when you adhere it to your body. It increases Resistance to bleeding, poison, and Netherworld's Magyun induced special de-buff skills that the monsters use inside Seed of Infinity. Can be used only inside Seed of Infinity instant dungeons.

name: Scent of Preservation
description: An ancient Gracian scent used to keep a body from decaying. It stops severe bleeding up to the maximum effect 8 caused by the monsters inside Seed of Infinity. Can be used only inside Seed of Infinity instant dungeons.

name: Scent of Exorcism
description: An ancient Gracian scent used to cure people who are possessed by ghosts. It neutralizes the powerful poison up to the maximum effect 8 caused by the monsters inside Seed of Infinity. Can be used only inside Seed of Infinity instant dungeons.

name: Miracle Cure of Resuscitation
description: A wondrous drug that seems to have been used in ancient Gracian sacrificial rituals. It cancels the effect of bleeding and poison caused by the monsters inside Seed of Infinity up to the maximum effect 8 or Netherworld's Magyun induced special de-buff up to the maximum effect 4. Can be used only inside Seed of Infinity instant dungeons.

name: Structure Scarab
description: Amulet frequently used by ancient Gracian nobles. It gives the ability to resurrect and protection against death. Can be used only inside Seed of Infinity instant dungeons. Cannot be exchnaged or dropped.

name: Jewel Ornamented Duel Supplies
description: Lavishly adorned with jewels, this box looks like contains items of exceeding value.

name: Mother-of-Pearl Ornamented Duel Supplies
description: Covered in opaque multi-colored mother-of-pearl, just looking at this box fills you with expectation.

name: Gold-Ornamented Duel Supplies
description: Covered in gold, this box looks like it would fetch a hefty sum in any market.

name: Silver-Ornamented Duel Supplies
description: Covered in silver, this box shines like a mirror.

name: Bronze-Ornamented Duel Supplies
description: This utilitarian box looks like it might contain some useful items.

name: Non-Ornamented Duel Supplies
description: This plain box makes you curious to look inside.

name: Weak-Looking Duel Supplies
description: This small box can't hold anything of value -- can it?

name: Sad-Looking Duel Supplies
description: This small, battered-looking box probably isn't worth your time.

name: Poor-Looking Duel Supplies
description: This old, dust-covered box looks fairly worthless.

name: Worthless Duel Supplies
description: This box looks like it's falling apart.

name: Bond
description: Item can be useful in Handy's Block Checker matches. Used in the blocks.

name: Land Mine
description: Item can be useful in Handy's Block Checker matches. Used in the blocks.

name: Kratei's Cube Name Hiding Scroll
description: Used to hide your name in Kratei's Cube.

name: Transformed Object: Handy's Block Checker Transformation Scroll Blue
description: Transformed Object: Block-Flipping Transformation Scroll

name: Transformed Object: Handy's Block Checker Transformation Scroll Red
description: Transformed Object: Block-Flipping Transformation Scroll

name: Freed Soul
description: Energy from ghosts that flow through the Seed of Infinity reside within this item. Can be used at Special Product Broker Kirklan.

name: Tear of a Freed Soul
description: A container having a ghosts being flown out of the Seed of Infinity . Seed of Infinity attack/defend reward

name: Portion of a Soul
description: The ruin left when the ghosts have run out of their energy while being flown in the Seed of Infinity. Seed of Infinity collection additional reward

name: Treasure Sack of the Ancient Giants
description: Contains the treasure of the ancient Giants. Double-click to open it.

name: Transformation Scroll: Frog
description: Frog transformation scroll that was given by Secret Agent Colin. Use the scroll to obtain the bead from the Frog King at Narsell Lake.

name: Transformation Scroll: Young Child
description: Frog transformation scroll that was given by Secret Agent Colin. Use the scroll to obtain candy from Grandma Tess at Narsell Lake.

name: Elmoreden Holy Water
description: Used by Elmoreden Emperor Shunaiman's guards, it can open the door engulfed in the Flame of Lilim inside the Necropolis.

name: High Priest Orven's Letter
description: Letter detailing Gracia's imminent crisis. Deliver it to Commander Keucereus in the Gracia region.

name: Keucereus' Introduction - Seed of Infinity
description: Introduction received from Keucereus. If you go northwest from Keucereus Alliance Base, you can reach the Seed of Infinity. Deliver this mark to Officer Tepios there.

name: Keucereus' Introduction - Seed of Destruction
description: Introduction received from Keucereus. Deliver it to Sergeant Allenos, located at the Seed of Destruction west of Keucereus Alliance Base.

name: Croop's Introduction
description: Introduction received from Croop. Deliver it to Guard Hector at the north entrance to Oren Castle and learn about the whereabouts of Contractor Jacob.

name: Jacob's Necklace
description: Necklace discovered at contractor Jacob's body.

name: Croop's Letter Requesting a Memorial Service
description: Deliver Croop's letter requesting a memorial service for Contractor Jacob to High Priest Hollint in Einhasad's Temple inside Oren Castle.

name: Deadman's Herb
description: Deliver this herb, collected in Enchanted Valley, to Priest Cain near the Town of Oren.

name: Priest Cain's Investigation Report
description: Deliver Priest Cain's report about the Seven Signs to Sir Gustav Athebaldt in the Town of Oren.

name: Athebaldt's Introduction
description: Introduction received from Sir Athebaldt. Bring it to Secret Agent Colin in the Southern entrance of the town of Aden.

name: Native's Glove
description: A glove received from the Native Kuta. Bring it to the Secret Agent Colin of the town of Aden.

name: Frog King's Bead
description: Bead obtained from the Frog King. Bring it to the Secret Agent Colin of the town of Aden.

name: Grandma Tess' Candy Pouch
description: Candy pouch obtained from Grandma Tess. Bring it to the Secret Agent Colin of the town of Aden.

name: Guards of the Dawn Identity Card
description: Identity card of the guards of the Dawn that was given by Lady Claudia. The qualification one needs to enter the Dawn Lord's temple.

name: Emperor Shunaiman's Contract
description: Details a secret contract between Emperor Shunaiman and the Merchant of Mammon regarding the Seven Signs. Deliver it to High Priest Rayment in the Town of Gludio.

name: Ancient Seal Stone of Mammon
description: This apparently sealed a promise the Merchant of Mammon made to the Elmoreden Emperor Shunaiman. It seems to be hiding a mysterious power.

name: Grail of Einhasad
description: Proof that all Necropolis and Catacombs have been sealed. Deliver it to Emperor Shunaiman (Elmoreden Era).

name: Blood of the Emperor
description: A vial of Emperor Shunaiman's blood, which is the key to activate the Necropolis sealing device. Activate the device!

name: Iason's Introduction
description: This allows you meet Franz. Deliver it to High Priest Orven in the Town of Aden.

name: Prayer: Emperor's Key
description: This prayer has been passed down from one high-ranking Priest of the Dawn to the next, stretching back to the Elmoreden Era.

name: Mysterious Hand-written Text
description: This obscure text is hand-written in ancient ciphers.

name: Tomlan Kamos' Cellular Tissue
description: Deliver this tissue sample to Magister Rohmer in the Temple of Einhasad in the Town of Gludio.

name: Ol Ariosh's Cellular Tissue
description: Deliver this tissue sample to Magister Rohmer in the Temple of Einhasad in the Town of Gludio.

name: Crimson Hatu Otis' Cellular Tissue
description: Deliver this tissue sample to Magister Mirien in the Temple of Einhasad in the Town of Dion.

name: Seer Flouros' Cellular Tissue
description: Deliver this tissue sample to Magister Mirien in the Temple of Einhasad in the Town of Dion.

name: Blade Otis' Cellular Tissue
description: Deliver this tissue sample to Magister Minevia in the Temple of Einhasad in the Town of Heine.

name: Weird Bunei's Cellular Tissue
description: Deliver this tissue sample to Magister Minevia in the Temple of Einhasad in the Town of Heine.

name: Kaim Abigore's Cellular Tissue
description: Deliver this tissue sample to Magister Rovia in the Temple of Einhasad in the Town of Oren.

name: Knight Montagnar's Cellular Tissue
description: Deliver this tissue sample to Magister Rovia in the Temple of Einhasad in the Town of Oren.

name: Venomous Storace's Cellular Tissue
description: Deliver this tissue sample to Magister Atraxia in the Temple of Einhasad in the Town of Schuttgart.

name: Kel Bilette's Cellular Tissue
description: Deliver this tissue sample to Magister Atraxia in the Temple of Einhasad in the Town of Schuttgart.

name: White Allosce's Cellular Tissue
description: Deliver this tissue sample to Magister Kayan in the Temple of Einhasad in the Town of Rune.

name: Dragonkin Charm
description: Energy from the Dragonkin that infest the Seed of Destruction. Can be used at Special Product Broker Kirklan.

name: Star Stone Extraction Scroll
description: A supplemental scroll created for adventurers who are inexperienced in collecting Star Stones.

name: Seal of Binding
description: Obtained after activating the sealing device, it proves that the sealing device was properly sealed. Deliver it to Emperor Shunaiman.

name: Piece of Doubt
description: This piece of doubt seems to possess a wicked power.

name: Headless Knight's Armor
description: Obtain this ionized set of armor after defeating the Headless Knight who terrorized the natives.

name: Mandragora Root
description: The signature product of the Town of Dion.

name: Bloody Axe Black Epaulette
description: Epaulette once worn by the Bloody Axe Aide.

name: Nebulite Orb
description: Nebulite Orb requested by the Ivory Tower.

name: Inspector Medibal's Document
description: Contains an account of Inspector Medibal's investigation of the Seed of Destruction. Deliver it to the wounded Guard Ell at Keucereus Alliance Base.

name: Destroyed Darkness Fragment Powder
description: The destroyed darkness fragment powder, which bore out of the lifeforms of evil when they were destroyed. Collect them and take them to War Mage Artius at Keucereus Alliance Base.

name: Destroyed Light Fragment Powder
description: Obtained by purging the destroyed Darkness Fragment Powder, deliver it to War Mage Artius.

name: Sacred Light Fragment
description: Fragment piece that looks like it will break at any moment. A sacred light flows out from it. If you are prepared for it to break, the sacred power of this fragment piece may allow you to inflict damage on Witch Tiat of the Dragon of Darkness. Cannot be exchnaged or dropped.

name: Rider's Mark
description: Obtained from Vulture Rider's and Elite Rider's. Deliver them to Dwarf Engineer Lekon at Keucereus Alliance Base as proof of your skill in flying.

name: Lekon's Certificate
description: Issued by Dwarven Engineer Lekon. This certificate proves you have the ability to fly safely in Gracian airs.

name: Extracted Coarse Red Star Stone
description: Coarse, Red Star Stone fragment. Higher quality Red Star Stone fragments can be extracted when you have more practice.

name: Extracted Coarse Blue Star Stone
description: Coarse, Blue Star Stone fragment. Higher quality Blue Star Stone fragments can be extracted when you have more practice.

name: Extracted Coarse Green Star Stone
description: Coarse, Green Star Stone fragment. Higher quality Green Star Stone fragments can be extracted when you have more practice.

name: Reckless Soul Piece - Water
description: Materializes after the reckless Sprite of Water is destroyed. Take it to the Male Attribute Master.

name: Reckless Soul Piece - Air
description: Materializes after the reckless Sprite of Air is destroyed. Take it to Attribute Master Yang.

name: Freed Soul Fragment
description: Obtained through hunting in the Seed of Infinity. If you take them to Special Products Broker Kirklan you can exchange 5 of these items for a Freed Soul.

name: Seal of Tiat
description: Obtained after defeating Tiat, it represents Tiat's authority and power. Take it to Special Products Broker Kirklan at Keucereus Alliance Base to exchange it for a special item.

name: Dragonkin Charm Fragment
description: Obtained through hunting in the Seed of Destruction. If you take them to Special Products Broker Kirklan you can exchange 5 of these items for a Dragonkin Charm.

name: Restless Soul
description: Obtained in the Seed of Infinity. Take these Restless Souls to Special Products Broker Kirklan to exchange them for a reward.

name: Tiat Charm
description: Breath of Tiat fragment that can be harvested by collecting in the Seed of Destruction region. If you bring it to the special products broker Kutran at the Kucereus clan outpost, you can exchange it for a useful item.

name: Yehan Klodekus' Badge
description: Badge of Yehan Klodekus, who degenerated into a Death Knight through M. Atk. of the Seed of Infinity.

name: Yehan Klanikus' Badge
description: Badge of Yehan Klanikus, who degenerated into a Death Knight through M. Atk. of the Seed of Infinity.

name: Lich Crystal
description: Crystal left behind after the death of Kohemenus, who degenerated into a Lich through M. Atk. of the Seed of Infinity.

name: Vulture's Golden Feather
description: Take this large golden feather to Dwarven Engineer Lekon at Keucereus Alliance Base and receive a reward.

name: Swallowed Skull
description: Swallowed by the Rok that roams the Seed of Destruction's dungeon or one of its Variant Falcon or Dra Hawk minions. Collect the remains of those who were sacrificed and take them to Soldier Orbyu at Keucereus Alliance Base.

name: Swallowed Sternum
description: Swallowed by the Rok that roams the Seed of Destruction's dungeon or one of its Variant Falcon or Dra Hawk minions. Collect the remains of those who were sacrificed and take them to Soldier Orbyu at Keucereus Alliance Base.

name: Swallowed Bones
description: Swallowed by the Rok that roams the Seed of Destruction's dungeon or one of its Variant Falcon or Dra Hawk minions. Collect the remains of those who were sacrificed and take them to Soldier Orbyu at Keucereus Alliance Base.

name: Deadman's Remains
description: Obtained by hunting Floating Skulls and Floating Zombies. Take them to War Mage Artius.

name: Banshee Queen's Eye
description: Proof that you have captured the Banshee Queen. Take it to War Mage Artius.

name: Drake's Flesh
description: Obtained by hunting Variant Drake Wing minions. Collect them and take them to injured Soldier Tenius at Keucereus Alliance Base.

name: Rotten Blood
description: Obtained from injured Soldier Tenius, this small vial contains spoiled blood that he claims contains the collected anger toward Keucereus. Its true origin is obscure.

name: Bait for Drakes
description: Drake exclusive bait made by combining Drake flesh and a little bit of the rotten blood. If this Drake bait is used when Seed of Destruction is stabilized, one can call the Dead of Destruction, Dius.

name: Variant Drake Wing Horns
description: Horn that sprouts out from the body of the Variant Drake. If you bring it to the injured soldier Tenis or soldier Plenos at Keucereus Alliance Base, you can receive a reward.

name: Sealed Holy Spirit's Cloak
description: Sealed Holy Spirit's Cloak. When the seal is cancelled, it'll have Dark Attribute Defense +30 effect. The seal can be cancelled through the weaver Olf Kanore and Olf Adams. It cannot be worn before the seal cancellation. Enchantment, attribute and augmenting are impossible.

name: Sealed Magic Pin (C-Grade)
description: Can be attached to Sealed Magic Pin and Belt. And the seal can be cancelled through the weaver Olf Kanore and Olf Adams.

name: Sealed Magic Pin (B-Grade)
description: Can be attached to Sealed Magic Pin and Belt. And the seal can be cancelled through the weaver Olf Kanore and Olf Adams.

name: Sealed Magic Pin (A-Grade)
description: Can be attached to Sealed Magic Pin and Belt. And the seal can be cancelled through the weaver Olf Kanore and Olf Adams.

name: Sealed Magic Pin (S-Grade)
description: Can be attached to Sealed Magic Pin and Belt. And the seal can be cancelled through the weaver Olf Kanore and Olf Adams.

name: Low-Grade Magic Pin (C-Grade)
description: Low-Grade Magic Pin that can improve the function of Cloth Belt.

name: Mid-Grade Magic Pin (C-Grade)
description: Magic Pin that can improve the function of Cloth Belt.

name: High-Grade Magic Pin (C-Grade)
description: High-Grade Magic Pin that can improve the function of Cloth Belt.

name: Top-Grade Magic Pin (C-Grade)
description: Top-Grade Magic Pin that can improve the function of Cloth Belt.

name: Low-Grade Magic Pin (B-Grade)
description: Low-Grade Magic Pin that can improve the function of Leather Belt.

name: Mid-Grade Magic Pin (B-Grade)
description: Magic Pin that can improve the function of Leather Belt.

name: High-Grade Magic Pin (B-Grade)
description: High-Grade Magic Pin that can improve the function of Leather Belt.

name: Top-Grade Magic Pin (B-Grade)
description: Top-Grade Magic Pin that can improve the function of Leather Belt.

name: Low-Grade Magic Pin (A-Grade)
description: Low-Grade Magic Pin that can improve the function of Iron Belt.

name: Mid-Grade Magic Pin (A-Grade)
description: Magic Pin that can improve the function of Iron Belt.

name: High-Grade Magic Pin (A-Grade)
description: High-Grade Magic Pin that can improve the function of Iron Belt.

name: Top-Grade Magic Pin (A-Grade)
description: Top-Grade Magic Pin that can improve the function of Iron Belt.

name: Low-Grade Magic Pin (S-Grade)
description: Low-Grade Magic Pin that can improve the function of Mithril Belt.

name: Mid-Grade Magic Pin (S-Grade)
description: Magic Pin that can improve the function of Mithril Belt.

name: High-Grade Magic Pin (S-Grade)
description: High-Grade Magic Pin that can improve the function of Mithril Belt.

name: Top-Grade Magic Pin (S-Grade)
description: Top-Grade Magic Pin that can improve the function of Mithril Belt.

name: Sealed Magic Pouch (C-Grade)
description: Item can be attached to a Sealed Magic Belt by weaver Olf Kanore or Olf Adams. They can also unseal these items.

name: Sealed Magic Pouch (B-Grade)
description: Item can be attached to a Sealed Magic Belt by weaver Olf Kanore or Olf Adams. They can also unseal these items.

name: Agathion Auxiliary Stone: Enchant Weapon (D-Grade)
description: The Agathion Auxiliary Stone raises the ability to enchant a D-Grade weapon by 20%. This can only be used on weapons that have been enchanted more than 3 times, but less than 9 times.

description: A wrapped package that contains 1 Agathion Seal Bracelet - Neolithica. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can use a private warehouse.

name: Event - Apiga
description: Money used by magic lab animals. Take it to a magic lab to be rewarded. No drop available.

name: Event - Golden Apiga
description: Rare form of money used by magic lab animals. If you take it to a magic lab you can be rewarded. No drop available.

name: Event - Cupid's Fatigue Recovery Potion
description: Decreases fatigue when used on a cow.

name: Event - Cupid's Powerful Fatigue Recovery Potion
description: Decreases fatigue when used on a cow. It has a better effect than Cupid's Fatigue Recovery Potion.

name: Event - Milk Cow Summon Scroll
description: Scroll that summons a Milk Cow. If you relieve the Milk Cow's fatigue, you can acquire Apiga. (Recovery is only possible through Cupid's Fatigue Recovery Potion or Cupid's Powerful Fatigue Recovery Potion.) Exchange possible.

name: Event - Head Milk Cow Summon Scroll
description: Scroll that summons a Head Milk Cow. If you relieve the Head Milk Cow's fatigue, you can acquire Apiga. (Recovery is only possible through Cupid's Fatigue Recovery Potion or Cupid's Powerful Fatigue Recovery Potion.) Exchange possible.

name: Event - Gloomy Milk Cow Summon Scroll
description: Scroll that summons a Gloomy Milk Cow. Can sometimes transform into a Bull while trying to recover the Milk Cow. (Recovery is only possible through Cupid's Fatigue Recovery Potion or Cupid's Powerful Fatigue Recovery Potion.) Exchange possible.

name: Event - Gloomy Head Milk Cow Summon Scroll
description: Scroll that summons a Gloomy Head Milk Cow. Can sometimes transform into a Head Bull while trying to recover the Milk Cow. (Recovery is only possible through Cupid's Fatigue Recovery Potion or Cupid's Powerful Fatigue Recovery Potion.) Exchange possible.

name: Event - Orr Cube
description: The Orb Cube can be used once a day for 30 days. Upon double-clicking this item you will receive a Cubic Piece that can be used while speaking with a Warehouse Keeper. No exchange/drop/server removal available.

name: Event - Crystal Cube
description: Cube that can be used 1 time. You can obtain a Crystal Cube fragment by double clicking. No drop available.

name: Event - Gold Crystal Cube Fragment
description: You can confirm the use of this item by talking to the warehouse keeper. No drop available.

name: Event - Silver Crystal Cube Fragment
description: You can confirm the use of this item by talking to the warehouse keeper. No drop available.

name: Event - Bronze Crystal Cube Fragment
description: You can confirm the use of this item by talking to the warehouse keeper. No drop available.

name: Event - Black Crystal Cube Fragment
description: You can confirm the use of this item by talking to the warehouse keeper. No drop available.

name: Event - Clear Crystal Cube Fragment
description: You can confirm the use of this item by talking to the warehouse keeper. No drop available.

name: Event - Purple Crystal Cube Fragment
description: You can confirm the use of this item by talking to the warehouse keeper. No drop available.

name: Event - Pink Crystal Cube Fragment
description: You can confirm the use of this item by talking to the warehouse keeper. No drop available.

name: Event - Dark Brown Crystal Cube Fragment
description: You can confirm the use of this item by talking to the warehouse keeper. No drop available.

name: Event - Black Crystal Cube Fragment
description: You can confirm the use of this item by talking to the warehouse keeper. No drop available.

name: Event - Fresh Milk
description: Freshly collected milk. When used, you can feel the effects of Might, Haste, Empower, Acumen, Wind Walk, Vampiric Rage, Berserker Spirit, Shield, Focus, Death Whisper, Guidance, Clarity, Wild Magic, and Concentration for 1 hour.

name: Event - Save the Cow Event Pack
description: An even pack that can be obtained once every 12 hours per account. In order to use this item, double click it and you will obtain the Milk Cow Summon Scroll and 'Cupid's Fatigue Recovery Potion' that are needed for the  event. No exchange available.

name: Event - Vitality Replenishing Herb Tea 5 minutes
description: When you drink it, you can temporarily feel the energy recovery herb's effect. Can be exchanged.

name: Event - Vitality Replenishing Herb Tea 10 minutes
description: When used, you can feel the energy recovery herb's effect for 10 minutes. But there is no effect when the "Birthday Gift" buff is applied. No drop available.

name: Event - Vitality Replenishing Herb Tea 20 minutes
description: When used, you can feel the energy recovery herb's effect for 20 minutes. But there is no effect when the "Birthday Gift" buff is applied. No drop available.

name: Event - Vitality Replenishing Herb Tea 30 minutes
description: When you drink it, you can temporarily feel the energy recovery herb's effect. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed.

name: Event - Vitality Replenishing Herb Tea 60 minutes
description: When you drink it, you can temporarily feel the energy recovery herb's effect. Can be exchanged.

name: For Events - Extra Entrance Pass - Rim Kamaloka
description: Entrance pass that lets you enter Near Kamaloka for a second time. Can cancel the limit on entrance if used while a limit on entrance to Rim Kamaloka exists. Can only be used once a day outside the instant zone. After use, the effect disappears at the corresponding instant dungeon's reset time. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed.

name: Special White Day Candy Basket
description: Candy basket for showing your heart on White Day. Contains 5 White Day candies. Can receive a bonus limited item  (coronet, suit, Agathion - Juju) occasionally. Cannot be dropped or destroyed. Cannot be registered at a private shop.

name: White Day Candy Basket
description: Candy basket for showing your heart on White Day. Contains 1 White Day candies. Can receive a bonus limited item  (Kat the Cat Hat, Agathion Seal Bracelet - Love) occasionally. Cannot be dropped or destroyed. Cannot be registered at a private shop.

name: White Day Solo Package
description: White Day gift box for solo players. Contains 1 solo escape petition. Can receive a bonus limited item  (wild rose pig candy) occasionally. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Cannot be registered at a private shop.

name: White Day Candy
description: White Day candy filled with a loving heart. Energy is fully replenished upon use. Duration for reuse: 60 minutes. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Cannot be registered at a private shop.

name: Solo Escape Petition
description: Fragrant grass that wishes for a solo player's escape. Energy is maintained for 10 minutes upon use. Re-use time is 30 minutes. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Cannot be registered at a private shop.

name: Baguette's Herb
description: For 10 minutes, increases Max HP and increases some HP Regeneration. Cannot be exchnaged or dropped.

name: Fresh Cream Herb
description: For 10 minutes, increases Max MP and HP. Increases P. Def., M. Def., Resistance to debuff., Atk. Spd., Casting Spd., and Speed. Cannot be exchnaged or dropped.

name: Cheesecake Herb
description: For 10 minutes, increases Max MP and increases some MP Regeneration. Cannot be exchnaged or dropped.

name: Territory Health Recovery Potion
description: Recovers HP when in use. Restricted to characters higher than level 61 and lower than level 75. Can only be used on the battlefield during a Territory War.

name: Territory Mana Recovery Potion
description: Recovers MP when in use. Restricted to characters higher than level 61 and lower than level 75. Can only be used on the battlefield during a Territory War.

name: Territory CP Recovery Potion
description: Recovers CP when in use. Restricted to characters higher than level 61 and lower than level 75. Can only be used on the battlefield during a Territory War.

name: Enriched Pet Food for Wolves
description: Pet food for Great Wolves and Fenrirs. When your pet's hunger gauge drops below 55% they will be able to feed themselves automatically.

name: Guardian's Dragon Bugle
description: A bugle used to summon a Guardian's Strider. This pet uses some of the experience points earned by its master.

name: Skull Key of Suffering
description: Key used to remove the time restriction on instance and allows you to enter the Hall of Suffering. Can only be used once a day outside the entrance to the Hall of Suffering. Cannot use multiple skull keys daily. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Skull Key of Erosion
description: Key used to remove the time restriction on instance and allows you to enter the Hall of Erosion. Can only be used once a day outside the entrance to the Hall of Erosion. Cannot use multiple skull keys daily. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Skull Key of the Heart
description: Key used to lift the entrance limit to the Hall of Suffering. Can only be used once a day outside the instance. After use, the effect disappears when the instance is reset. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Soul Extraction Device
description: Device that can be used on a recently killed monster in the Seed of Infinity to collect additional Tears of a Freed Soul. Can be used only inside Seed of Infinity instant dungeons. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Deinonychus Mesozoic Stone
description: Stone used to summon a Deinonychus. This pet can consume Food For Wolves to replenish hunger. It takes away some of the experience points the Pet Master earns.

name: Cave Exploration Text 1 Sheet
description: Report of explorers that contains information about the cave's origins

name: Cave Exploration Text 2 Sheet
description: Report of explorers that contains information about the cause of transformation of the ancient giants

name: Cave Exploration Text 3 Sheet
description: Report of explorers that contains information about the secret of Hekaton Prime

name: Growth Accelerator
description: Syringe containing Stakato secretion. When injected into a Bizarre Cocoon, this substance will stimulate the growth of a Cannibalistic Stakato Chief.

name: Small Stakato Cocoon
description: Tightly wrapped item that resembles a cocoon. But it doesn't seem to contain a lifeform. Small size.

name: Large Stakato Cocoon
description: Tightly wrapped item that resembles a cocoon. But it doesn't seem to contain a lifeform. Fairly heavy.

name: Multi-colored Jewel
description: Lump of ore containing mysterious power. Upon use, you are teleported to the Stakato nest entrance.

name: Knowledge of the Giants Anthology, Chapter 1
description: Portion of the knowledge anthology from the Titans era. Chapter 1 of 5.

name: Knowledge of the Giants Anthology, Chapter 2
description: Portion of the knowledge anthology from the Titans era. Chapter 2 of 5.

name: Knowledge of the Giants Anthology, Chapter 3
description: Portion of the knowledge anthology from the Titans era. Chapter 3 of 5.

name: Knowledge of the Giants Anthology, Chapter 4
description: Portion of the knowledge anthology from the Titans era. Chapter 4 of 5.

name: Knowledge of the Giants Anthology, Chapter 5
description: Portion of the knowledge anthology from the Titans era. Chapter 5 of 5.

name: Ancient Parchment
description: Parchment from the Titans era. Double click to see more information.

name: Wisdom of the Giants Text, Chapter 1
description: Book containing a collection of wisdom from the Titans era. Chapter 1 of 5.

name: Wisdom of the Giants Text, Chapter 2
description: Book containing a collection of wisdom from the Titans era. Chapter 2 of 5.

name: Wisdom of the Giants Text, Chapter 3
description: Book containing a collection of wisdom from the Titans era. Chapter 3 of 5.

name: Wisdom of the Giants Text, Chapter 4
description: Book containing a collection of wisdom from the Titans era. Chapter 4 of 5.

name: Wisdom of the Giants Text, Chapter 5
description: Book containing a collection of wisdom from the Titans era. Chapter 5 of 5.

name: Titan Ancient Book
description: Book from the Titans era. Double click to see more information.

name: Protection Soul's Pendant
description: Amulet with protection from the evil spirits of the altar. Soul cores are purged above and driven into the pendant to make it shine with a red glow.

name: Kahman's Supply Box
description: Supply box received from Mercenary Kahman as mission compensation. Double click to check more information.

name: Droph's Support Items
description: Support items received from Dwarven Explorer Droph for defeating Hekaton Prime. Double click to check more information.

name: Cave Exploration Text 1 Sheet
description: Report of explorers that contains information about the cave's origins

name: Cave Exploration Text 2 Sheet
description: Report of explorers that contains information about the cause of transformation of the ancient giants

name: Cave Exploration Text 3 Sheet
description: Report of explorers that contains information about the secret of Hekaton Prime

name: Recipe - Spiteful Soul Energy
description: Recipe for quests. Needed to make soul energy. Requires the Create Item skill level 2.

name: Spiteful Soul Energy
description: Energy form soul received from the spiteful soul Leader. Collect and bring them to Balthazar.

name: Spiteful Soul Vengeance
description: Vindictive spirit received from the spiteful soul Leader. Cannot be formed into energy and is pretty much useless.

name: Shell of Monsters
description: Hard shell obtained by defeating the monsters near the cave of the giants. Take it to Magister Hanellin.

name: Scout's Note
description: Note obtained from the scout's body. Deliver the note to Mercenary Captain Pierce.

name: Stakato Queen's Fang
description: Fang obtained from defeating Stakato Queen Shyeed. Bring it to Mercenary Kahman.

name: Box Containing the Flame of the Holy Spirit
description: Box protecting the flame of the Holy Spirit. Deliver it to Beacon Town Manager Torrant at the Den of Evil.

name: Cursed Burial Items
description: Item that gives physical power to souls with deep grudges.

name: Flauen's Letter
description: Letter from Gatekeeper Flauen of Heine. If you bring it to Iason Heine, you can hear more information about the mission.

name: Letter to Helvetica
description: Certificate containing Iason Heine's promise of support. Bring it to Dr. Helvetica at the Field of Silence Research Center located in the Field of Silence.

name: Letter to Athenia
description: Certificate containing Iason Heine's promise of support. Bring it to the Priestess Athenia of the Ritual Site of Purge located in the Field of Silence.

name: Certificate of Support
description: Certificate received from Dr. Helvetica of the Field of Silence Research Center. This certificate is necessary to receive an additional mission from him.

name: Certificate of Support
description: This certificate shows your support for Priestess Athenia and her cause. This certificate is necessary to receive an additional mission from her.

name: Damaged Torch Fragment
description: Broken piece left after the destruction of the Brazier of Purity built around the Ritual Site of Purge. Gather all and bring them to Dr. Helvetica in the Field of Silence Development Research Center.

name: Guardian Spirit Fragment
description: Broken piece of Guardian Spirit acquired from destroying the Magic Force Guardian Spirit and Evil Spirit in the Magic Force near the Ritual Site of Purge. Gather all and bring them to Dr. Helvetica in the Field of Silence Development Research Center.

name: Destroyed machine piece
description: This is a part you salvaged from one of the Landfill Machines you destroyed. Once you have collected 10 pieces, return to Athenia.

name: Enchanted Golem Shard
description: Fragment obtained from the destruction of the Suppressors and Exterminators belonging to Dr. Helvetica. Collect 20 fragments, then return to Athenia in the Field of Whispers.

name: Mucrokian Hide
description: This hide was obtained by killing a Mucrokian. When you are ready, return to Katensa to trade your hides for a reward.

name: Awakened Mucrokian Hide
description: Proof of defeating an Awakened Mucrokian. Gather and bring them to Katensa of the Field of Silence Research Center.

name: Mucrokian Hide
description: This hide was obtained by killing a Mucrokian. When you are ready, return to Priestess Athenia to trade your hides for a reward.

name: Fallen Mucrokian Hide
description: This hide was obtained by defeating a Contaminated Mucrokian. When you are ready, return to Priestess Athenia to trade these hides for a reward.

name: Mineral Fragment
description: Mineral fragment obtained as proof of defeating the enemies in the Mithril Mines. Collect and bring them to representative Filaur of the Grey Column guild at the Dwarven Village Chief Hall.

name: Evidence of Migration
description: Proof received from the Red Man Robbers that you have succeeded in convincing them. Collect and bring them to Grave Robber Leader Kanemika.

name: Replenished Power Bead
description: Bead needed to replenish the energy of power in Lucien's altar. Take it to each of Lucien's altars and enhance the energy of power.

name: Discharged Power Bead
description: Discharged power bead that has replenished Lucien's altar as a replenished power bead. Also proof that replenishment is complete. When all replenishments are complete, take this bead as proof of the mission's completion to the Priest of the Earth Daichir in Maphr's Temple in the Dwarven Village.

name: Stakato Fang
description: Fangs obtained from Stakato carcasses. Once you have 25, take them to Bounty Hunter Kintaijin.

name: Dirty Bead
description: Part of an artifact stolen by Billy Haari, these beads are obtained by defeating monsters inside the Stakato's Nest. Once you have 500, return to Kintaijin to receive your reward.

name: Soul Core Containing Evil Spirit
description: Monster's soul core containing an evil spirit. Small jewel with evil energy appearing in dark purple.

name: Ragna Orc's Amulet
description: Doll used in shamanism to control the evil creatures by the Ragna Orcs. Collect and bring them to Beacon Town Manager Torrant at the Den of Evil.

name: Hisilrome's Heart
description: Heart obtained after defeating Shilen's Priest Hisilrome.

name: Gludio Supply Box - Magic Rune Clip
description: A box that has the symbol of Gludio. A high grade magic Rune clip that's attached to the belt can be acquired at a certain rate.

name: Dion Supply Box - Magic Rune Clip
description: A box that has the symbol of Dion. A high grade magic Rune clip that's attached to the belt can be acquired at a certain rate.

description: A box that has the symbol of Giran. A high grade magic Rune clip that's attached to the belt can be acquired at a certain rate.

name: Sealed Magic Rune Clip (A-Grade)
description: Can be attached to Sealed Magic Rune Clip and Belt. Ehe seal can be cancelled through the weaver Olf Kanore and Olf Adams.

name: Sealed Magic Rune Clip (S-Grade)
description: Can be attached to Sealed Magic Rune Clip and Belt. Ehe seal can be cancelled through the weaver Olf Kanore and Olf Adams.

description: Can be attached to Sealed Magic Ornament and Belt. Ehe seal can be cancelled through the weaver Olf Kanore and Olf Adams.

description: Can be attached to Sealed Magic Ornament and Belt. Ehe seal can be cancelled through the weaver Olf Kanore and Olf Adams.

description: Low-Grade Magic Rune Clip that can improve the function of Steel Belt.

name: Equipment Set 10-Day Pack Exchange Coupon

name: Equipment Set 10-Day Pack

name: Equipment Set 30-Day Pack
description: When used, you can obtain a 30 day limited time equipment set for your class. Can use after 1st job change. Expires after 30 days if not used. No exchange/drop available

name: Friend Recommend Round 1 Reward Pack Exchange Coupon
description: When used, you can exchange for a Friend Recommend Round 1 Reward Pack.

name: Friend Recommend Round 1 Reward Pack
description: Friend recommend service reward pack containing a Bracelet of Friendship, hair accessory, and hunting helper exchange coupon. Expires after 30 days if not used. No exchange/drop available

name: Friend Recommend Round 2 Reward Pack Exchange Coupon
description: When used, you can exchange for a Friend Recommend Round 2 Reward Pack.

description: Friend recommend service reward pack containing proof of the friend's recommendation with a Bracelet of Friendship, Agathion Seal Bracelet - Oink oink, High-level hunting helper exchange coupon. Expires after 30 days if not used. No exchange/drop available

When consumed, one can feel Berserker Spirit, Blessed Body, Magic Barrier, Shield, Wind Walk, Blessed Soul, Empower, Acumen, and Clarity effects for a certain amount of time.

name: Event - Herdsman's Love Scroll
description: July 7th event. Enchant scroll exclusively for the Weaver's Multi-colored Clothes. Increases the P. Def. and Magic M. Def. of the Weaver's Multi-colored Clothes. Can be safely enchanted to +3, and the item disappears when the enchant fails. When the Weaver's Multi-colored Clothes is enchanted above +4, attributes, STR, CON, INT, and MEN also increase according to the enhancement value. Can only be used during the July 7th event period, and it is deleted in bulk once the event ends.

name: Event - Vitality Belt Enchant Scroll
description: Enchant scroll exclusively for the Vitality Belt. Increases the Vitality Belt's P. Def. and Magic M. Def. Vitality maintenance effect. Vitality maintenance re-use time reduced. Can be safely enchanted to +3, and the item disappears when the enchant fails. When the Vitality Belt is enchanted above +4, vitality maintenance duration increases, and the decreases vitality maintenance re-use time. Can only be used during the Vitality Belt event period, and it s deleted in bulk once the event ends.

description: Magic stone that temporarily neutralizes Freya's powerful magic

description: Sacred sword that can neutralize Freya's power. Cannot use it directly due to some unknown M. Atk.

name: Beast Handler's Whip
description: Obtained from Tunatun on the Beast Farm, this whip will enable the bearer to control tamed pets. Must be equipped to use.

name: Golden Spice
description: Feed used to tame baby animals on the Beast Farm. Using this feed will allow the monster to drop adena and/or items, but will give less experience.

name: Crystal Spice
description: Feed used to tame baby animals on the Beast Farm. This feed will cause the monster to give more experience, but no adena or items.

name: Blessed Golden Spice
description: A better quality feed that has a chance to tame animals on the Beast Farm with just one application.

name: Blessed Crystal Spice
description: A better quality feed that has a chance to tame animals on the Beast Farm with just one application.

name: Golden Spice (S-Grade)
description: A better quality feed that has a chance to turn Beast Farm babies into fully grown pets with just one application. Using this feed will allow the monster to drop adena and/or items, but will give less experience.

name: Crystal Spice (S-Grade)
description: A better quality feed that has a chance to turn Beast Farm babies into fully grown pets with just one application. This feed causes the monster to give more experience, but no adena or items.

description: Old and unusable Beast Farm Feed

name: Old Crystal Spice

name: Maguen Pet Collar
description: Necklace that summons a Maguen. The summoned Maguen can eat wolf-type feed, and it takes away some of the experience points the Pet Master earns. No exchange, drop, sale, or mail available.

name: Elite Maguen Pet Collar
description: Necklace that summons an Elite Maguen. The summoned Maguen can eat wolf-type feed, and it takes away some of the experience points the Pet Master earns. No exchange, drop, sale, or mail available.

name: Maguen Collection Box
description: Its contents are a mystery. The only way to find out what is inside is to open it.

name: Elite Maguen Collection Box
description: Its contents are a mystery. The only way to find out what is inside is to open it.

name: Sel Mahum Salmon Porridge
description: Sel Mahum salmon porridge. Smells better than expected… but not by much.

name: Fantasy Mushroom Pouch
description: Pouch containing the spores of Fantasy Mushrooms, which grow in the Plains of the Lizardmen. Detailed information can be obtained from Investigator Sally on the Plains of the Lizardmen.

name: Sticky Mushroom Pouch
description: Pouch containing the spores of Sticky Mushrooms, which grow in the Plains of the Lizardmen. Detailed information can be obtained from Investigator Sally on the Plains of the Lizardmen.

name: Vitality Plant Leaf
description: Leaf of the Energy Plant, which grows in the Plains of the Lizardmen. Detailed information can be obtained from Investigator Sally on the Plains of the Lizardmen.

name: Seer Ugoros Pass
description: Document from Investigator Johnny in the Plains of the Lizardmen that verifies you possess the required skills. It indicates that you have the right to go and see Tanta Lizardman Seer Ugoros. Show it to Gatekeeper Batracos near the Plains of the Lizardmen.

name: High-Grade Lizard Scale
description: The highest-quality Lizardman Scale without any blemishes obtained after defeating Tanta Lizardmen Seer Ugoros. Take it to Researcher Ankumi on the Plains of the Lizardmen.

name: Middle-Grade Lizard Scale
description: The medium-quality Lizardman Scale obtained after defeating Tanta Lizardmen Seer Ugoros. Take it to Researcher Ankumi on the Plains of the Lizardmen.

name: Vial of Tanta Blood
description: Vial containing the blood of Tanta Lizardmen. Take it to Investigator Laki on the Plains of the Lizardmen.

name: Sel Mahum Diary
description: Diary containing the daily life of the Sel Mahum. Take it back to Guard Stan of Oren Village.

name: Sel Mahum Cookbook Page
description: Part of the cookbook used by the Sel Mahum Chef. Take it back to Guard Stan of Oren Village.

name: Sel Mahum Cookbook
description: Cookbook used by the Sel Mahum Chef. Take it back to Guard Stan of Oren Village.

name: Shiny Salmon
description: Shiny and tantalizing salmon. Take it back to Guard Stan of Oren Village.

name: Gray Salmon
description: Not so shiny but still OK-looking salmon. If you take it back to Guard Stan of Oren Village, he'll take care of everything else, right?

name: Sickly Salmon
description: Scales are falling off and it doesn't look good at all. If you take it back to Guard Stan of Oren Village, he'll take care of everything else, right?

name: Salmon Lure
description: Lure used to catch salmon. You cannot catch salmon without it.

name: Foul Fruit
description: Horrible tasting fruit. If you put it in the salmon porridge, which is cooking on the fire at the Sel Mahum Training Grounds, you could ruin the dish.

name: Sel Mahum Training Diary
description: Dairy containing detailed examples of the Sel Mahum training. Take it back to Guard Pinaps of Oren Village.

name: Sel Mahum Training Timetable
description: Paper containing the training schedule of the Sel Mahum. Take it back to Guard Pinaps of Oren Village.

name: Golem Corps Log
description: Paper containing some logs for recognizing Golem Corps. Collect all needed logs.

name: Golem Corps Collection
description: Bundle of papers containing all the logs for recognizing Golem Corps. Take it back to Collector Gutenhagen at Pavel Ruins.

name: Seed of Annihilation Orders
description: Kucereus' Clan Outpost Commander Kbaldir's written orders. Go to the pier of the Seed of Annihilation and deliver it to his subordinate, Officer Klemis.

name: Gracian Soldier Tag
description: ID Tag of a Gracian soldier who was killed near the Seed of Annihilation. Let's take it to Officer Jakan who is stationed at the pier near the Seed of Annihilation.

name: Cold Resistance Potion
description: A potion especially crafted from the Jinia Guild to protect the body from the cursed cold powers of the Ice Queen. Needed to rescue Kegor, who has fallen into trouble.

name: Seal Breaker - 5th Floor
description: Seal Breaker needed to speak face to face with the Demon Prince on the 5th floor of the Tower of Infinitum in the Steel Citadel. It is destroyed after one use.

name: Seal Breaker - 10th Floor
description: Seal Breaker needed to speak face to face with Ranku on the 10th floor of the Tower of Infinitum in the Steel Citadel. It is destroyed after one use.

name: Seal Components Part 1
description: A Seal Breaker component. Acquired after defeating the Space Guard in the Tower of Infinitum. You can make a Seal Breaker that negates great power by putting this piece together with others like it.

name: Seal Components Part 2
description: A Seal Breaker component. Acquired after defeating the Space Gazer in the Tower of Infinitum. You can make a Seal Breaker that negates great power by putting this piece together with others like it.

name: Seal Components Part 3
description: A Seal Breaker component. Acquired after defeating the Space Priest in the Tower of Infinitum. You can make a Seal Breaker that negates great power by putting this piece together with others like it.

name: Seal Components Part 4
description: A Seal Breaker component. Acquired after defeating the Space Ruler in the Tower of Infinitum. You can make a Seal Breaker that negates great power by putting this piece together with others like it.

name: Broken Golem Shard
description: Fragment obtained by hunting golems.

name: Shabby Necklace
description: Shabby necklace that Antharas Watcher Theodric supposedly gives only to those who are worthy of going after the Earth Dragon Antharas. He says the necklace will transform after you defeat Antharas.

name: Miracle Necklace
description: After you defeated the Earth dragon Antharas, the shabby necklace that you received from Antharas Watcher Theodric changed into this item. Take this necklace to him.

name: Poor Necklace
description: Valakas Watcher Klein gave you this necklace. It is of poor quality and not worth much. However, it is said to transform into something worth much more after killing Valakas.

name: Valor Necklace
description: After killing Valakas the Poor Necklace has transformed into this necklace. Take this necklace to Valakas Watcher Klein.

name: Tattered Monk Clothes
description: Tattered clothes are the remains of the monks you battled in the Monastery of Silence. The clothes are nothing more than rags after their years of use. Let's take them to Greymore in the Monastery of Silence.

name: Mark of Splendor
description: Proof that you successfully defeated the Master of Splendor Anays at Priest Greymore's request. If you take it to Greymore, you will receive a reward.

name: Mark of Darkness
description: You succeeded in defeating the Master of Splendor Anays at Priest Greymore's request. But you received the Mark of Darkness rather than the Mark of Splendor. If you take this to Greymore, he will laugh at you.

name: Priest Dominic's Letter
description: A secret letter sent by Priest Dominic of the Rune Village temple to Greymore. Deliver it to Priest Greymore in the Monastery of Silence.

name: Monk Scripture
description: Sacred text obtained after defeating the monks in the Monastery of Silence. Bring it to Greymore in the Monastery of Silence.

name: Sel Mahum Mane
description: Mane obtained by defeating the Sel Mahums that were attacking the animals the Beast Farm. Collect them and bring them to Tunatun in the Beast Farm.

name: Veal
description: Meat from a young animal. Smells good but tastes bad. Take it to Beast Herder Tunatun at the Beast Farm.

name: Innocence Jewel
description: A white gem produce by animals. Looking at it reminds you of a time long ago. I wonder what my old friends are doing now…

name: Prime Meat
description: Top quality meat obtained from an adult animal. Only one piece comes out per animal. Collect these and take them to Beast Herder Tunatun.

name: Concentrated Spirit Energy
description: Obtained in the Seed of Annihilation. Take this Concentrated Spirit Energy to Special Products Broker Kirklan to exchange them for a reward.

name: Spirit Stone Dust
description: Obtained through hunting in the Seed of Annihilation. If you take them to Special Products Broker Kirklan you can exchange 5 of these items for a Spirit Stone Fragment.

name: Strongbox of Promise
description: Small safe obtained by defeating the monks in the Monastery of Silence. You can find out about the quest by clicking on it. Quest start item.

name: Book of Silence
description: Ancient book contained inside the Strongbox of Promise. Before you can return it to its owner, you must figure out who it belongs to. Go to Library of Sages Director Sophia in the Rune Castle Library and ask for help.

name: Book of Silence
description: You heard about the book's owner from the Library of Sages Director Sophia. Return the book to its owner.

name: Unlit Torchlight
description: Torch that doesn't light. Item needed to obtain the treasure chest in the secret room inside the Monastery of Silence.

name: Red Soul Crystal - Stage 17
description: Red Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 17. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. MP 26 is consumed each time of use. This level crystal is said to absorb crystals on its own, so it doesn't seem like you need to use it directly on the monsters.

name: Blue Soul Crystal - Stage 17
description: Blue Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 17. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. MP 26 is consumed each time of use. This level crystal is said to absorb crystals on its own, so it doesn't seem like you need to use it directly on the monsters.

name: Green Soul Crystal - Stage 17
description: Green Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 17. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. MP 26 is consumed each time of use. This level crystal is said to absorb crystals on its own, so it doesn't seem like you need to use it directly on the monsters.

name: Exp
description: You acquire Exp. as a reward.

name: SP
description: You acquire skill points as a reward.

name: Question Mark
description: Question Mark

name: Vitality
description: You acquire vitality points as a reward.

name: Clan Point
description: You acquire clan points as a reward.

name: Gamble Reward
description: Reward different from the gamble and the game result

name: Random Reward
description: Randomly selected reward

name: Flexible Reward
description: Reward determined by calculating for adjustments

name: Bonus Reward
description: Additional reward

name: Sub Class Reward
description: Sub-class authority was obtained.

name: PK Reduction
description: The PK Count is decreased.

name: Vesper Cutter Piece
description: An essential ingredient that a Dwarf needs to make Vesper Cutter. It can be sold at ordinary stores.

name: Secret Key
description: Key that opens a secret door

name: Sealed Vesper Sigil Piece
description: An essential ingredient that a Dwarf needs to make a Sealed Vesper Sigil. It can be sold at ordinary stores.

name: Sealed Moirai Sigil Piece
description: An essential ingredient that a Dwarf needs to make a Sealed Moirai Sigil. It can be sold at ordinary stores.

name: Sealed Moirai Shield Piece
description: An essential ingredient that a Dwarf needs to make a Sealed Moirai Shield. It can be sold at ordinary stores.

name: War Veteran Voucher
description: Document showing military service in the Seed of Annihilation region. Collect plenty of these and take them back to Soldier Ilvenis at the pier in the Seed of Annihilation to exchange for a reward.

name: Full Barrel of Soup
description: Food container of the Sel Mahums. Contains a lot of porridge. Take it back to Guard Stan of Oren Village.

name: Empty Soup Barrel
description: Food container of the Sel Mahums. It's completely empty. Take it back to Guard Stan of Oren Village.

name: Sel Mahum ID Tag
description: ID Tag of a Sel Mahum who is training at the Sel Mahum Training Grounds. Take it back to Guard Pinaps of Oren Village.

name: Damaged Book
description: Ancient text that is too damaged to determine its contents. It served its purpose as a book. Sell it at the shop and get at least a little money.

name: Packaged Book
description: Item received after saving a Treasure Hunter. It's tightly wrapped so you can't see what book is inside. Double click for more information.

name: Sealed Vesper Ring Gem
description: An essential ingredient that a Dwarf needs to make Vesper Ring. It can be sold at ordinary stores.

name: Sealed Vesper Earring Gem
description: An essential ingredient that a Dwarf needs to make Vesper Earring. It can be sold at ordinary stores.

name: Sealed Vesper Necklace Gem
description: An essential ingredient that a Dwarf needs to make Vesper Necklace. It can be sold at ordinary stores.

name: Sealed Moirai Ring Gem
description: An essential ingredient that a Dwarf needs to make Moirai Ring. It can be sold at ordinary stores.

name: Sealed Moirai Earring Gem
description: An essential ingredient that a Dwarf needs to make Moirai Earring. It can be sold at ordinary stores.

name: Sealed Moirai Necklace Gem
description: An essential ingredient that a Dwarf needs to make Moirai Necklace. It can be sold at ordinary stores.

description: Exclusive to Dwarves. Recipe for making a Sealed Moirai Helmet. Requires Create Item - Skill Level 9. The success rate is 60%.

name: Event - Scroll of Summon Baby White Tiger
description: Scroll that summons a baby White Tiger. If you relieve the Baby White Tiger's fatigue, you can acquire Apiga. (Recovery is only possible through Cupid's Fatigue Recovery Potion or Cupid's Powerful Fatigue Recovery Potion.) Exchange possible.

description: Scroll that summons a Gloomy Baby White Tiger. Can sometimes transform into a White Tiger while trying to recover the Baby White Tiger. (Recovery is only possible through Cupid's Fatigue Recovery Potion or Cupid's Powerful Fatigue Recovery Potion.) Exchange possible.

name: Event - Scroll of Summon Baby White Tiger Captain

name: Freesia Bouquet (Event)
description: A bouquet of freesias which implies innocent naivety. If used against a chaotic character or a character whose name is purple, your name will turn purple. Can also be used on Event Manager Freya in town.

name: Baby Breath Bouquet (Event)
description: A bouquet of gypsophila which implies sorrow. If used against a chaotic character or a character whose name is purple, your name will turn purple. Can also be used on Event Manager Freya in town.

name: Pink Lady (Event)
description: A cocktail dedicated to the heroine of the play <Pink Lady> in a celebration of its success, which was first performed on the stage in London in 1912. If used against a chaotic character or a character whose name is purple, your name will turn purple. Can also be used on Event Manager Freya in town.

name: June Bug (Event)
description: A cocktail with fresh color of summer green and sweet fragrance, which reminds of bugs flying from flower to flower following the scent in the month of June. If used against a chaotic character or a character whose name is purple, your name will turn purple. Can also be used on Event Manager Freya in town.

name: Soft Cheesecake (Event)
description: A gourmet cheesecake that is soft like a soufflé and delightfully sweet. If used against a chaotic character or a character whose name is purple, your name will turn purple. Can also be used on Event Manager Freya in town.

name: Freshly-Baked Baguette (Event)
description: A freshly-baked baguette that is soft and delicious unlike its tough look. If used against a chaotic character or a character whose name is purple, your name will turn purple. Can also be used on Event Manager Freya in town.

name: Sweet Cream Bun (Event)
description: A cream bun that features sweet and soft custard cream made of egg yolk, instead of normal butter cream or whipped cream. If used against a chaotic character or a character whose name is purple, your name will turn purple. Can also be used on Event Manager Freya in town.

name: White Day Candy (Event)
description: A cute looking candy perfect for a gift. If used against a chaotic character or a character whose name is purple, your name will turn purple.

name: Freya's Gift
description: Gift box containing Freya's heart.

name: Transformation Scroll: Anakim
description: Scroll that changes your appearance into that of Anakim for 30 minutes. Cannot be traded, dropped, or stored in a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Transformation Scroll: Zaken
description: Scroll that changes your appearance into that of Zaken for 30 minutes. Cannot be traded, dropped, or stored in a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Vesper's Mighty Power
description: Increase Physical Attack by 15%, Magical Attack by 20%, and Speed by 10 for 10 minutes.

name: Vesper's Critical Damage
description: Increase P. Critical Rate by 15, M. Critical Rate  by 2, and Speed by 10 for 10 minutes. Recovers 5% of the standard short-range physical damage inflicted on the enemy as HP.

name: Invincible Vesper
description: Increase Max. Attack Speed by 20%, Casting Spd. by 20%, and Speed by 20 for 10 minutes.

name: Solina's Biography
description: A biography containing the life story of Solina, a saintess of the Elmore-Aden kingdom. This text has been banned throughout the kingdom and is incredibly difficult to find and intact copy. Double click for more information.

name: Kaerun's Memoir
description: A complete copy of Kaerun's Memoir. It is a detailed look at Solina's life written by Kaerun from his perspective. This book was never circulated but it's original print has been archived inside the monastery. Double click for more information.

name: Kaerun's Memoir Part 1
description: An incomplete portion of Kaerun's Memoir. This is only part of Solina's life story as written by Kaerun. The book is divided into 4 parts and is kept inside the Monastery of Silence. Double click for more information.

name: Kaerun's Memoir Part 2
description: An incomplete portion of Kaerun's Memoir. This is only part of Solina's life story as written by Kaerun. The book is divided into 4 parts and is kept inside the Monastery of Silence. Double click for more information.

name: Catalog Card

name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (A-Grade)

Atk. by 5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and dual-handed combat weapons. Increases P. Atk. by 8 for for bows. Increases M. Atk. by 3 for all weapons. After +4, P. Atk. / M. Atk. increase by two times. If the enchantment fails, the item is not enhanced, and the existing enchant value becomes 0.

If the enchantment fails, the item is not enhanced, and the existing enchant value becomes 0. When armor is enchanted above +4, HP also increases according to the enchant value.

name: Will of Antharas

After his blood was spilt, the land absorbed the blood and acted as a filter that separated the poison from the blood creating a pure form of his blood that crystallized over time. Used to create an Atharas's Blood Crystal. Bring it to a Separated Soul.

name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (S-Grade)
description: 10% increase in enchant success rate. \\nAttack power for S-grade sword, one-handed blunt, one-handed dagger, spear, and other weapons increases by 5 when enchanted. Attack power for sword, two-handed blunt, two-handed dualsword, and combat and dual-handed weapons increases by 6. Attack power for bow weapons increases by 10. Magic power for all weapons increases by 4. Attack and magic power increase two times after +4. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Scroll: Enchant Armor (S-Grade)
description: 10% increase in enchant success rate. \\nDefense power for Grade S armor or accessory by 1 and by 3 starting from +4. It can be safely enchanted up to +3. For one-piece armor, it can be safely enchanted up to +4. Also increases HP according to level when armor is enchanted above +4. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Ancient Weapon Enchant Crystal (S-Grade)
description: 10% increase in enchant success rate. \\nWhen enchant fails, the existing enchant value is retained. \\nAttack power for S-grade sword, one-handed blunt, one-handed dagger, spear, and other weapons increases by 5 when enchanted. Attack power for sword, two-handed blunt, two-handed dualsword, and combat and dual-handed weapons increases by 6. Attack power for bow weapons increases by 10. Magic power for all weapons increases by 4. Attack and magic power increase two times after +4. Cannot use weapons enchanted by above 16. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Ancient Armor Enchant Crystal (S-Grade)
description: 10% increase in enchant success rate. \\nWhen enchant fails, the existing enchant value is retained. \\nDefense power for Grade S armor or accessory by 1 and by 3 starting from +4. It can be safely enchanted up to +3. For one-piece armor, it can be safely enchanted up to +4. Also increases HP according to level when armor is enchanted above +4. Cannot use armors enchanted by above 16. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Divine Weapon Enchant Crystal (S-Grade)
description: Enchant success rate is 100%. \\nAttack power for S-grade sword, one-handed blunt, one-handed dagger, spear, and other weapons increases by 5 when enchanted. Attack power for sword, two-handed blunt, two-handed dualsword, and combat and dual-handed weapons increases by 6. Attack power for bow weapons increases by 10. Magic power for all weapons increases by 4. Attack and magic power increase two times after +4. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Divine Armor Enchant Crystal (S-Grade)
description: Enchant success rate is 100%. \\nDefense power for Grade S armor or accessory by 1 and by 3 starting from +4. It can be safely enchanted up to +3. For one-piece armor, it can be safely enchanted up to +4. Also increases HP according to level when armor is enchanted above +4. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Red Firework
description: Ignites a Red Firework. For 10 minutes, increases water attribute defense by 30 and STR by 1. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Reuse delay is 4 hours.

name: Gold Firework
description: Ignites a Gold Firework. For 10 minutes, increases resistance to holy attacks by 30 and CON by 1. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Reuse delay is 4 hours.

name: Blue Firework
description: Ignites a Blue Firework. For 10 minutes, increases fire attribute defense by 30 and DEX by 1. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Reuse delay is 4 hours.

name: Pink Firework

name: White Firework
description: Ignites a White Firework. For 10 minutes, increases wind attribute defense by 30 and WIT by 1. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Reuse delay is 4 hours.

name: Silver Firework

name: Kung Hei Fat Choy
description: Decreases P. Def. by 8%, M. Def. by 16%, and evasion by 4, and increases P. Atk. by 15%, M. Atk. by 16%, Atk. Spd. by 8%, Casting Spd. by 8%, and moving speed by 8 for 1 hour. Recovers as HP 9% of the standard short-range physical damage inflicted on the enemy. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Chinese Feast

name: Olf's T-shirt Enchant Scroll
description: Enchant scroll exclusive to Olf's T-shirt.\\nIncreases the T-shirt's P. Def. and M. Def. by 1. Starting from +4, increases P. Def. by 3. Can safely enchant to +3 and up to a max +9. From +4, "basic abilities (CON, MEN, STR, INT, DEX, WIT)" are raised in stages. Special skills are added at +5, +7, and +9. Cannot be exchanged or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Item cannot be dropped.

description: Small fragment that contains a part of Freya's soul. See weaver Olf Adams to find out what use it has.

name: Frintezza's Soul Fragment
description: Small fragment that contains a part of Frintezza's soul. See weaver Olf Adams to find out what use it has.

name: Staff of Goddess: Rain Song Fragment
description: A severaly damaged staff piece. A mysterious light shines faintly.

name: Angel Cat's Blessing
description: When used, HP Recovery Bonus, Max MP, and Critical Atk. Rate +20%, and you can feel the effects of Prophecy of Water, Might, Haste, Empower, Acumen, Wind Walk, Vampiric Rage, Berserker Spirit, Shield, Focus, Death Whisper, Guidance, Clarity, Wild Magic, and Concentration for 1 hour. Reuse time is 60 minutes. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Letter Collector's Gift
description: Letter Collector's Gift\\nUpon use, for 2 hours, increases Atk. Spd. +15%, magic Casting Spd. +15%, moving speed +20, and changes the appearance of the equipped weapon and armor to look like items of memory. Reuse time is 60 minutes.

name: Maestro's Key
description: Can open a level 21~85 treasure chest with 100% chance. When a character below level 77 uses it on a treasure chest that is more than 6 levels above, or when a character above level 78 uses it on a treasure chest that is more than 5 levels above, the key disappears but the reward cannot be obtained.

name: Beginner Adventurer's Treasure Sack
description: Treasure sack containing the treasure of beginner adventurers. When you use it, you can obtain 1 C~D grade weapon.

name: Experienced Adventurer's Treasure Sack
description: Treasure sack containing the treasure of experienced adventurers. When you use it, you can obtain 1 B~S grade weapon (excludes Dynasty).

name: Great Adventurer's Treasure Sack
description: Treasure sack containing the treasure of great adventurers. When you use it, you can obtain 1 Dynasty~Vesper grade weapon.

name: Proof of Challenge
description: Token received by adventurers for their service to the Elmore king. If you bring it to Captain Mathias in Rune, you will receive a reward. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Rune Jewelry Box - Crystal
description: Jewelry box containing the precious treasure of Rune. When used, you can obtain 15 Crystals of Life with a certain rate of chance.

name: Rune Jewelry Box - Talisman
description: Jewelry box containing the precious treasure of Rune. When used, you can obtain a Talisman with a certain rate of chance.

name: Pablo's Box
description: Box containing the precious treasure of Elmore's renowned scholar Pablo. When used, you can obtain a hat with a certain rate of chance.

name: Illumination - Red
description: Brightly burning illumination.

name: Illumination - Pink
description: Brightly burning illumination.

name: Illumination - Rose Pink
description: Brightly burning illumination.

name: Illumination - Orange
description: Brightly burning illumination.

name: Illumination - Mint Green
description: Brightly burning illumination.

name: Illumination - Green
description: Brightly burning illumination.

description: Brightly burning illumination.

description: Brightly burning illumination.

description: Brightly burning illumination.
